000009.SZ.summary: China Baoan Group Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of cathode and anode materials for lithium battery manufacturers worldwide. It also researches on drive systems for new energy vehicles sand automotive assembly plants; manufactures and sells precision metal parts that are used in hard disk drives, hydraulic equipment, and auto parts, as well as parts for other purposes; researches and develops new graphite materials; and develops and manufactures military drilling simulators. In addition, the company offers power-charging connectors for new-energy vehicles; AC/DC power charging connector products for electric vehicles; and ear-nose-throat and respiratory system products. Further, it plants lian tree; researches and development, manufactures, and sells neem products; develops and manages real estate projects; and invests in venture capital, financial, and industrial investment projects. Additionally, the company engages in the wholesale and retail of pharmaceutical products; operation of a chain of hospitals; and provision of hemorrhoid products. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

000010.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Ecobeauty Co., Ltd. distributes natural gas machines and natural gas in China. It is involved in the storage, transportation and distribution, sale, maintenance, and management of natural gas and liquefied gas; and the manufacture and installation of machines, equipment, and related components. The company was formerly known as Beijing Shenhuaxin Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Ecobeauty Co., Ltd. in May 2016. Shenzhen Ecobeauty Co., Ltd. is based in Shenzhen, China.

000035.SZ.summary: China Tianying Inc. engages in urban environmental service and energy businesses in China and internationally. The company offers urban environmental services, such as waste sorting and collection, smart transportation, urban environment management, sanitation, renewable resource recovery, and waste disposal services. It also undertakes various projects, including waste separation and treatment projects, such as waste-to-energy power plants, circular economy industrial parks, construction and demolition waste treatment projects, food waste treatment projects, and landfill gas recovery and power generation projects; and smart city projects. The company was formerly known as China Kejian Co., Ltd. and changed its name to China Tianying Inc. in June 2014. China Tianying Inc. was founded in 1984 and is based in Nantong, China.

000046.SZ.summary: Oceanwide Holdings Co., Ltd. invests in, develops, constructs, manages, and sells real estate properties in China and internationally. The company provides financial services in the areas of securities, trust, insurance, futures, asset management, and Internet finance, as well as in real estate. The company was formerly known as Fan Hai Construction Group Company Limited and changed its name to Oceanwide Holdings Co., Ltd. in April 2014. Oceanwide Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Beijing, China. Oceanwide Holdings Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Oceanwide Holdings Group Company Limited.

000055.SZ.summary: China Fangda Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells curtain wall systems and materials in China and internationally. It operates in five segments: Curtain Wall, Rail Transport, Real Estate, New Energy, and Others. The company's primary products include energy-saving curtain walls, photo-electricity curtain walls, LED colour-display curtain walls, PVDF aluminium plate and graphene aluminium plate materials. Its construction curtain walls are used on high-level buildings; and large-area public venues, such as airports, stations, cultural centres and exhibition centres, day lighting roof, shaped construction with external retaining, and decoration functions. The company is also involved in the assembly and processing of metro screen doors; development and operation of real estate properties; property management; research and development, installation, and sale of photovoltaic equipment; and design and construction of photovoltaic power plants. China Fangda Group Co. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

000065.SZ.summary: Norinco International Cooperation Ltd. operates as an engineering contractor in Asia, Africa, Europe, and internationally. It is involved in the construction of various projects, such as railways, roads and bridges, civil construction, municipal facilities, petroleum, power plants, industrial manufacturing, and environmental protection. The company also develops real estate properties, such as residential and commercial projects; and provides architectural decoration services. In addition, it offers services in the field of power engineering, mining facilities, heavy-duty vehicles and equipment, integrated logistics services, solar lighting, etc. Further, it researches, develops, and manufactures packaging containers. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China. Norinco International Cooperation Ltd. is a subsidiary of China North Industries Corporation.

000090.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Tagen Group Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the urban construction, comprehensive development, and urban service businesses in China. The company offers construction services in the fields of municipal engineering, construction engineering, rail transit engineering, road maintenance, etc. It also develops real estate projects, including mid-to-high-end residences, affordable housing, office buildings, hotels, urban complexes, industrial parks, etc. In addition, the company undertakes daily maintenance projects of roads, bridges, tunnels, and traffic safety facilities; provides property management and shed reform services. Further, it operates sewage treatment plants and pipe projects; designs and constructs general contracting projects; undertakes space development and utilization projects; builds smart city; and provides engineering services, as well as acts as a construction agent. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Tonge (Group) Co., Ltd. Shenzhen Tagen Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

000099.SZ.summary: CITIC Offshore Helicopter Co.,Ltd. engages in offshore oil and general aviation development activities in China. The company provides sea navigation, aviation maintenance, aviation training, capital operation, and drone services. It has a fleet of approximately 70 helicopters. The company was formerly known as China National Offshore Helicopter Professional Company. CITIC Offshore Helicopter Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

000151.SZ.long_name: China National Complete Plant Import & Export Corporation Limited
000151.SZ.summary: China National Complete Plant Import & Export Corporation Limited operates as a general trading company in Asia, Africa, and Latin America. The company exports equipment for various industries, such as transportation and infrastructure. It exports products related to machinery, agricultural products, textiles, light industrial products, educational supplies, chemical products, building materials, electronic machinery, solar energy systems, etc. The company is also involved in the contracting of foreign projects. China National Complete Plant Import & Export Corporation Limited was founded in 1959 and is based in Beijing, China.

000157.SZ.long_name: Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science and Technology Co., Ltd.
000157.SZ.summary: Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science and Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of construction and agricultural machinery in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company operates through Construction Machinery, Agricultural Machinery, and Financial Services segments. It offers concrete machineries, including truck and trailer mounted concrete pumps, dry mortar products, concrete placing booms, concrete mixing plants, truck-mounted concrete mixers, truck-mounted line concrete pumps, and self-propelled boom concrete pumps; and truck, all-terrain truck, and crawler cranes, as well as various tower cranes. The company also provides road construction and pile foundation machineries, earth working machineries, material handling machineries and systems, specialized vehicles, and vehicle axles; road building and maintenance machineries; hoisting machineries; and forklift trucks and other products for infrastructure and real estate construction. In addition, it offers various agricultural machineries, such as tractors, grain harvesters, and drying machines. Further, it provides finance leasing, commercial factoring, and bond issuance services. Additionally, the company leases and trades in equipment and machineries; researches and manufactures machine software; manages tourism resource; and offers hydraulic products. The company was formerly known as Changsha Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science and Technology Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science and Technology Co., Ltd. in October 2011. Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science and Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.

000338.SZ.summary: Weichai Power Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells diesel engines, automobiles, and other major automobile components in China and internationally. It operates through Engines, Automobiles and Automobile Components, and Intelligent Logistics segments. The company provides design, development, production, sale, repair, and import and export of engines and auxiliary products, automobile axles, gear boxes and components, and other automobile components; hydraulic pumps and motors; hydraulic valves; gears and gear transmission devices; ancillary casting and casting products of hydraulic components; internal combustion engines, energy powertrain systems and ancillary products; technical consultation and technical services; leasing of self-owned houses; steel; business management services; and forklift trucks, and warehousing technology and supply chain solution services. It offers its products under various brands, including Weichai Power Engine, Fast Gear, Hande Axle, Shacman Heavy Truck, and Linder Hydraulics. Weichai Power Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Weifang, the People's Republic of China.

000404.SZ.summary: Changhong Huayi Compressor Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and sells various compressors in China and internationally. Its products are used in refrigerators, freezers, water dispensers, ice machines, and dehumidifiers. The company was formerly known as Huayi Compressor Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Changhong Huayi Compressor Co., Ltd. in July 2018. Changhong Huayi Compressor Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jingdezhen, China.

000410.SZ.summary: Shenyang Machine Tool Co., Ltd. provides cutting, milling, boring, and drilling solutions. The company offers horizontal and vertical lathes, and turning and milling centers; and special machinery, such as pipe thread, axle, differential case, hub, pipe coupling, sucker rod, and wheelset machines, as well as flexible machining units using turning in place of grinding. It also provides gantry type machining, horizontal milling and boring machining, vertical machining, and high speed machining centers; CNC milling and boring lathes/machining centers; and CNC drilling machines. It serves automobile, wind energy, aviation, coal mine machinery, shipbuilding, electronics, rail transport, and engineering machinery industries. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenyang, China.

000415.SZ.summary: Bohai Leasing Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a leasing company in the People's Republic of China. The company offers leasing services for aircraft, containers, infrastructure and real estate, high-end equipment, ships and maritime equipment, and new energy vehicles. It also provides insurance, securities, and Internet financing services. The company was formerly known as Bohai Capital Holding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Bohai Leasing Co., Ltd. in November 2018. Bohai Leasing Co., Ltd. Was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China.

000421.SZ.long_name: Nanjing Public Utilities Development Co., Ltd.
000421.SZ.summary: Nanjing Public Utilities Development Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the passenger transportation business in China. The company owns approximately 2,363 taxi vehicles. It offers passenger taxi, electric taxi, highway passenger transportation, and tourist-chartered passenger transportation services; and operates gas pipelines. The company also engages in the sale of automobiles; car purchasing, licensing, repair, insurance, display, entertainment, maintenance, and parts supply activities; construction, real estate development, commercial housing sale, and leasing activities; and power generation business. In addition, it engages in outbound tourism, inbound tourism, domestic tourism, airline ticketing, business travel exhibition, and e-commerce businesses. Further, the company provides small loans and financial services for agriculture, rural areas, small and medium-sized enterprises, and self-employed individuals; and driving school training, and other services. The company was formerly known as Nanjing Zhongbei (Group) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nanjing Public Utilities Development Co., Ltd. in June 2016. Nanjing Public Utilities Development Co., Ltd. is based in Nanjing, China.

000425.SZ.summary: XCMG Construction Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sale of construction machinery in China. It provides subsurface excavation bogies, bridge construction equipment, dredgers, and drills; hoisting, road, concrete, pilling, firefighting, sanitation, mining, trenchless, boring, and other construction machineries; and loaders, excavators, heavy-duty and forklift trucks, and aerial working equipment. The company also exports its products. The company has a strategic cooperation agreement with Cummins Inc. to develop digital and networked technologies and applications. XCMG Construction Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Xuzhou, China.

000429.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Provincial Expressway Development Co., Ltd.
000429.SZ.summary: Guangdong Provincial Expressway Development Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, develops, constructs, and operates expressways and bridges in the People's Republic of China. The company is also involved in the toll collection, management, and maintenance of the Guangfo Expressway, the Fokai Expressway, and the Jingzhu Expressway Guangzhu section; motor transportation and warehousing operations; and the provision of car rescue, maintenance, and cleaning, as well as spare parts supply services. In addition, it invests in technical industries; and offers related consulting services. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Fokai Expressway Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Provincial Expressway Development Co., Ltd. in June 1993. Guangdong Provincial Expressway Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China. Guangdong Provincial Expressway Development Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guangdong Communication Group Co., Ltd.

000507.SZ.summary: Zhuhai Port Co.,Ltd. engages in port logistics, energy, and infrastructure construction businesses in China. It invests in and operates port terminals, as well as engages in the provision of ship transportation and other businesses. The company also provides traditional freight, warehousing, bonded VMI, trade logistics, supply chain finance, and other logistics value-added services, as well as shipping, freight forwarding, tally, tugboat, customs declaration, and other port and shipping support services. In addition, it invests in, operates, and services clean energy sources, such as coal-fired power generation, wind power generation, and natural gas power generation projects; and constructs, operates, and maintains city pipeline gas. Further, the company develops port city projects, as well as provides property management and other services. Additionally, it provides financing leasing, supply chain finance, insurance brokerage, and industrial development funds for shipping, cargo owners, and other enterprises. The company was formerly known as Fuhua Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhuhai Port Co.,Ltd. in September 2010. Zhuhai Port Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Zhuhai, China.

000509.SZ.summary: Huasu Holdings Co.,Ltd manufactures and distributes construction materials in China. The company is also involved in garment processing business. Its products include profiles, doors, and windows, as well as clothing products. Huasu Holdings Co.,Ltd is based in Chengdu, China.

000528.SZ.summary: Guangxi Liugong Machinery Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells construction machinery. The company offers excavators, wheel loaders, skid steer loaders, backhoe loaders, dozers, motor graders, rollers, pavers, cold planers, cranes, mining trucks, crushers, drilling rigs, diaphragm wall rigs, trench cutters, and material handling equipment, as well as parts and maintenance services. It serves agriculture, demolition, forestry, general construction, landscaping, material handling, mining, oil and gas, port, quarry and aggregate, road construction, and utility industries. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Liuzhou, China.

000530.SZ.long_name: Bingshan Refrigeration & Heat Transfer Technologies Co., Ltd.
000530.SZ.summary: Bingshan Refrigeration & Heat Transfer Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, sale, installation, and maintenance of industrial and commercial refrigeration and air-conditioning equipment in China. It also engages in refrigerated and frozen food storage business; and the provision of after-sales, maintenance, warranty, and other services. The company was formerly known as Dalian Refrigeration Company Limited and changed its name to Bingshan Refrigeration & Heat Transfer Technologies Co., Ltd. in December 2019. The company was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in Dalian, China.

000533.SZ.summary: Guangdong Shunna Electric Co., Ltd. provides power transmission and distribution equipment in China. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Foshan, China.

000541.SZ.summary: Foshan Electrical and Lighting Co., Ltd., designs, manufactures, and markets lighting products and electrical equipment in the People's Republic of China and internationally. Its products primarily include LED light sources and luminaries, automotive LED luminaries, traditional lighting products, and switches and sockets, as well as LED indoor and outdoor lighting products, electrical tapes, and switch panels. Foshan Electrical and Lighting Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Foshan, the People's Republic of China.

000546.SZ.summary: Jinyuan EP Co., Ltd. engages in the cement, concrete, and environmental businesses. It offers cement and ready-mixed concrete; and cement kiln co-disposal of hazardous solid waste, as well as rare metals recycling services. The company was formerly known as Jinyuan Cement Co., Ltd. Jinyuan EP Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

000551.SZ.summary: Create Technology & Science Co.,Ltd., an investment holding company, primarily researches, develops, produces, and sells high voltage insulators, and clean environmental protection equipment and engineering products in China and internationally. It offers purification equipment, power transmission and transformation high voltage porcelain insulators, precision bearings, surveying and mapping instruments, and abrasives. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Suzhou, China.

000557.SZ.summary: Ningxia Ningdong Railway Co., Ltd. offers railway construction services. It offers railway development, construction, and management, warehousing and logistics, electrical and vehicle maintenance, hotel management, hotel, accommodation, catering, and entertainment services. Ningxia Ningdong Railway Co., Ltd. is based in Yinchuan, China.

000561.SZ.summary: Shaanxi Fenghuo Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the development and production of military communications equipment and electroacoustic products in China. Its products include tactical wireless communication, search and rescue and positioning, audio integrated management, electroacoustic and noise control, and Internet of things communication systems; satellite communication navigation equipment; communication navigation antennas; semiconductor lighting; and photovoltaic silicon and electromechanical products. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Baoji, China.

000570.SZ.summary: Changchai Company, Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells small and medium-sized single cylinder and multi-cylinder diesel engines under the Changchai brand in the People's Republic of China. Its diesel engines are used in tractors, combine harvesters, light commercial vehicles, agriculture equipment, small-sized construction machinery, generating sets, ship machines, etc. The company also provides diesel engine fittings and castings, gasoline engines, gasoline engine fittings, rotovators, walking tractors, molds, and jigs. In addition, it engages in the assembly and sale of diesel engine and gasoline engine supporting sets. Further, the company provides external investment and consulting services; and Real estate management services. The company exports its products. Changchai Company, Limited was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Changzhou, the People's Republic of China.

000571.SZ.summary: Sundiro Holding Co., Ltd. operates in the coal industry in China. The company is involved in coal mining; and manufacturing and sale of raw and lump coal products, as well as long flame coal for power generation, boiler, chemical, and civil uses. It also produces and sells motorcycles and export vehicles, as well as regular models, scooters, cub-type models, and electric bicycles. In addition, the company offers standard, basic, and advanced electric vehicles; coal chemical products; and proprietary, international freight forwarder, and cold-chain logistic services, as well as contract logistics services, including designing, packaging, VMI, transportation, and distribution services in various areas, such as vehicle parts, industrial cabinets, and electromechanical and electrical appliances. Further, it manufactures aircraft parts and yachts; and engages in the real estate project planning, investment, operating consultancy, and agency business, as well as provides tourism services. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

000576.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Ganhua Science and Industry Co., Ltd.
000576.SZ.summary: Guangdong Ganhua Science and Industry Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the trading of sugar in China. It is involved in the research and development, production, and sale of yeast products. The company offers yeast powder, yeast extract, edible yeast, saccharification enzymes, amylase, bio-pharmaceuticals, and yeast nutritional food products; and paper products. Its products are used in food, health care products, cosmetics, feed, chemicals, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Jiangmen Sugarcane Chemical Factory (Group) Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Guangdong Ganhua Science and Industry Co., Ltd. in November 2020. Guangdong Ganhua Science and Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Jiangmen, China.

000582.SZ.summary: Beibu Gulf Port Co., Ltd. engages in the operation and management of Guangxi Beibu Gulf Port in China. The company offers port handling, storage, and shipping port services, as well as engages in other business. Its cargo goods categories include container, coal, ore, grain, metallic ore, and others. The company was formerly known as Beibuwan port Co., ltd. Beibu Gulf Port Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Beihai, China.

000584.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Hagong Intelligent Robot Co., Ltd. engages in the intelligent manufacturing business in the People's Republic of China. The company offers intelligent logistics systems, such as logistics sorting, robotic warehousing, automated high-rise warehouse, and warehouse management systems; automobile automatic production lines; robotic application platform; and artificial intelligence solutions for building of data centers, research in sensing technology, machine vision, synergistic robots, and intelligent security protection. It also develops real estate projects; sells, repairs, and maintains technological application of robots and peripheral equipment; and designs, manufactures, installs, and debugs assembly line for autocar-body-in-white (BIW) welding. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Youli Investment Holding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Hagong Intelligent Robot Co., Ltd. in August 2017. Jiangsu Hagong Intelligent Robot Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

000595.SZ.summary: Baota Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells bearings primarily in China. The company offers deep groove ball, cylindrical roller, spherical and needle roller, angular contact ball, tapered roller, thrust ball and roller, and spherical plain bearings. Its products are used in various industries, including rail transit, military, precision motors, petroleum machinery, metallurgy machinery, heavy truck, construction machinery, mining machinery, cement machinery, hydraulic engineering, etc. The company also exports its products to approximately 50 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Xibei Bearing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Baota Industry Co., Ltd. in June 2015. Baota Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is based in Yinchuan, China.

000619.SZ.long_name: Wuhu Conch Profiles and Science Co.,Ltd
000619.SZ.summary: Wuhu Conch Profiles and Science Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical building materials in China. It provides plastic door and window profiles, fence profiles, and co-extrusion profiles, as well as Russian style, French style, and MC color profiles for various buildings; and sheets, doors and windows, fences, pipes, etc; and after sales service. The company also exports its products to the United Kingdom, Poland, Germany, Singapore, Russia, Kazakhstan, and internationally. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Wuhu, China.

000620.SZ.summary: Macrolink Culturaltainment Development Co., Ltd. develops real estate properties in China, South Korea, Malaysia, Australia and Canada. The company develops residences, business, office buildings, hotels, and urban complexes. It is also involved in the cultural tourism, finance, real estate, commerce, hospitality, construction, property, entertainment, architectural design, landscaping, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Macrolink Real Estate Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Macrolink Culturaltainment Development Co., Ltd. in August 2016. Macrolink Culturaltainment Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China. Macrolink Culturaltainment Development Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Macrolink Holding Co., Ltd.

000633.SZ.summary: Xinjiang Hejin Holding Co., Ltd. produces and sells nickel-based alloy materials in China. The company offers K-500, 718, R405, corrosion-resistant materials and welding materials, electrical vacuum materials, electrical resistance heating alloy materials, spark plug electrodes materials, temperature measurement materials, nickel and nickel alloy wires for electrodes and wires, pump shaft-2, pump shaft-1, pump shaft-3, and spline bushing. The company was formerly known as Shenyang Hejin Holding Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xinjiang Hejin Holding Co., Ltd. in October 2017. Xinjiang Hejin Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Hetian, China.

000652.SZ.summary: Tianjin TEDA Co., Ltd. engages in the ecological and environmental protection, regional development, energy trade, and equity investment businesses in China. It is involved in the development and utilization of renewable energy, such as municipal solid waste incineration power generation, sanitary landfill, and biomass power generation; and the provision of services for the treatment of domestic waste, as well as utilization of waste heat from incineration of waste to generate electricity. The company also engages in the land consolidation, construction, and development of residential, commercial complex, and security housing and other projects. In addition, it trades in refined oil; petrochemical products, such as gasoline, diesel, fuel oil, aromatic hydrocarbons, naphtha, and lubricants; and non-ferrous metals, including aluminum ingots, zinc ingots, electrolysis commodities, and copper, as well as manages the storage and services of non-ferrous metals and petroleum and petrochemical products. Further, the company is involved in equity investments. Tianjin Teda Co., Ltd. is based in Tianjin, China.

000666.SZ.summary: Jingwei Textile Machinery Company Limited produces and sells textile machinery and related parts in China. The company offers cotton spinning, weaving, warp knitting, twisting, printing and dyeing, and chemical fiber machinery. It also engages in the financial trust and equity investment businesses. Jingwei Textile Machinery Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is based in Beijing, China.

000677.SZ.summary: CHTC Helon Co., Ltd. produces and sells viscose fiber products in China, Southeast Asia, Europe, the Middle East, South America, and internationally. The company offers phase change viscose fibers; Chinese health regenerated cellulose fibers; no dyed fibers; new modal fibers under the Newdal name; Ace Ventura Lun, a protein fiber wool; purcell hemp fiber under the Jutecell name; and An Fu tournament fiber under the Anti-fcell name. It also provides TCF, hollow, alginate, and health fibers. The company was formerly known as Shandong Helon Co., Ltd and changed its name to CHTC Helon Co., Ltd. in September 2013. The company is based in Weifang, China. CHTC Helon Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Hengtian Fiber Group Co., Ltd.

000680.SZ.summary: Shantui Construction Machinery Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells engine products and components of earth moving, pavement construction and compaction, building, hoisting, and other construction machinery products in China and internationally. The company offers bulldozers, excavators, road machinery, wheel loaders, and concrete machinery, as well as fire vehicles, aerial platform vehicles, and cranes. It also provides construction machinery spare parts comprising chassis parts, drive parts, structural parts, casting parts, and hydraulic oil cylinders; and after-sales and technical services. Shantui Construction Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Jining, China.

000687.SZ.summary: Huaxun Fangzhou Co., Ltd. provides military communication and other products. It offers multidimensional ad hoc network communication systems; multi-band, multi-caliber, and multi-purpose satellite communication antennas and BUC products; and simulation system products. In addition, the company provides information security intelligent penetration systems, information security attack and defense confrontation platforms, and firewall products; and combat management, military training management, electronic sandbox, gun and ammunition management, yingmen integrated management, equipment support management, equipment maintenance management, army vehicle integrated control, valuable and confidential item management, logistics integrated management, military food management, material management, patrol management, camp energy management, and intelligent visitor management systems, as well as military barracks and camp district intelligent security platforms. Further, it offers unmanned aerial vehicles; information security printing systems; optical waveguide products; radio monitoring systems, including wireless time difference positioning system, vehicle-mounted radio monitoring and direction finding system, portable radio monitoring equipment, PCI/PXI interface rugged computing product, and intelligent radio monitoring system; and measurement and control systems comprising laser spot detection recorder, portable testing equipment, and multi-channel data acquisition system, as well as missile, aircraft, and other test equipment. The company was formerly known as Swan Fiber Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huaxun Fangzhou Co., Ltd. in October 2015. Huaxun Fangzhou Co., Ltd. is based in Shenzhen, China.

000691.SZ.long_name: Hainan Yatai Industrial Development Co., Ltd.
000691.SZ.summary: Hainan Yatai Industrial Development Co., Ltd. develops and sells real estate properties. It markets its houses in Yongdeng County, Lanzhou City through online sales channels. The company was formerly known as Hainan United Oils & Technologies Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hainan Yatai Industrial Development Co., Ltd. in February 2010. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Lanzhou, China. As of March 31, 2009, Hainan Yatai Industrial Development Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Lanzhou Yatai Industry and Trade Group Co., Ltd.

000720.SZ.long_name: Shandong Xinneng Taishan Power Generation Co.,Ltd.
000720.SZ.summary: Shandong Xinneng Taishan Power Generation Co.,Ltd. engages in the generation of electricity in China. The company is based in Tai'an, China.

000738.SZ.summary: Aecc Aero-Engine Control Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, production, repair, and sale of aero-engine control systems and derivative products in China and internationally. The company also provides civil aviation control system precision parts for aviation companies. In addition, it offers non-aviation products, including power control systems, such as gas turbine, energy, and automotive automatic shift controls, as well as engineering and walking machinery, and other ancillary products. The company was formerly known as AVIC Aero-Engine Controls Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Aecc Aero-Engine Control Co.,Ltd. in April 2017. Aecc Aero-Engine Control Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

000755.SZ.summary: Shanxi Road & Bridge Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells organic chemical products primarily in the People's Republic of China. Its products include VAE and white emulsions; re-dispersible emulsion powders; sodium diacetate; gamma butyrolactone; poly tetra methylene glycol; tetrahydrofuran; 1,4-butanediol; polyvinyl alcohol; and binder, benzene, coke, and maleic anhydride products. The company serves textile, building and construction, wood process, pharmaceutical, food, tannery, paint coats, and agriculture industries. It also exports its products to approximately 100 countries worldwide. The company was formerly known as Shanxi Sanwei Group Co.,Ltd. Shanxi Road & Bridge Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Linfen, the People's Republic of China. Shanxi Road & Bridge Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Yangquan Coal Industry (Group) Co., Ltd.

000768.SZ.long_name: AVIC Xi'an Aircraft Industry Group Company Ltd.
000768.SZ.summary: AVIC Xi'an Aircraft Industry Group Company Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, sells, maintains, and services aircraft and machine products. It offers large and medium sized military and civilian aircraft; and aircraft landing gear and wheel brake systems. The company was formerly known as AVIC AIRCRAFT Co., Ltd. and as AVIC Xi'an Aircraft Industry Group Company Ltd. The company is based in Xi'an, China.

000777.SZ.long_name: CNNC SUFA Technology Industry Co., Ltd.
000777.SZ.summary: CNNC SUFA Technology Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of industrial valves in China and internationally. The company offers utility, ball, check, shut-off, gate, and nuclear valves. It provides its products under the H and SUFA brands for petroleum and gas, oil refining, nuclear power, electric power, metallurgy, chemical, shipbuilding, papermaking, and medicine industries. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Suzhou, China.

000812.SZ.long_name: Shaanxi Jinye Science Technology and Education Group Co.,Ltd
000812.SZ.summary: Shaanxi Jinye Science Technology and Education Group Co.,Ltd engages in the packaging and decorating printing businesses primarily in China. The company researches, designs, development, and produces cigarette labels, color packaging boxes, color prints, and other products; and cigarette gift boxes, wine labels, medicine and wine boxes, and other packaging and decorating printing products. In addition, it offers education and investment consulting, business management education, and cultural and educational exchange services; and online education, open classes, skills training, and other education and teaching services. Further, it operates Mingde College of Northwestern Polytechnical University, a full-time undergraduate college; and develops and operates real estate projects. Shaanxi Jinye Science Technology and Education Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1992 and is based in Xi'an, China.

000816.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Nonghua Intelligent Agriculture Technology Co.ltd
000816.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Nonghua Intelligent Agriculture Technology Co.ltd, a power equipment company, researches, develops, produces, and sells agricultural machinery. The company's agricultural machinery includes full feed harvesters, rice transplanters, and wheel tractors. It also provides single-cylinder diesel engines; multi-cylinder diesel engines, such as two, three, and four cylinder diesel engines; precision castings; and gasoline engine and multifunctional garden machineries, as well as various parts and components. In addition, the company offers forestry equipment comprising lawn mowers and washing machines; and pump units and generator sets. It sells its products to approximately 70 countries and regions worldwide. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Jianghuai Engine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Nonghua Intelligent Agriculture Technology Co.ltd in June 2015. The company is based in Yancheng, China.

000820.SZ.summary: Shenwu Energy Saving Co., Ltd. act as a technical proposal supplier and engineering contractor in the energy conservation, environmental protection, and utilization of resources. It engages in the treatment and recovery of solid wastes and dust in the steel industry; and smelting slags from the non-ferrous industry. The company is based in Nanjing, China.

000837.SZ.long_name: Qinchuan Machine Tool & Tool Group Share Co., Ltd.
000837.SZ.summary: Qinchuan Machine Tool & Tool Group Share Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells precision CNC machine tools and cutting tools in China. The company offers CNC machine tools, such as lathes, grinding machines, machining centers, specialty machines, and plastics machinery; and components and precision parts comprising gear parts and gearboxes, hydraulics parts and systems, iron castings, and meters and gauges. It also provides tooling and fixtures, including gear cutting tools, broaching cutters, special cutting tools, special milling cutters, measuring gauges, and thread cutters; and measuring equipment, which include gear measuring machines, and camshaft and crankshaft measuring machines. The company was founded in 1965 and is based in Baoji, China.

000856.SZ.long_name: Tangshan Jidong Equipment Engineering Co., Ltd.
000856.SZ.summary: Tangshan Jidong Equipment Engineering Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides mining, sand aggregates, electrical, metallurgical, and building materials equipment in China and internationally. It is also involved in cement production lines ranging from the process design, equipment design and manufacturing, construction and installation, and production and commissioning to spare parts supply, maintenance services, and production and operation activities. The company is based in Tangshan, China.

000860.SZ.summary: Beijing Shunxin Agriculture Co.,Ltd primarily engages in the brewing and sale of liquor products under the Niulan Mountain and Ningcheng brands. It is also involved in breeding pigs and hogs under the Xiaodian brand; slaughtering and processing meat products; and real estate development. In addition, it offers fresh and cooked food products under the Pengcheng brand. Beijing Shunxin Agriculture Co.,Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.

000881.SZ.long_name: CGN Nuclear Technology Development Co., Ltd.
000881.SZ.summary: CGN Nuclear Technology Development Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of modified cable polymer materials, engineering plastic products, and electron accelerators in China. Its products are used in nuclear power, new energy, rail transit, aerospace, automobile, construction, optical communication, and electronics industries, as well as offshore equipment. The company also exports its products. In addition, it offers irradiation processing services; and engages in ocean shipping, property, project contracting, pelagic fishery, and international trading businesses. The company was formerly known as China Dalian International Cooperation (Group) Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to CGN Nuclear Technology Development Co., Ltd. in February 2017. CGN Nuclear Technology Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenzhen, China. CGN Nuclear Technology Development Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of CGN (Beijing) Nuclear Technology Application Co., Ltd.

000900.SZ.summary: Xiandai Investment Co.,Ltd invests in and operates roads, tunnels, bridges, and ferries in China. It is also involved in investing, operating, and developing real estate; investing, operating, and managing hotels; construction, charging collection, and maintenance of expressways; provision of vehicle cleaning and parking services affiliated to expressways; and sale of auto parts, road-constructing machinery, building materials, and other metal materials. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Changsha, China.

000903.SZ.summary: Kunming Yunnei Power Co.,Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells diesel, nature gas, and duel fuel engines in China. The company offers nanometer ceramic thermal insulation films for automobiles and buildings; float glass products; and deep processing products, as well as various oils, such as heavy duty gear and diesel engine oil, and antifreezing solutions. It also provides remanufactured engines, generator sets, casting parts, and agricultural machineries, including rotary and hay loaders; and frame and compartment assemblies for mini, light, and medium-sized trucks. In addition, the company offers buses with gas and hybrid fuel power. Its diesel engines have applications in forklift trucks, harvesters, loaders, tractors, generator sets, stationary power equipment, etc. The company exports its products to Europe, South America, Africa, and Southeast Asia. Kunming Yunnei Power Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Kunming, China.

000905.SZ.summary: Xiamen Port Development Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides bulk cargo terminal loading and unloading, and integrated logistics services in China. The company also offers shipping agency, bulk cargo handling, L/E consolidation, tally notarization, warehousing, transportation, sea-rail transportation, and land port services, as well as trades in building materials, chemical raw materials and products, mineral products, machinery and equipment, hardware and electronics, textiles, clothing and daily necessities, agricultural and livestock products, stationery, sporting goods and equipment, arts and crafts, etc. In addition, it is involved in the tugboat business; production and sale of concrete and additives; and trading of commodity activities. The company was formerly known as Xiamen Road and Bridge Corporation and changed its name to Xiamen Port Development Co., Ltd. in November 2004. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Xiamen, China. Xiamen Port Development Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Xiamen International Port Co., Ltd.

000906.SZ.summary: Zheshang Development Group Co., Ltd. engages in the commodity, financial leasing, online retailing, car sale and after service, logistics service, and energy technology businesses in China and internationally. It trades in screw-thread steel products, wire stocks, round steel products, hot rolled strips and coils, cold rolled products, I-beams, angle and groove bars, and steel feed and iron ore products; and provides value-added services, including wholesale and retail distribution, custom processing, warehouse delivery, financial services, e-commerce, etc., as well as upstream and downstream supply chain services. The company also offers finance leasing, commercial factoring, and industrial bond and supply chain financing services; and industry management software products and services, customized development services for information management software products, software-as-a-service, and information technology management consulting services. In addition, it provides supply chain integrated service, CRM, power sales management, financial leasing, car free carrier, unified enterprise mobile interconnected, enterprise integration, centralized purchasing management, logistics warehouse management, and cross-border e-commerce platforms, as well as commercial platform for commodities and data analysis platform for steel trade industry. Further, the company sells and services cars and commercial vehicles of various brands through its 4S shops; and operates a used car dealer shop. Additionally, it is involved in the sale of electricity and taxi business. The company operates approximately 20 standard 4S shops. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Materials Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zheshang Development Group Co., Ltd. in January 2017. Zheshang Development Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

000920.SZ.summary: South Huiton Co., Ltd. manufactures reverse osmosis membrane elements in China. Its reverse osmosis membrane elements are used in desalting of seawater, brackish water, boiler water replenishment, wastewater treatment, germ-free drinking water, etc. The company also offers lithium cells for use in various portable mobile electronic equipment; and central air-conditioning energy saving software and water purifies. In addition, it manufactures, overhauls, and repairs railway wagons; spare parts for locomotives and rolling stocks; and researches, develops, and produces elastic palm fiber materials, etc. for use in home mattresses, cushions, hotels, hospitals, schools, passenger vehicles, etc. South Huiton Co., Ltd. is based in Guiyang, China.

000922.SZ.long_name: Harbin Electric Corporation Jiamusi Electric Machine CO.,Ltd
000922.SZ.summary: Harbin Electric Corporation Jiamusi Electric Machine CO.,Ltd manufactures and sells electric motors in the People's Republic of China. The company offers wind turbines, shielding products, and nuclear power products, as well as equipment. It also exports its products to 48 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Acheng Relay Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Harbin Electric Corporation Jiamusi Electric Machine CO.,Ltd in September 2012. The company is based in Jiamusi, the People's Republic of China.

000923.SZ.summary: HBIS Resources Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells a range of bulldozers in China. It also offers wheel loaders, rollers, excavators, pipe layers, etc. The company also exports its products to approximately 90 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as XuanHua Construction Machinery Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to HBIS Resources Co., Ltd. in December 2019. HBIS Resources Co., Ltd. was founded in 1950 and is based in Zhangjiakou, China.

000928.SZ.summary: Sinosteel Engineering & Technology Co., Ltd., through its subsidiary, Sinosteel Equipment & Engineering Co., Ltd., focuses on the industrial engineering and service, municipal engineering and investment, energy saving and environment protection, and high-tech businesses. The company is involved in the development, processing, and utilization of ferrous, nonferrous, and nonmetallic mining resources; and construction and operation of coal-fired, gas-fired, hydropower, wind power solar power, waste incineration, biomass, power grid projects. It also produces clean energy, and reduces environmental pollution in coal chemical industry; and offers metallurgical equipment and spare parts, as well as undertakes projects for steel producers. In addition, the company is involved in the public infrastructure and environmental protection facility projects, including road, bridge, municipal sewage, and solid waste treatment; urban rail transit; and carbon trading and management activities. Further, it engages in the 3D printing, integrating manufacturing, equipment research and development, and technical, as well as metal parts restore and remanufacturing, and industrial intelligent system activities. The company was formerly known as Sinosteel Jilin Carbon Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sinosteel Engineering & Technology Co., Ltd. in September 2014. The company was founded in 1952 and is based in Beijing, China. Sinosteel Engineering & Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Sinosteel Corporation.

000951.SZ.summary: Sinotruk Jinan Truck Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells heavy-duty trucks, special vehicles, heavy-duty special vehicle chassis, passenger car chassis, and auto parts in China and internationally. The company was formerly known as CNHTC Jinan Truck Co., Ltd. Sinotruk Jinan Truck Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Jinan, China. Sinotruk Jinan Truck Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Sinotruck (Hong Kong) Limited.

000967.SZ.long_name: Infore Environment Technology Group Co., Ltd.
000967.SZ.summary: Infore Environment Technology Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells sanitation machines and environmental protection equipment in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company provides various sanitation equipment, such as sweeping vehicles, cleaning vehicles, garbage trucks, municipal vehicles, snow removal vehicles, intelligent equipment, refuse transfer stations, and new energy equipment; and environmental fans, including nuclear power fans, industrial environmental fans, civil engineering fans, and subway fans. It also offers environmental monitoring products comprising water quality, atmospheric, and hydrological monitoring products. In addition, the company provides environmental services, including sanitation integration services, such as township road sweeping, waste collection and transportation, and sanitation information management services; solid waste management; smart environmental management; atmospheric governance; soil remediation; and water environment treatment services. Further, it designs and develops smart environmental protection systems. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Shangfeng Industrial Holdings Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Infore Environment Technology Group Co., Ltd. in January 2016. Infore Environment Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Beijiao, the People's Republic of China.

000976.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Huatie Tongda High-speed Railway Equipment Corporation
000976.SZ.summary: Guangdong Huatie Tongda High-speed Railway Equipment Corporation researches, designs, develops, manufactures, sells, and services high-speed rail parts in the People's Republic of China. The company offers braking, fire alarm, backup power, air conditioning, door, hook, and water supply sanitation systems; sanding devices; brakes and brake discs; and road maintenance machinery. It offers its products for the urban rail transit, locomotive field, railway wagon field, high-speed railway, and EMU field applications. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Kaiping Chunhui Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Huatie Tongda High-speed Railway Equipment Corporation in October 2017. Guangdong Huatie Tongda High-speed Railway Equipment Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

000988.SZ.summary: Huagong Tech Company Limited manufactures and sells laser equipment, optical communication devices, laser holographic anti-counterfeiting products, and sensors and information tracing in China and internationally. The company offers proton diagnosis and treatment equipment; and laser smart equipment, such as laser cutting systems, laser welding systems, laser marking products, laser texturing equipment, laser heat treatment systems, laser drilling machines, lasers and various supporting devices, laser processing equipment and plasma cutting equipment, etc. It also provides Laser holographic anti-counterfeiting products, including positioning / non-positioning laser bronzing film, universal version of laser bronzing film, laser anti-counterfeiting packaging materials and integrated encryption anti-counterfeiting mark, holographic two-dimensional code, positioning transfer paper, etc. In addition, the company offers sensor products, such as NTC and PTC series thermistors, and automotive electronics to provide multi-dimensional sensing and control solutions; and optical communication products, such as source optical devices, passive optical devices, intelligent terminals, optical components, etc. Additionally, it provides cloud computing, intelligent manufacturing service platform, license industry anti-counterfeiting, energy industry laser processing, aerospace application, 3C industry laser processing, and automotive industry application solutions. Its products are used in consumer electronics, mechanical manufacturing, communication networks, automobile, aviation, iron and steel metallurgy, shipbuilding and national military defense. Huagong Tech Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is based in Wuhan, China.

000996.SZ.summary: China CIFCO Investment Co., Ltd. provides future, logistics, and automobile services in China. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

002006.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Jinggong Science & Technology Co., Ltd
002006.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Jinggong Science & Technology Co., Ltd manufactures and sells solar photovoltaic equipment, carbon fiber composite materials and equipment, new building energy-saving equipment, textile equipment, and robot intelligence equipment. The company provides photovoltaic equipment, including polysilicon ingot furnaces and squarer's, and multi-wire slicing machines. It also offers building machinery comprising PU/mineral wool/PIR sandwich panel lines, double-deck high speed roll forming machines, fence board production lines, digital control folders, sandwich composite production lines, floor deck forming machines, high speed tile forming machines, roll forming machines, down pipe forming and curving pipe machines, purlin forming machines, and changeable automatic purlin forming machines. In addition, the company provides corrugated Web H-beam automatic welding lines, steel bar truss production lines, beam welding lines, box-shape column/beam welding lines, digital control drillers, section material benders, and shot blasting machines; and press curving machines, automatic seamers, slitting machines, filming covering and cutting machines, edge knurling machines, stacker cranes, and uncoilers. Further, it offers textile equipment, such as nylon machines, fancy and fiber twisters, rotor spinning machines, loose/tight winders, axial winders, spandex covered yarn machines, and metallic yarn covering machines; silver and air coated wires; and rubber coated wire lines. Additionally, the company provides precision processing and manufacturing machines for raw material preparation, material baiting, welding, machining, inspection, preassembly, and packaging and transport; and other high-tech products. Zhejiang Jinggong Science & Technology Co., Ltd is based in Shaoxing, China.

002008.SZ.long_name: Han's Laser Technology Industry Group Co., Ltd.
002008.SZ.summary: Han's Laser Technology Industry Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of laser processing equipment in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers laser engraving/marking/etching, laser welding, laser cutting, sub-surface engraving, laser display, 3D printers, automation, inspection, CNC, and industrial robot machines. Its products are primarily used in the electronics and semiconductor, mechanical hardware, PCB industry, new energy, packaging industry, sheet metal, auto industry, and other applications. The company also provides machine installation and after sales services. The company was formerly known as Han's Laser Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Han's Laser Technology Industry Group Co., Ltd. in November 2014. Han's Laser Technology Industry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

002009.SZ.summary: Miracle Automation Engineering Co.,Ltd provides intelligent equipment solutions and services in China and internationally. The company is involved in the research and development of equipment logistics equipment. It also offers waste automobile recycling and dismantling, crushing and sorting resource utilization, and automobile dismantling equipment, as well as trades automobile recycling parts through e-commerce; manufacturing equipment for automotive, new energy, and machinery industries; and intelligent equipment logistics and system equipment for automobile manufacturing, airport logistics, commercial distribution, and others. In addition, the company provides large-scale wind turbine components, diesel engine parts, and gas turbine parts; and professional logistics solutions and turnkey project services. Further, it is involved in the design, construction, system integration, procurement, and consulting of photovoltaic power stations. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Miracle Logistics System Engineering Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Miracle Automation Engineering Co., Ltd. in April 2013. Miracle Automation Engineering Co.,Ltd was founded in 1984 and is based in Wuxi, China.

002013.SZ.summary: AVIC Electromechanical Systems Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aviation products in the People's Republic of China. The company provides power, liquid energy, gas energy, and second power systems; equipment and personnel security subsystems; and special application task systems. It offers its products in aviation electromechanical, car carrier, refrigeration and medical device, and electric power equipment industries. The company was formerly known as Hubei Aviation Precision Machinery Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to AVIC Electromechanical Systems Co., Ltd. in February 2014. AVIC Electromechanical Systems Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, China.

002021.SZ.summary: Zoje Resources Investment Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial sewing machines primarily in China. It offers lockstitch, overlock, interlock, pattern, heavy, and special series machines. The company was formerly known as Zoje Sewing Machine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zoje Resources Investment Co., Ltd. in November 2014. Zoje Resources Investment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Taizhou, China.

002023.SZ.summary: Sichuan Haite High-tech Co., Ltd. provides aircraft airborne equipment maintenance services in China. It is also involved in aviation technology research and development, aviation product manufacturing, aviation training, aviation material maintenance, microelectronics, gas turbine engineering, and leasing activities. The company was founded in 1991 is based in Chengdu, China.

002026.SZ.summary: Shandong Weida Machinery Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells drill chucks primarily in China. The company offers various types of drill chuks, including performance drill chucks, hand drill chucks, locking drill chucks, wrench drill chucks, self-tightening chucks, and trimming wheels and accessories; and saw blades. It also provides precision castings for power tools accessories, machining products, auto parts, hardware and tools, instrumentation valves, other foundry products, and die-casting products. In addition, the company offers powder metallurgy parts comprising structure parts, garden tools, electrical tools, bench drills, and oil bearing parts, as well as parts for use in small gasoline engine, appliances, and automotive applications. Further, it provides AC and DC switches; portable power supply products; and CNC machines. The company offers its products under the Peacock, Jiyi Machine, and DEMAC brands. Shandong Weida Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is based in Wendeng, China.

002028.SZ.summary: Sieyuan Electric Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, sells, and services power transmission and distribution equipment in China and internationally. The company offers relay protection equipment and monitoring system for substations; circuit breakers and disconnectors; power capacitors; current and voltage transformers; and grounding devices, reactors, dynamic reactive power compensation products, active filtering devices, DGA and online monitoring systems, etc. Sieyuan Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.

002034.SZ.summary: Wangneng Environment Co., Ltd. provides solid waste solutions in China. It invests in, constructs, and operates waste incineration power generation plant, solid waste, kitchen waste and sludge treatment, and other environmental industry projects. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Mizuda printing&dyeing group co.,Ltd and changed its name to Wangneng Environment Co., Ltd. in January 2018. Wangneng Environment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Huzhou, China.

002046.SZ.summary: Sinomach Precision Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells special bearings and relevant parts in China. The company offers petroleum machinery, precision, slewing, wind turbine, special precision, automotive, hydrodynamic, one-way, spherical roller, standard ball, and taper roller bearing products, as well as bearings for rolling mills and rail transportation. It also provides spindles; precision bearing instruments that include bearing parts measuring instruments, finished bearing measuring instruments, air-floating and dense-ball spindles, induction heaters, and degaussing equipment; bearing testing machines; and bearing manufacturing machines. In addition, the company offers bearing relevant materials, such as ZYS bearing steel products, ceramic balls and carbide balls, steel ball products, cemented carbide cutting tool tips, bearing antirust lubricating oil and grease products, and bearing cage materials. Further, it provides abrasion-resistant materials that comprise overall abrasion-resistant alloy replacement parts and duplex metal composite guide products. The company's products are used in various industries, such as aviation, spaceflight, vessel, weapon, mining, metallurgy, wind turbine generator, machine tool, machinery, medical treatment, automobile, rail transport, etc. The company was formerly known as Luoyang Bearing Science & Technology Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Sinomach Precision Industry Co., Ltd. in December 2020. Sinomach Precision Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Luoyang, China.

002047.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Bauing Construction Holding Group Co., Ltd.
002047.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Bauing Construction Holding Group Co., Ltd. engages in the construction and integrated building decoration engineering businesses in China. The company undertakes decoration engineering, curtain wall and steel structure engineering, integrated intelligent engineering, fire protection engineering in building design, mechanical and electrical installation engineering, security technology engineering, metal window and door installation, exhibition engineering, and medical equipment engineering works. It serves real estate clients, government agencies, large-scale enterprises, multinational corporations, upscale hotels, and other clients. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002050.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Sanhua Intelligent Controls Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, manufacture, sale, and service of HVAC&R controls and components in China and internationally. The company offers refrigeration control components, automotive air conditioning, thermal management system components, coffee machine, dishwasher parts, etc. Its product includes valve, four-way reversing valve, electronic expansion valve, solenoid valve, controller, micro channel heat exchanger, home appliance heat pump control system part, pump, heating pipe, and water softening system and divider, as well as electronic water and oil pump, electronic water valve, water cooling plate, thermostatic valve, thermal expansion valve, liquid receiver, automatic air conditioner controller, etc. The company's products are used in household and commercial air conditioners, food chain retailers, and heat management and pump systems. Zhejiang Sanhua Intelligent Controls Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

002051.SZ.summary: China CAMC Engineering Co., Ltd. engages in engineering, procurement, and construction projects business in Asia, Africa, the United States, and Eastern Europe. It undertakes industrial, agricultural, water engineering, power, communications, petrochemical, mining, and other projects, as well as invests in various projects. The company is also involved in trading agricultural products and materials, steel products, pulps, chemicals, machinery and equipment, etc. China CAMC Engineering Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China. China CAMC Engineering Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China National Machinery Industry Corporation.

002058.SZ.summary: Shanghai Welltech Automation Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial automation instruments and meters in China. The company's industrial automation instruments and meters products consists pressure transmitters; home flowmeters that include ele flowmeters, vortex flowmeters, ele water meters, and ele heat meters; temperature measuring instruments; control valves; and electric actuators. It also provides system integration products; and thermal mass flowmeters, metal rotor flow meters, turbine flow meters, ultrasonic flow meters, throttling devices, ultrasonic liquids, and magnetic products. Shanghai Welltech Automation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shanghai, China.

002060.SZ.long_name: Guangdong No.2 Hydropower Engineering Company, Ltd.
002060.SZ.summary: Guangdong No.2 Hydropower Engineering Company, Ltd. engages in infrastructure construction businesses in China. It also invests in and constructs hydropower, wind power, and photovoltaic power stations. The company is based in Guangzhou, China.

002062.SZ.summary: Hongrun Construction Group Co., Ltd. engages in construction business primarily in China. It engages in rail, road, and bridge, as well as housing construction activities. The company is also involved in real estate development, infrastructure investment and construction, and solar energy businesses. In addition, it invests in building materials. Hongrun Construction Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shanghai, China.

002073.SZ.summary: Mesnac Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and innovates information equipment and software application for rubber industry in China and internationally. The company offers mixing solutions; mixer feeding systems; chemical weighing system; rubber grinding and blending system; volumetric metering system; open mill automatic mixing system; open mill; integrated exhaust gas control solution; inner-liner production line; pin type cold feed extruder; small angle, textile cord ply, and ply cutting line; application production line; and tire profile extrusion line. It also provides tire building machine; hydraulic cutting presses for TBR, OTR, and PCR; and PCR, TBR, and OTR molds, as well as produces tire recycling products. In addition, the company offers tire X-ray inspection machines; tire uniformity and dynamic balance testing line; tire uniformity testing machine; testing solutions; tire plant automated logistics system solutions; X-ray automated assistant inspection software; RFID tire whole solution; RFID based process management and control system of tire production; JIT production MES systems; warehouse management systems; energy management system; industrial equipment configuration software platform; industry big data service mobile application; and tire retreading. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Qingdao, China.

002074.SZ.summary: Gotion High-Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and operation of lithium-ion batteries and materials in China and internationally. The company also offers power transmission and transformation equipment. Its principal products include LFP and NCM materials and batteries, battery packs, BMS, and energy storage battery packs. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hefei, China.

002081.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Gold Mantis Construction Decoration Co., Ltd.
002081.SZ.summary: Suzhou Gold Mantis Construction Decoration Co., Ltd., engages in the design and construction of interior decoration, curtain walls, furniture, FF and E, and landscape in China. The company is involved in the design and construction of curtain walls, as well as landscape for parks, commercial plaza, commercial pedestrian street, public buildings, residential communities, factory premises, etc. It also provides research, development, engineering design, processing and manufacturing, construction and installation, and consultancy services for curtain walls; and designs and constructs intelligent building systems. In addition, the company is involved in the creation of an integral space environment and special effect for hotels, museums, clubhouses, and office spaces, etc.; provision of decoration and interior design services; and system integration activities. Suzhou Gold Mantis Construction Decoration Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

002097.SZ.summary: Sunward Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells construction and engineering machineries worldwide. The company offers excavators, including mini, small, medium, and large excavators; rotary drilling rigs, multi-function rigs with dual power head, and hydraulic static pile drivers; and down-the-hole drills, cutting drill rigs, full hydraulic open-pit drills, hydraulic rock drills, augered pile rigs, and full hydraulic driving drills. It also provides telescopic crawler cranes and rough terrain wheel cranes; wheeled and crawler skid steer loaders; and military and aviation equipment. The company was formerly known as Hunan Sunward Intelligent Machinery Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sunward Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd. in 2011. Sunward Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

002102.SZ.summary: Guanfu Holding Co., Ltd. provides plastic raw material procurement services through e-commerce platform in China. The company also engages in the research and development, production, and sale of pharmaceutical raw materials and animal nutrition. In addition, the company is involved in the real estate leasing and gold mining activities. It serves 80,000 users. The company was formerly known as Fujian Guanfu Modern Household Wares Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guanfu Holding Co., Ltd. in August 2016. Guanfu Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Quanzhou, China.

002103.SZ.summary: Guangbo Group Stock Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, engages in the development, production, import, and sale of office stationery, printing paper products, and plastic products in China. It offers products, such as books, photo albums, color printing and packaging products, office supplies, and gifts, as well as logistic services. The company also exports its products to Europe, America, Southeast Asia, and other countries and regions. Guangbo Group Stock Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Ningbo, China.

002111.SZ.summary: Weihai Guangtai Airport Equipment Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells ground support equipment and fire-fighting equipment in China and internationally. The ground support equipment segment offers aircraft service, ground handling, air cargo, runway maintenance, aircraft refueling, and passenger cabin service to airline companies, airports, aircraft manufacturing companies, and flight test institutes. The fire-fighting equipment segment provides fire-fighting vehicles, aerial platform, aerial ladder, water tanker, and emergency rescue products; and automatic fire alarm system, large space fire monitor system, electrical fire monitoring system, intelligent emergency lighting and evacuation indicating system, special detectors, and S-type aerosol. It also offers special vehicle and industrial drone; and after-sale services. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Weihai, China.

002116.SZ.summary: China Haisum Engineering Co., Ltd. provides general contracting and project management services. It provides engineering design services in various fields comprising civil building, pulp and paper making, beverage/brew, food/dairy/sugar, tobacco/cigarette, grain, oil, fruit, vegetable/meat processing/frozen and fresh, cosmetics/essence and perfume, plastic product/sensitive material, chemical and chemical fiber/daily-use chemical/biological/pharmaceutical, household electrical appliance, packaging/printing, electron product and electrical equipment, new building material, machinery manufacture/domestic machinery, and automobile parts and accessories/metal processing fields, as well as to store and logistics/hypermarkets, research and development centers, public utilities, and other projects. The company also offers engineering project consultation services in various fields, such as pulp and paper making, food industry, household electrical appliances, household chemical industry, biology fermentation, oleochemicals, automobile components, thermal power engineering, civil buildings, and environment protection engineering. In addition, it provides engineering supervision services for civil and industrial buildings, as well as public utilities. China Haisum Engineering Co., Ltd. operates in Asia, Europe, Africa, the Americas, Oceania, etc. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

002117.SZ.summary: Tungkong Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides printing media services in the People's Republic of China. The company designs and prints bills and forms, including anti-counterfeiting forms and negotiable instruments for government, banking, insurance, finance, taxation, post, telecommunications, transportation, and civil affairs sectors; produces e-invoice, e-documents, and lottery products, as well as smart cards for financial, social security, health care, transportation, commercial retail, insurance, and other sectors; and offers color printing services. It also provides data processing services and office paper products; and prints RFID products, including tickets, paper (film) cards, PVC cards, electronic tickets, electric labels, library labels, logistics labels, clothing tags, aviation luggage receipts, CD labels, anti-counterfeiting wine labels, intercity train tickets, etc. In addition, the company prints anti-counterfeiting labels, smart labels, aviation labels, digital printing labels, and normal labels. Tungkong Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jinan, the People's Republic of China.

002120.SZ.summary: Yunda Holding Co., Ltd. provides integrated logistics services in China. It offers express delivery, franchise, and other services. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Xinhai Electric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yunda Holding Co., Ltd. in January 2017. Yunda Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Shanghai, China.

002122.SZ.summary: Tianma Bearing Group Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells bearings in China. The company offers deep groove and angular contact ball bearings; cylindrical, double-row spherical, thrust spherical, and tapered roller bearings; rolling mill and petroleum machinery bearings; and railway, aircraft, wind power slewing, and nonstandard bearings. Its products are used in the aerospace, military, railway, commercial vehicle, industry, marine, machine tool, metallurgical mill, motor, agriculture, etc. The company's products are also exported in Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Huzhou, China.

002130.SZ.summary: ShenZhen Woer Heat-Shrinkable Material Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of heat-shrinkable materials in China. The company offers heat shrinkable sleeves, busbar, and cable accessories; cold shrink cable accessories; cable branch boxes; ring network cabinets; high and low voltage switchgear; and WQFB fully insulated closed busbar, as well as high temperature silicone products, such as high temperature resistant PTFE casing, conductor connecting tubes, heat shrinkable composite double wall tubes, silicone rubber tubes, PTFE casing, civil non-slip pattern tubes, halogen-free environmental protection PE cross-linked wires, etc. It also provides dual and single wall products, separable connectors mated products, accessories, busbar connection systems, inner cone plug-in products, cables, wires, chargers, connectors, and other products. The company serves electronics, power, metallurgy, petrochemical, automotive, high-speed rail, coal mine, and aerospace sectors. It also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Southeast Asia, and internationally. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002135.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Southeast Space Frame Co., Ltd.
002135.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Southeast Space Frame Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and installs steel structures worldwide. It provides long-span space truss structures and spaces; mesh net shell structures; multi-layer, high-rise, and super high-rise heavy steel structure; light steel structures; metal roof systems; and steel structure residential products. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Southeast Space Frame Group Co., Ltd. Zhejiang Southeast Space Frame Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

002141.SZ.summary: Infund Holding Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells fine and special enameled wires for electronic information, automobile, household appliance, and defense technology industries primarily in China, Southeast Asia, and Europe.
