002559.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Yawei Machine Tool Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells metal forming machine tools in China and internationally. Its products include smart and automatic products, such as CNC turret punching machines, CNC press brakes, CNC laser cutting machines, flexible cells and systems, automatic coil lines, and linear and horizontal multi-joint robots. The company also offers sheet metal processing machine-tools; laser processing equipment; and coil line equipment. It serves sheet metal, electric, elevator and escalator, and curtain wall industries. Jiangsu Yawei Machine Tool Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is based in Yangzhou, China.

002564.SZ.summary: SuZhou THVOW Technology. Co. ,Ltd engages in the research and development and application of clean energy and environmental protection technologies in China and internationally. The company offers equipment, such as coal chemical, petrochemical, fine chemical, metallurgy, and nuclear power equipment; marine and military equipment; and renewable and clean energy equipment. It also provides thermal, solar, and biomass power generation services; and EPC engineering consulting services, as well as constructs power projects. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Tianwo Science and Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to SuZhou THVOW Technology. Co. ,Ltd in March 2015. SuZhou THVOW Technology. Co. ,Ltd is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

002576.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Tongda Power Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells stators and rotors, and laminations for motors and generators primarily in China. The company offers stators and rotors for wind power generators; HV and LV, and other special-sized motors; generator products; laminations and cores; and electromotor lamination stator dies, precise compound dies, single punching dies, aluminum rotor die-casting molds, and machine parts and components of precision dies and automatic lines. Jiangsu Tongda Power Technology Co.,Ltd. is based in Tongzhou, China.

002580.SZ.long_name: Shandong Sacred Sun Power Sources Co., Ltd.
002580.SZ.summary: Shandong Sacred Sun Power Sources Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and distributes reserve power and motive power batteries worldwide. Its reserve power batteries are used in the telecom and utility industries, uninterruptible power supplies, and various applications requiring stored energy solutions, including solar and wind renewable energy; and motive power batteries are used in electric forklifts and other commercial electric powered vehicles. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Qufu, China.

002586.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Reclaim Construction Group Co., Ltd.
002586.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Reclaim Construction Group Co., Ltd. engages in the seawall construction business in China. It undertakes water conservancy, hydro power project construction, port and waterway engineering, housing construction, municipal general construction, and blasting and dismantling professional contract services. The company is based in Ningbo, China.

002592.SZ.summary: Nanning Baling Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of copper and aluminum tube-fin heat exchanger products in Mainland China. It offers aluminum and copper cooling tubes, zigzag fins, single and double corrugated fins, and out-road fins; and passenger car air heater blowers, passenger car and bus intercoolers, and heavy duty truck intercoolers. The company also provides bus radiators, computer CPU radiators, aluminum and copper passenger car radiators, engineering machine radiators, and aluminum and copper heavy duty truck radiators; and passenger car and bus cooling modules. Its products are used in automobile, engineering machinery, defense equipment, and computer fields. The company also exports its products primarily to the United States and Australia. Nanning Baling Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Nanning, China.

002595.SZ.long_name: Himile Mechanical Science and Technology (Shandong) Co., Ltd
002595.SZ.summary: Himile Mechanical Science and Technology (Shandong) Co., Ltd manufactures and sells tire molds in China and internationally. It also offers gas turbine casings, castings, and rubber machinery. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Gaomi, China. Himile Mechanical Science and Technology (Shandong) Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of Himile Group Co.,Ltd.

002598.SZ.summary: Shandong Zhangqiu Blower Co., Ltd manufactures and sells various blowers. Its principal products include root and turbo blowers, centrifugal blowers and fans, slurry and industrial pumps, liquid ring vacuum pumps, mills, and pneumatic conveying equipment and systems. The company exports its products to approximately 70 countries, including the European Union and North America. It offers blowers to its distributors, OEMs, and end users. Shandong Zhangqiu Blower Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Shandong Zhangqiu Blower Factory Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Jinan, China.

002599.SZ.summary: Beijing Shengtong Printing Co., Ltd. provides integrated printing services for full-color publication activities in China. The company primarily prints color magazines, luxury metropolitan newspapers, commercial promotional materials, hardcover books, and other printing products. It also supplies printed materials, as well as offers packaging printing services. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, China.

002606.SZ.summary: Dalian Insulator Group Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, production, and sale of electrical porcelain and composite insulators, station post insulators, and porcelain hardware fittings in China. The company offers long rod suspension composite, disc suspension porcelain, ground wire, composite post and hollow, and ceramic hollow and post insulators. It also exports its products to approximately 40 countries. The company was founded in 1915 and is based in Dalian, the People's Republic of China.

002613.SZ.summary: Luoyang Northglass Technology Co.,Ltd designs, develops, and manufactures glass deep processing equipment in China. The company's deep processing equipment comprise glass tempering furnaces, low-e coating machines, glass automation systems, glass cutting machines, glass storage systems, buffer systems, vertical glass seaming machines, and vertical washing machines. It also offers deep processed glass products, such as toughened, laminated, curved, insulating, printed, and coated glass products; and HVLS and general fans. The company also exports its products to approximately 80 countries, such as the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, France, Japan, Russia, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, etc. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Luoyang, China.

002617.SZ.summary: Roshow Technology Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the research, development, manufacture, sale of electromagnetic products in China. The company's principal products include composite enameled copper round wires, variable frequency enameled copper round wires, self-adhesive enameled copper round wires, corona enamelled copper round wires, enameled round aluminum wires, and various ultra-fine enameled wires. Its products are used in the home appliance, electric power, telecommunication, electronic, medical equipment, automobile, wind power generation, power supply equipment, and aerospace fields. The company also offers motors. In addition, it invests in, designs, constructs, operates, services, and distributes photovoltaic power plants. The company also exports its products to the United States, Brazil, Japan, Italy, Mexico, and Slovakia. Roshow Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is based in Zhuji, China.

002620.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Ruihe Construction Decoration Co., Ltd.
002620.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Ruihe Construction Decoration Co., Ltd. operates as a construction and decoration company in China. The company is involved in the design and construction of architectural decorations and curtain walls, as well as solar photovoltaic power generation and construction installation activities; and provision of electromechanical engineering, fire protection, landscape, and intelligent technology services. It undertakes public infrastructure, hotel and club, finance and securities, business entertainment, transportation facilities, business office, and exhibit and theater projects. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Ruihe Decoration Engineering Co., Ltd. Shenzhen Ruihe Construction Decoration Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002621.SZ.long_name: Dalian My Gym Education Technology Co., Ltd.
002621.SZ.summary: Dalian My Gym Education Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells corrugated pipe production equipment in Southeast Asia, the Middle East, Africa, Europe, and the United States. The company offers plastic machinery products, such as HDPE/PP double wall and high-speed corrugated, solid, PE, PVC, and HDPE corrugated pipe extrusion lines, as well as belling machines, perforators, and extruder series machinery. It also provides general machinery products. The company was formerly known as Dalian Sunlight Machinery Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Dalian My Gym Education Technology Co., Ltd. In April 2019. The company is based in Dalian, China.

002622.SZ.summary: Rongyu Group Co., Ltd. engages in electrical equipment, credit information big data, commercial bank and factoring, financing leasing, and other businesses in China. The company offers electrical equipment products, such as electronic control complete sets, permanent magnet low and high voltage switch products, and electronic energy meters, as well as highway part facility, automatic control system integration, and protection services. It also provides credit services, including credit management and rating system services; and digital retail management solutions consisting of channel collaborative retail management and large data operations management services, as well as product development services for online and offline enterprises. In addition, the company offers banking services comprising corporate and personal finance, small microfinance, financial market, and international business services; business factoring services, which include advance payment under warranty, factoring under credit protection, leasing factoring, re-factoring, and other services; and financial leasing services, such as direct, after-sale, entrusted, leveraged, and joint leasing services. Further, it provides insurance brokerage services primarily student and family insurance. The company was formerly known as Jilin Yongda Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Rongyu Group Co., Ltd. in November 2016. Rongyu Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Jilin City, China.

002627.SZ.long_name: Hubei Yichang Transportation Group Co., Ltd.
002627.SZ.summary: Hubei Yichang Transportation Group Co., Ltd. provides road passenger transportation services in China. The company offers intercity bus passenger transportation, as well as tourism services. It is also involved in the vehicles and spare parts sale, and after-sales service business; and provision of logistics services, such as warehousing, loading and unloading, and freight transportation services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Yichang, China.

002633.SZ.summary: Shenke Slide Bearing Corporation manufactures and sells bearings for use in AC and DC motors, generators, turbines, fans, pumps, compressors, and other rotating machines in China. The company offers hydro, thermal, nuclear, wind, and other mechanical products, as well as plain bearing. It serves machinery, chemical, power, steel, water conservancy, metallurgy, mining, cement, and other industries. The company also exports its products to Pakistan, Turkey, India, Japan, Australia, Bangladesh, Britain, and other countries. Shenke Slide Bearing Corporation was founded in 1996 and is based in Zhuji, China.

002638.SZ.summary: Dongguan Kingsun Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells LED lighting products worldwide. The company offers street lights, tunnel lights, wall packs, garden lights, bollards, parking lot lights, and solar lights for roads and areas; high bay and low bay lights, and canopy lights for industrial applications; and flood, projection, wallwash, in-ground, linear, and pixel lights for architectural applications. It also provides smart lights, bulbs, tubes, battens, downlights, panel lights, spotlights, ceiling lights, pendant lights, table lamps, floor lights, and wall lights for residential and commercial applications. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Dongguan, China.

002639.SZ.summary: Fujian Snowman Co., Ltd. engages in the research, production, and distribution of ice machines in China. The company's principal products include industrial chillers and concrete cooling systems, as well as flake, tube, block, and plate ice machines. It also offers slurry ice and quick frozen machines, compressors, cold storage panels, evaporative condensers, and air coolers. The company provides its products for use in food processing and storage; man-made ski slopes; and cooling applications in construction, supermarkets, ocean fishing, nuclear projects, chemical and medical industries, etc. It offers its products under the SNOWKEY brand name. The company was formerly known as Change City Snowman Refrigeration Equipment Co., Ltd. Fujian Snowman Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

002641.SZ.summary: Yonggao Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells plastic valve and fitting in China. The company offers hot products, including PVC pressure pipes and fittings, couplings, true union ball valves, butterfly valves, compact ball valves, sockets, elbows, rain gutters, male thread TEE, two-faucet reducing joint 2, and glue for water supply products. It also provides CPVC valves, plastic valves and fittings, CPVC pressure pipes and fittings, PVC gutters and fittings, PP-R pipes and fittings for cold hot water, PP compression fittings, PVC pressure pipes and fittings, PVC pipes and fittings for drainage, PVC DWV fittings, PVC thread fittings, PVC-U insulating electrical pipes and fittings, saddles, pressure fittings with gasket, and glue. The company also exports its products to approximately 146 countries. Yonggao Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Taizhou, China.

002645.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Huahong Technology Stock Co., Ltd.
002645.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Huahong Technology Stock Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells processing equipment for recycling resources in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company primarily offers scrap metal balers, shears, scrap metal shredders, waste automobile dismantling equipment, non-metal balers, and compressors, as well as household garbage products. Its products are applied to the national circular economy parks, national urban renewable resource bases, steel and nonferrous metal enterprises, waste steel processing centers, and household garbage processing centers. Jiangsu Huahong Technology Stock Co., Ltd. is based in Jiangyin, the People's Republic of China.

002651.SZ.summary: Chengdu Leejun Industrial Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and services material grinding and separation systems in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers roller presses and separators for use in the cement raw material, clinker grinding, metallurgical mining, and other fields. It also provides technical services; and spare parts for a range of products and auxiliary equipment. Chengdu Leejun Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

002663.SZ.summary: Pubang Landscape Architecture Co., Ltd engages in the landscape planning and design, seedling plantation, landscape architectural, garden conservation, and environmental protection businesses primarily in China. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

002665.SZ.summary: Shouhang High-Tech Energy Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and erection of air cooling system of power plant in China. The company offers direct air cooling condensers, evaporators, waste water zero emission systems, solar power tower systems, parabolic trough systems, and dish solar thermal power system. It also engages in waste heat generation, and waste heat heating and hot water activities. The company was formerly known as Beijing Shouhang Resources Saving Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Shouhang High-Tech Energy Co., Ltd. in December 2019. Shouhang High-Tech Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002667.SZ.long_name: Anshan Heavy Duty Mining Machinery Co., Ltd.
002667.SZ.summary: Anshan Heavy Duty Mining Machinery Co., Ltd. operates in the vibrating screen industry in China and internationally. The company manufactures and sells vibrating screens and feeders, crushers, asphalt and stabilized soil mixing plants, crushing and screening systems, garbage sorting and disposal systems, construction industrialization systems, and dry tailing systems, as well as equipment for manufacturing precast concrete components. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Anshan, China.

002671.SZ.summary: Shandong Longquan Pipeline Engineering Co.,LTD produces and sells prestressed concrete cylinder pipes in China. The company also offers reinforced concrete pipes, jacking construction method of steel tube concrete pipes, armored joint prestressed concrete cylinder pipes, ballastless track plates, precast concrete lining segments, ductile iron pipes, steel wire skeleton plastic composite pipes and fittings, drainage steel reinforced polyethylene spiral bellows, and high density polyethylene pipes. In addition, it provides fittings, such as elbow and stone accessories, steel conversion members, steel repair parts, and tee accessories. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Zibo, China.

002684.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Dynavolt Renewable Energy Technology Co., Ltd.
002684.SZ.summary: Guangdong Dynavolt Renewable Energy Technology Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells lead batteries and fittings, plastic products, and related products primarily in China. Its lead batteries comprise gel nanotechnology, sealed activated AGM, and factory activated maintenance free batteries; maintenance free batteries with acid packs; and high performance and conventional dry charge batteries. The company offers its products for motorcycles and vehicle starting, electric vehicles, back-up power, telecommunication and lightening, storage power, etc. It sells its products under the MENSHY, DYNAVOLT, etc. brands in approximately 90 countries. The company was formerly known as Dynavolt Renewable Power Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Dynavolt Renewable Energy Technology Co., Ltd. in June 2016. Guangdong Dynavolt Renewable Energy Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.

002685.SZ.long_name: Wuxi Huadong Heavy Machinery Co., Ltd.
002685.SZ.summary: Wuxi Huadong Heavy Machinery Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, markets, and installs container handling equipment in the People's Republic of China. The company offers ship-to-shore container cranes, rail-mounted container gantry cranes, rubber-tired container gantry cranes, general gantry cranes, portal cranes, and other cranes for use in the port container handling operations, railway container handling operations, container yard storage, trailer handling operations, forklift handling operations, etc. It also researches, develops, manufactures, markets, and services automated and intelligent precision processing equipment; and processes and trades in stainless steel products. Wuxi Huadong Heavy Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China.

002686.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Yilida Ventilator Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sales of central air conditioner and building fans in China and internationally. It offers industrial fans, energy-saving motorized fan systems, ventilations, and axial fans. The company also provides automobile charger, DC converter, and other products that are used in electric vehicles, forklifts, golf carts, solar power, wind and electric power communications, rail systems, and other industries, as well as lightweight components, such as automotive transmission housing, engine box, retarder housing, etc. In addition, it offers vessel and marine protective, function, and composite materials for military and civilian markets; testing and checking facilities; and support services. The company offers its products under the Yilida, Wolter, Fulihua, Maer, ESSENTEC, AMMT, TC Charger, and Sanjin brand names. Zhejiang Yilida Ventilator Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.

002689.SZ.long_name: Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co., Ltd.
002689.SZ.summary: Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, installs, and services elevators, escalators, and passenger conveyors in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers passenger, panoramic, bed, and freight elevators; and home and dumbwaiter lifts. The company was formerly known as ShenYang Brilliant Elevator Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co., Ltd. in December 2015. Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenyang, the People's Republic of China.

002690.SZ.summary: Hefei Meyer Optoelectronic Technology Inc. researches, develops, and sells optical sorting and X-ray inspection technologies. The company offers belt-type multi-function, chute multi-function, grain, herbs, mineral stone, nut, peanut, plastic infrared, pulses, rice, salt, seeds, sesame, spices, tea, vegetable, and wheat sorters. It also provides X-ray inspection machines for canned food, dehydrated vegetable, frozen food, meat, mushroom, seafood, shoes/clothes/bags, snacks, and tire inspection, as well as security inspection. In addition, the company offers double layer, pre-sale, helpdesk, onsite, warranty, spare parts, and training services. It primarily serves agricultural products processing, industrial inspection, and healthcare industries in approximately 100 countries. Hefei Meyer Optoelectronic Technology Inc. was founded in 1993 and is based in Hefei, China.

002691.SZ.summary: Jikai Equipment Manufacturing Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, distributes, and services underground mining machinery in China. The company provides specialized solutions in underground mining industry for tunneling, tunnel supporting, transportation, etc. Its products include transport machinery, such as heavy duty scraper conveyors, durable alloy whole founded AFC pans, man transporters, reducers for coal mine scraper conveyors, and diesel crawler carriers; and mining and tunneling machinery accessory tools, including road headers and shearers, as well as picks for use in coal shearers and road headers. The company also offers safety drill machines comprising deep hole hydraulic jumbos, hydraulic drilling rigs, hydraulic coal mine tunnel drilling machines, coal mine pneumatic deep hole drilling jumbos, pneumatic bracket drilling rigs and machines, and slurry pumps. In addition, it provides supporting equipment and tools consisting of pneumatic and hydraulic series products, hydraulic props, and tensioning and auxiliary equipment. Jikai Equipment Manufacturing Co., Ltd. is based in Shijiazhuang, China.

002698.SZ.summary: Harbin Boshi Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of automatic weighting, bagging, and palletizing equipment for powdery and granular materials industry in China. It also provides post-processing equipment for synthetic rubber and petrochemical industries; and operating robot equipment for submerged arc furnaces. The company also provides automatic truck-loading equipment and plant logistic solutions; and industrial waste acid regeneration process equipment. In addition, it sells spare parts; and offers equipment maintenance, repair, and overhaul services. The company was formerly known as Harbin BOSHI Automation Equipment Co., Ltd. Harbin Boshi Automation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Harbin, China.

002706.SZ.summary: Shanghai Liangxin Electrical Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and produces low-voltage electrical apparatus in China. The company offers frame breakers, molded case circuit breakers, dual power supply products, disconnectors, miniature circuit breakers, and electromagnetic circuit breakers. It also provides industrial products comprising contactors, contactor relays, switch capacitor contactors, starters, switches, thermal relays, and motor protection circuit breakers. It serves the energy, telecommunications, construction, electricity, industrial, and other industries. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

002717.SZ.summary: LingNan Eco&Culture-Tourism Co.,Ltd. engages in the ecological environment and garden construction, culture and tourism, and investment and operation activities in China. The company is involved in the landscape planning and design, ecological environment and garden construction, seedling cultivation and conservation, and research activities. It also engages in the cultural tourism and financial investment businesses. The company was formerly known as LingNan Landscape Co., Ltd. and changed its name to LingNan Eco&Culture-Tourism Co.,Ltd. in February 2018. LingNan Eco&Culture-Tourism Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.

002718.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Youpon Integrated Ceiling Co. Ltd.
002718.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Youpon Integrated Ceiling Co. Ltd. manufactures and sells integrated ceilings in China. It offers bathroom, living room, kitchen, bedroom, restaurant, and other ceilings. The company is based in Haiyan, China.

002722.SZ.summary: Geron Co.,Ltd researches, develops, manufactures, and sells textile carding equipment in China. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Nantong, China.

002730.SZ.summary: Dianguang Explosion-proof Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of explosion protection electrical appliances in China. It offers H.V. vacuum breakers and LED laneway lamps; mining explosion-proof cap lamps, vacuum feeder switches, vacuum electromagnetic starters, dry type transformers, and movable substations; and explosion protection power distribution boxes, maintenance power socket boxes, manipulators, and connection chambers. The company also provides explosion protection luminescent lighting, floodlight, metal halide lamp, and exit signal lighting products, as well as LED explosion-proof lighting products; and weatherproof distribution boxes and manipulators. It has applications in various sectors, including coal and non-coal mining, electric power, oil refineries, chemical and petrochemical plants, onshore and offshore plants, low temperatures, fuel depots, and fuel tanker loading/unloading areas. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Wenzhou, China. Dianguang Explosion-Proof Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Dianguang Technology Co.,Ltd.

002747.SZ.summary: Estun Automation Co., Ltd. primarily manufactures and sells controlling parts for intelligent equipment in China. The company offers CNC systems for shearing machines, press brakes, hydraulic presses, and cut-to-length lines; electro-hydraulic servo systems; and solutions for security press brakes. It also provides AC servo and motion control systems, including AC servo drives and motors, electro hydraulic servo pump systems, motion control products, and digital field buses; industrial robots comprising six axis articulated, four axis palletizing, mini, SCARA and DELTA, and linear axes robots; and smart manufacturing systems for automobile, household appliance, elevator, energy, and construction machinery industries. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Nanjing, China.

002755.SZ.summary: Beijing Aosaikang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, markets, and sells pharmaceuticals, fine chemicals, and health-care products in China. It offers proton pump inhibitor injections and oncology medicines, as well as APIs. The company provides its products in digestive, oncology, antibiotic, cardiovascular, and other areas. Beijing Aosaikang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Nanjing, China.

002757.SZ.summary: Nanxing Machinery Co., Ltd. produces and sells furniture machinery and equipment in China and internationally. The company offers CNC machining centers and boring machines, computer panel saws and sliding table saws, single and double sided edge banding machines, multi boring machines, projects and production lines, package lines, automatic loading and unloading machines, changer machines, roller conveyors, and other related equipment. It also provides hydraulic cold press machines, shapers and routers, and lifting tables. In addition, it offers after-sale services. The company's products are used in the panel furniture industry, as well as in the fields of wooden chips boards, including doors, customer-made furniture, kitchen cabinets, exhibition display units, boat decoration, and others. The company was formerly known as Nanxing Furniture Machinery & Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nanxing Machinery Co., Ltd. in June 2016. Nanxing Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Dongguan, China.

002760.SZ.long_name: Anhui Fengxing Wear Resistant Materials Co., Ltd.
002760.SZ.summary: Anhui Fengxing Wear Resistant Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and technical services of metal casting wear-resistant materials primarily in the People's Republic of China. It offers grinding mediums, resistant steel products, mill liners, resist materials, hammer crushers, counterattack crushers, jaw crushers, and cooling machines. The company provides its products under the phoenix brand. Its products are used in metallurgical mining, building materials, cement, thermal power, and magnetic materials industries, as well as grinding materials production. The company also exports its products to Australia, the Philippines, Japan, Indonesia, South Korea, the United States, and other countries and regions. Anhui Fengxing Wear Resistant Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Ningguo, the People's Republic of China.

002769.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Prolto Supply Chain Management Co.,Ltd.
002769.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Prolto Supply Chain Management Co.,Ltd. provides supply chain management solutions in China and internationally. The company offers supply chain design and optimization, procurement and distribution, inventory management, fund settlement, customs clearance and logistics, and information system and other support services. It is also involved in the provision of payment services; and medical equipment and financial leasing activities. In addition, the company operates B2B service platform in line with customer needs in ICT field; offers import supply chain management, export logistics, and import and export trade services, as well as supply chain financial products; and supplies cosmetics and beauty make-up products. It sells its products through e-commerce platforms, as well as through its own stores on the platform. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002774.SZ.summary: IFE Elevators Co.,LTD. engages in the research and development, design, production, installation, and after-sales service of elevators and escalators for residential, commercial, and public applications worldwide. It offers passenger, home, high-speed, panoramic, hospital, freight, and car elevators; and escalators/moving walks. The company was formerly known as Dongguan IFE Elevators Co., Ltd. and changed its name to IFE Elevators Co.,LTD. in 2011. IFE Elevators Co.,LTD. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.

002775.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Wenke Landscape Co., Ltd. engages in planning and designing landscape architectures in China. It operates through Design and R&D, Landscape and Engineering, Eco-Environment, PPP Investment, and Cultural Tourism divisions. The company is involved in the research and development of ecological technology and sponge city; and tourism planning and design. It also engages in the garden landscape projects, municipal public works, and landscape architecture projects; and water environment management, human settlements remediation, and soil pollution remediation activities. In addition, the company invests and finances PPP projects; and invests, constructs, and operates Flower Expo parks. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002779.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Zhongjian Technology Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells outdoor power garden machinery primarily in China. Its products include petrol chain saws, grass trimmers and brush cutters, lawn tractors, petrol hedge trimmers, blowers, generators, and Li-ion series products. The company was formerly known as Yongkang Zhongjian Tools Manufacture Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Zhongjian Technology Co., Ltd in December 2010. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Yongkang, China. Zhejiang Zhongjian Technology Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Zhongjian Electromechanical Group Co., Ltd.

002781.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Qixin Group Co., Ltd. provides architectural decoration design and construction services in China and internationally. It undertakes building decoration, building curtain wall, construction mechanical and electrical installation, fire facilities engineering, and electronics and intelligent engineering work projects. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Qixin Construction Group Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Shenzhen Qixin Group Co., Ltd. in July 2019. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002782.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Click Technology Co., Ltd. designs, produces, sells, and services LED lighting power supplies, power battery chargers, communication power supplies, adapters, magnetic components, electric car chargers, charging piles, inverters, and others in the People's Republic of China. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Australia, South America, and other Asian countries and regions. Shenzhen Click Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

002785.SZ.summary: Xiamen Wanli Stone Stock Co.,Ltd manufactures, imports, exports, and sells stone and related products in China, Japan, South Korea, the United States, the European Union, South Africa, Algeria, and Singapore. It offers slab, cut-to-size, countertop, vanity top, window sill, wall cladding, special shaped stone, garden and landscaping stone, sculpture, monument, tile, quartz, and slate products. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

002786.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Silver Basis Technology Co., Ltd.
002786.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Silver Basis Technology Co., Ltd. provides precision molds in China and internationally. It offers automatic tooling and equipment, including automotive tooling, gauge and gripper, and installation equipment; auto parts comprising exterior parts, interior trims, function pieces, and security systems; and plastic structural parts, hardware structures, and precision molds. The company also provides BHRT hot runner products, such as needle valve type hot runner control systems and hot runner assemblies; and B + ODM/OEM products, as well as industrial design works. Shenzhen Silver Basis Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002789.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Jianyi Decoration Group Co., Ltd.
002789.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Jianyi Decoration Group Co., Ltd., a professional design agency, engages in the architectural design planning, interior design, and decorative engineering design activities. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002790.SZ.long_name: Xiamen R&T Plumbing Technology Co., Ltd.
002790.SZ.summary: Xiamen R&T Plumbing Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells toilets and sanitary ware worldwide. Its products include toilet tank fittings, toilet seats, concealed cisterns, wall hung tanks, PP seat covers, urea seat covers, fill valves, flush valves, and intelligent items. Xiamen R&T Plumbing Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Xiamen, China.

002791.SZ.summary: Guangdong KinLong Hardware Products Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and marketing of fittings for architectural hardware in China. The company offers anchor channel and tunnel, arm bracket, hanging bracket, and anti-seismic supporting systems; galfan tension cables, high-strength tension rods, and alloy casting products; window operating systems; and door controls, mechanical locks, smart locks, hotel locks, bathroom fittings, and post railing systems. It also provides point-fixed glass wall fittings, and anchor and stone cladding bolt products; and U-PVC groove door and window accessories, aluminum and home decoration doors, window hardware products, and sealing system products. In addition, the company offers safety shoes, belts, and helmets; protective gloves, respirators, and masks; jackets; reflective vests; work packages; masking film, foam, paper, wrapping film, PE, and masking tapes; explosion-proof, street, buried, underwater, working spot, and solar lights; fence tubes; spotlights; explosion-proof floodlights; electric sweeper cars; and driving and hand push type washing machines. Further, it provides forklifts and aerial platform products; and aluminum work platform products, as well as telescopic standing, telescopic, aluminum folding, aluminum folding extension, aluminum extension, riveting extension, aluminum warehouse platform, and aluminum hinge and single ladders. Additionally, the company offers consulting services to the architectural industry. It also exports its products to approximately 100 countries. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Dongguan, China.

002795.SZ.long_name: Yorhe Fluid Intelligent Control Co., Ltd.
002795.SZ.summary: Yorhe Fluid Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells brass ball valves. The company offers ball valves for gas and water, ball valves with drain-offs, filter and check valves, boiler valves and brass fittings, angle valves, thermostatic mixing valves, British valves, bibcocks, and safety valves. It also provides PEX, press, compression, three way, bronze, and gas ball valves; tank less water heater valves; pump isolation valves; radiator valves and thermostatic valves; bathroom products; and basin waste products. Yorhe Fluid Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Taizhou, China.

002796.SZ.summary: Suzhou Shijia Science & Technology Inc. offers elevator system products, metal plate systems, and electrical assembly products. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

002798.SZ.summary: D&O Home Collection Co.,LTD produces and sells sanitary ware products to China and internationally. It provides a range of products, including bathroom cabinets, toilets, bathtubs, showers, showers, faucets, etc., as well as suites, shower rooms, hardware, and other commercial products. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Monarch Sanitary Ware Co., Ltd. D&O Home Collection Co.,LTD was founded in 1994 and is based in Jianyang, China.

002800.SZ.long_name: Xinjiang Tianshun Supply Chain Co., Ltd.
002800.SZ.summary: Xinjiang Tianshun Supply Chain Co., Ltd. provides supply chain logistic services in China and internationally. The company engages in bulk cargo and bulk cargo third-party logistics business; and the provision of supply chain management, logistics park management, and logistics financial supervision and other services, as well as supply chain design, supply chain process management, warehousing, procurement, and distribution services. Xinjiang Tianshun Supply Chain Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in rmqi, China.

002801.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Weiguang Electronic Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells various fan motors primarily in China. Its products include electronically commutated and controlling motors, external rotor motors, shaded pole motors, terminal motors, plug motors, capacitance motors, and cross flow motors. The company also offers axial fans, centrifugal fans, fan blades, grids, rings, and brackets, as well as air flow products. Hangzhou Weiguang Electronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002816.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen HEKEDA Precision Cleaning Equipment Co., Ltd.
002816.SZ.summary: Shenzhen HEKEDA Precision Cleaning Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of LCD glass cleaning machines, ultrasound cleaning machines, plating equipment, and industrial water purifying equipment in China. The company offers flat panel cleaning equipment, ITO and TFT glass cleaning machines, touch panel cleaning machines, LCD glass cleaning machines, thin film solar cell cleaning machines, crystalline silicon solar equipment, auto glass cleaning machines, ultrasonic cleaning equipment, surface treatment equipment, water treatment equipment, and machine components and services, as well as precision cleaning equipment. It also provides pre-sales consulting and post-sales services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen HEKEDA Liquid Crystal Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen HEKEDA Precision Cleaning Equipment Co., Ltd. in December 2012. Shenzhen HEKEDA Precision Cleaning Equipment Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002822.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Zhongzhuang Construction Group Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, provides decoration services in China. It offers architectural decoration services for office spaces, hotels, public venues, rail transit projects, residential projects, commercial centers, and other projects. The company also engages in the landscaping business; construction of municipal housing projects; and provision of consulting design, installation and debugging, and operation training system solutions for grid-connected photovoltaic power plants, and hybrid and independent photovoltaic power plants. In addition, it engages in managing properties, such as offices, residential properties, shopping malls, hotels, apartments, and factories. Shenzhen Zhongzhuang Construction Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1994 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002823.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Kaizhong Precision Technology Co., Ltd.
002823.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Kaizhong Precision Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of various commutators, slip rings, and connectors in China and internationally. The company offers elastic parts, automotive lightweight parts, precise tools, intelligent equipment, and multi-layer insulated wires, as well as busbars. Its products are used in various applications, including automotive, household appliances, power tools, office automation, aviation and aerospace, intelligent home furnishings, and medical instruments. The company is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002830.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Mingdiao Decoration Co., Ltd. provides professional and integrated decoration services for large and medium-sized apartment and luxury residential customers in China. The company offers design, engineering construction, material purchase, furniture customization, soft furnishing, and after-sales services. Shenzhen Mingdiao Decoration Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002833.SZ.summary: Guangzhou KDT Machinery Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells machinery in China and internationally. It offers banding machine, sawing, CNC drilling, machining, and multi-row drill series of products. The company is based in Guangzhou, China.

002837.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Envicool Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells temperature control solutions and products in China. It offers AC and DC powered air conditioners, heat exchangers, and combo air conditioner for outdoor cabinets; and telecom site cooling solutions, including free cooling, split AC air conditioners, and split DC air conditioners. The company also provides industrial air conditioners, fans-and-filters, air/water heat exchangers, thermostats/hygrostats, heaters, oil coolers, and water coolers; transport cooling solutions; data center cooling solutions; door/wall mounted units; and floor standing units. Shenzhen Envicool Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002843.SZ.summary: Bichamp Cutting Technology (Hunan) Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells bandsaw blades in China. Its products are used in alloy steel, bearing steel, die steel, stainless steel, abrasive tool steel, titanium alloys, aerospace alloys, and non-ferrous applications. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Changsha, China.

002845.SZ.summary: Shenzhen TXD Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, development, production, and sale of liquid crystal display module products for private enterprises. It offers TFT liquid crystal display modules, touch display integrated modules, camera modules, AMOLED, full screen, and other products that are used in mobile phones, tablet computers, digital cameras, Medical equipment display, instrumentation, vehicle display, and other fields. The company sells its products in China, Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan. Shenzhen TXD Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002849.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Viewshine Intelligent Meter Co.,Ltd develops and supplies smart metering technology and solutions for gas and water customers worldwide. The company offers basic and smart ultrasonic water meters; ultrasonic-residential, ultrasonic-C&I, and mechanical-residential gas meters; Enhanced Metering and Billing Cloud, a modularization-design software; and gateways, repeaters, and HHU devices. Its solutions include AMI, a solution that provides various options of communication, smart meters, and structures for residential, commercial, and industrial applications; Walk-by solution, which consists of wireless smart meter, HHU, converter, and management software; and Prepayment solutions. Zhejiang Viewshine Intelligent Meter Co.,Ltd is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

002851.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Megmeet Electrical Co., LTD engages in the research and development, production, sales, and services of hardware, software, and system solutions for electrical automation in China. The company offers industrial power supply products, including telecommunication and IT system high-efficiency power supply, medical device power supply, industrial microwave power and control system, electric power supply, and customized industrial power supply; and industrial automation products comprising motor drive, programmable logic controller, and industrial digital smart welding machine. It also provides smart home appliances consisting of display power supply, smart sanitary ware, household microwave power and control system, HVAC and smart cooling controller, and other products; and new energy vehicle products, such as charging station rectifier module, PDU, on-board charger, electric vehicle DC/DC module, motor control unit, and other products. In addition, the company offers newly developed industries products comprising photovoltaic converter, industrial microwave system, smart electric shock controller, electric submersible progressing cavity pumping system, optical fiber flexible bend sensor, and e-cigarette. Its products are used in medical, communications, IT, electricity, transportation, photovoltaic, oil field, police equipment, industrial welding machine, industrial microwave, frequency conversion air conditioning, frequency conversion microwave, laptop display, outdoor color screen, intelligent bathroom, and other industries. The company also operates in approximately 40 countries, including European countries, the United States, India, Brazil, South Korea, Japan, and internationally. Shenzhen Megmeet Electrical Co., LTD was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002855.SZ.summary: Dongguan Chitwing Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision structural parts and molds in China. Its products are used in mobile phones, tablet computers, wearable products, and medical equipment components. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China. Dongguan Chitwing Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Chit Wing Technology Group Company Limited.

002856.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Magic Design & Decoration Engineering Co., Ltd.
002856.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Magic Design & Decoration Engineering Co., Ltd. operates in the architectural decoration industry in China. It operates as a contractor for electronic engineering, building intelligent engineering construction, engineering design, laboratory system, fire-fighting device, mechatronics, building curtain wall, building decoration, and landscaping works. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002860.SZ.long_name: Hangzhou Star Shuaier Electric Appliance Co., Ltd.
002860.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Star Shuaier Electric Appliance Co., Ltd. designs, researches, develops, produces, and markets overload protectors for compressors and starters in China and internationally. The Company was founded in 1997 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002869.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Genvict Technologies Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides equipment and solutions for intelligent transportation in China and internationally. It offers system integrator services for intelligent transportation and the Internet of vehicles; and highway intelligent transportation, urban intelligent transportation, public security traffic management, and V2X solutions. The company's products include ETC intelligent terminal and microwave roadside units, OBU classic and issue terminals, and IC card readers and writers; lane controllers and vehicle identification RSUs for urban parking; radio frequency identification (RFID) readers and writers, read-and-write antennas, and lane controllers, as well as ceramic RFID tags; and roadside and on board units, and communication modules. It serves government, operators, and end users. Shenzhen Genvict Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002871.SZ.summary: Qingdao Weflo Valve Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells valve and fire hydrant products for the fire protection, waterworks, HVAC, and industrial markets worldwide. It offers fire protection, check, gate, pressure and air relief, ball, flap, pressure reducing, plug, plunger, globe, butterfly, balancing, and foot valves, as well as strainers, backflow prevention devices, and rubber expansion joints. The company is based in Qingdao, China.

002876.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Sunnypol Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of LCD polarizers in China. It offers polarizers for LCDs and 3D glasses, protective films for FPD, and brightness enhancement polarizers. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002882.SZ.summary: Jinlongyu Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of wires and cables in China. The company offers low smoke halogen free, low smoke halogen free flame retardant, fire resistant low smoke halogen, fire resistant, flame retardant, and aluminum alloy wires and cables, as well as waterproof, anti-ant, branch cables, etc. It also provides PVC insulated and sheathed power cables; and XLPE insulated power cables. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002883.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Zhongshe Group Co., Ltd. operates as an engineering consulting company in China. It offers planning, design, consultation, supervision, inspection, surveying, testing, project management, bidding, engineering general contracting, and other services in the fields of transportation, municipal administration, construction, and environment. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

002884.SZ.summary: Guangdong Lingxiao Pump Industry Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells small household and industry support electric pumps primarily in China. The company offers stainless steel, fitness and entertainment, submersible, cast iron, and pipeline pumps, as well as IEC motors. Its products are used for reverse osmosis water treatment, central air conditioning, frequency conversion constant pressure water supply, machine tool, massage bath crock, spa, domestic pool integration, mariculture, fountain, sewage treatment, irrigation, ornamental fish pond, solar hot water circulation, household water pressurization, agricultural cultivation water supply, pressurized water heater, fan, air compressor, and woodworking machinery applications. The company also exports its products to approximately 100 countries or regions worldwide. Guangdong Lingxiao Pump Industry Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Yangchun, China.

002887.SZ.long_name: Tianjin LVYIN Landscape and Ecology Construction Co., Ltd
002887.SZ.summary: Tianjin LVYIN Landscape and Ecology Construction Co., Ltd engages in ecological restoration and landscaping construction business in China. The company offers construction services for ecological restoration works, municipal gardens, and real estate landscape projects; landscape engineering service; saline and alkali restoration, soil and water conservation, and water environment management; and landscape design, technology research, and development services. It also engages in the production of seedlings. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Tianjin, China.

002889.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Easttop Supply Chain Management Co., Ltd.
002889.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Easttop Supply Chain Management Co., Ltd. provides integrated supply chain services. It offers import and export agent, declaration, customs consulting, bonded transport, domestic distribution, and warehousing services; and multimodal transport services comprising sea, air, road, and rail transport. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002890.SZ.long_name: Shandong Hongyu Agricultural Machinery Co., Ltd.
002890.SZ.summary: Shandong Hongyu Agricultural Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, service, and integration of agricultural machinery parts and components in China. The company offers downforce type with separated control value products; no-feedback type with simple control value products; separated oil type and common oil type position and draft controls; common oil type composite controls; and distributors and cylinders. It also sells its products in approximately 30 countries and regions internationally. The company is based in Laizhou, China.

002892.SZ.summary: Keli Motor Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells micro motors in China. The company offers single-phase shaded pole motors, single-phase universal motors, step motors, cross flow blowers, DC brushless motors, servo systems, reduction gear motors, and pumps. These motors are used in microwave oven, exhaust fan, oven, fan heater, electric fireplace, air conditioner, food processor, hair dryer, air pump, vacuum cleaner, paper shredder, air pump, water pump (dishwasher washer pump and draining pump), garden tools, electric tools, household appliances, printer, scanner, lighting, camera-control monitor, other IT lines, and industrial control equipment. Keli Motor Group Co., Ltd. also exports its products to the United States, Germany, Italy, Spain, Poland, Australia, Turkey, Syria, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Hunan Keli Motor Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Keli Motor Group Co., Ltd. in May 2019. Keli Motor Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002896.SZ.long_name: Ningbo ZhongDa Leader Intelligent Transmission Co., Ltd.
002896.SZ.summary: Ningbo ZhongDa Leader Intelligent Transmission Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells motor transmission, micro motor, and high precision gearbox products in China and internationally. It offers RV planetary gear boxes, high precision planetary gearboxes, transmission planetary gearboxes, DC brushless gear motors, hypoid gear motors, roller motors, AC and DC gear motors, small AC gear motors, electric forklift gear motors, power assisted steering and driving wheel gear motors, automatic door motors and sweeping gear motors, and controllers. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Cixi, China.

002903.SZ.summary: Yuhuan CNC Machine Tool Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, and services CNC machine tools for grinding and polishing in China, Taiwan, Vietnam, Portugal, Russia, Kenya, Brazil, and internationally. The company offers double surface, camshaft, and valve grinders; single, double, and complex surface lapping/polishing machines; intelligent equipment, including MT line, packing, and microelectronics automation equipment; and piston rings equipment, as well as magnetic polishing and disc grinding machines. Its products have applications in the areas of automotive, IT electronics, bearings, seals, household appliances, and others. The company was formerly known as Hunan Yuhuan Tongxin Numerical Control Machine Tool Co., Ltd. Yuhuan CNC Machine Tool Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Changsha, China.

002918.SZ.summary: Monalisa Group CO.,Ltd develops, produces, and markets various wall and floor tiles, porcelain panels, and ceramic art products. It offers eco stones and glazed tiles. The company sells its products under the MONALISA and QD brand through approximately 3,000 shops in China and approximately 400 marketing networks covering approximately 100 countries and regions. Monalisa Group CO.,Ltd was founded in 1992 and is based in Foshan, China.

002921.SZ.long_name: Shandong Liancheng Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd
002921.SZ.summary: Shandong Liancheng Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd engages in the design, development, manufacture, and sale of iron casts and aluminum alloys in China and internationally. Its products are used in passenger cars, commercial vehicles, engineering/agricultural machinery, hydraulic machinery, commercial air conditioning, medical equipment, environmental equipment, high-speed rail, and solar energy industries and fields. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jining, China.

002922.SZ.summary: Eaglerise Electric & Electronic (China) Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells products and solutions of power supply and components in China and internationally. The company offers LED drivers, LED application products, switching power supply products, power supply transformers, inductors, special type transformers, reactors, and distribution transformers. Its products are used in applications, such as lighting, new energy, electricity utility, industrial control, etc. The company was formerly known as Eaglerise Electric & Electronic (Foshan) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Eaglerise Electric & Electronic (China) Co., Ltd. in 2011. Eaglerise Electric & Electronic (China) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

002927.SZ.summary: Guizhou Taiyong-Changzheng Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells low-voltage circuit breakers in China. The company offers universal, plastic case, molded case leakage protection, and miniature circuit breakers; and medium and low voltage dual power conversion switch electrical appliances, industrial and fire pump controllers, electrical fire monitoring products, etc. It offers its products in railway, airport, hospital, highway, finance, petrochemical, power grid, telecommunication, energy, real estate construction, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Guizhou Changzheng Switch Manufacturing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guizhou Taiyong-Changzheng Technology Co., Ltd. in October 2015. Guizhou Taiyong-Changzheng Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Zunyi, China. The company is a subsidiary of Shenzhen Yongtai Technology Co., Ltd.

002930.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Great River Smarter Logistics Co., Ltd.
002930.SZ.summary: Guangdong Great River Smarter Logistics Co., Ltd., a logistics company, provides warehousing and other related services for petrochemical product manufacturers, traders, and end users in China and internationally. Its services include loading and unloading, warehousing, transfer, and logistics chain management. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Dongguan City, China.

002931.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Fenglong Electric Co., Ltd. develops, designs, manufactures, and sells components and parts for garden equipment and automotive industries in China. It offers ignition coils, flywheels, and cylinders for use in various garden power tools, such as trimmers, chainsaws, and hedge trimmers; ABS valves, thermostat covers, and tensioners that are used in automotive systems comprising transmission, brake, and thermostat systems; and other components. The company also exports its products. It primarily operates under the Fenglong brand name. The company serves garden power manufacturers and automotive enterprises. Zhejiang Fenglong Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Shangyu, China.

002943.SZ.summary: Hunan Yujing Machinery Co., Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and sells lapping/polishing machines, multi-wire saws, and relevant spare parts. The company offers multi wire saw machines, double-side lapping/polishing machines, single-side lapping/polishing machines, and consumable parts. It serves mobile touch screen, solar photovoltaic, magnetic materials, and sapphire industries. Hunan Yujing Machinery Co., Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Yiyang, China.

002949.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Capol International & Associates Co., Ltd provides architectural design services. It also offers urban planning, engineering cost consulting, industrialization research and design, BIM design and consulting, EPC project general contracting and whole process engineering consulting, agency construction management, construction services, and prefabricated component development and manufacturing services. The company is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002957.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Colibri Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the production, sale, and technical service of automation equipment and precision parts in China. It offers automated testing and assembly equipment; and automated equipment accessories, such as regular testing machine pallets, smart phone testing platform fixtures, antenna wavelength testing fixtures, and ABT press switch fixtures. The company also provides precision machining, tools, and dies, including high-speed grinders high-speed turning, milling, boring machines, electrical discharge machines, low-speed cutters, coordinate measuring machines, alimeters, CNC turning centers, and CNC machining centers. Its products are used in communication, clean energy, e-cigarette, automotive, HDD, medical and health, and logistic applications. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002960.SZ.summary: Jade Bird Fire Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells professional fire-safe electronic products and fire safety systems in China and internationally. The company offers household fire alarm systems, automatic fire alarm and linkage control systems, gas fire extinguishing systems, electrical fire monitoring systems, fire door monitoring systems, fire equipment power monitoring systems, wireless wide area intelligent fire protection systems, fire cloud data centres, flammable gas alarm systems, gas fire extinguishing systems, fire emergency lighting and evacuation indication systems, bus type toxic and harmful gas detection and alarm systems, and fire alarm systems. Its products are used in Zhongnanhai, Beijing Olympic Games, Shanghai World Expo, and Guangzhou Asian Games. The company was formerly known as Beida Jade Bird Universal Fire Alarm Device Co., Ltd and changed its name to Jade Bird Fire Co., Ltd. in November 2019. Jade Bird Fire Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002965.SZ.summary: Lucky Harvest Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of precision stamping dies and structural metal parts in China. Its products include home appliance accessories, auto accessories, mold parts, power cabinet accessories, aluminum parts, communication device accessories, chassis cabinets, kitchen utensils, and energy conservation and emission reduction parts. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Dongguan City, China.

002967.SZ.long_name: Guang Zhou GRG Metrology & Test Co., Ltd.
002967.SZ.summary: Guang Zhou GRG Metrology & Test Co., Ltd. operates as a third-party metrology and testing company. Its services include metrology and calibration; electromagnetic compatibility testing; chemical analysis; reliability and environmental testing; environmental monitoring; and food detection. The company serves petrochemical, communication, aviation, automotive, electric power, medicine, electrical and electronic devices, shipping, and rail transit industries. It was formerly known as Guangzhou Guangdian Metrology Testing Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guang Zhou GRG Metrology & Test Co., Ltd. in November 2011. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Guangzhou City, China. Guang Zhou GRG Metrology & Test Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Guangzhou Radio Group Co., Ltd.

002973.SZ.summary: Qiaoyin City Management Co.,Ltd. engages in the environmental protection business in China. Its activities include integrated sanitation management, waste classification, sanitation infrastructure investment and construction, biomass treatment, leachate sludge disposal, soil remediation, public facilities and environmental management, black and smelly water body restoration, municipal road and pipeline maintenance, and other services. The company was formerly known as QiaoYin Environmental Tech.Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Qiaoyin City Management Co.,Ltd. in December 2020. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

002975.SZ.summary: Zhuhai Bojay Electronics Co. Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of industrial automation equipment and accessories. The company offers automation, RF test, acoustic test, in-circuit test, optical test, and vision test solutions; and related technical services. Its products are used in testing and product assembly of electronic products. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Zhuhai, China.

002976.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Cheersson Precision Metal Forming Co., Ltd.
002976.SZ.summary: Suzhou Cheersson Precision Metal Forming Co., Ltd. produces and sells communication equipment parts. The company offers powertrain cases and shells, as well as parts for multimedia intelligent, sealing, security, and brake systems. Its products include brake control unit boxes and covers, safety buckles, safety curtain guide brackets, control boxes, airbag covers, and aluminum back covers. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Suzhou, China.

002977.SZ.summary: Chengdu Tianjian Technology Co., Ltd. researches in, develops, manufactures, and sells solid-state microwave front-end products. It offers solid-state transmitters for use in the defense military applications; phased array antennas for use in commercial satellites; radar systems, and other microwave components, such as microwave altimeter transmitter for sea surface height measurement and ocean observation through three-dimensional imaging. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Chengdu, China.

002979.SZ.summary: China Leadshine Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells motion control products in the worldwide. The company's products include stepper drives and motors, integrated steppers, closed loop stepper drives and motors, integrated easy servo motors, integrated servo motors, brushless and brushed servo drives and motors, PC based and standalone motion controllers, power supplies, and companion accessories. Its products are used in OEM applications and industries, such as CNC machinery, semiconductor, electronics, inkjet printing, medical, packaging, lab automation, textile, etc. China Leadshine Technology Co., Ltd. markets its products through its global distribution network, which include local distributors. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002981.SZ.summary: Risuntek Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells electroacoustic products and components. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Guangdong, China.

002985.SZ.long_name: Beijing Beimo High-tech Frictional Material Co.,Ltd
002985.SZ.summary: Beijing Beimo High-tech Frictional Material Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of equipment braking systems for the military industry. It offers dual channel digital anti-slip brake control system accessories; brake system attachments; digital anti-skid brake control modules; brake wheels and brakes; brake wheel assemblies; aircraft landing gears; high speed train brakes; powder metallurgy brake discs; brake discs; and carbon composite brake discs. The company's products are used in fighter aircraft, bombers, transport aircraft, trainers, military trade aircraft, helicopters, aerospace high-altitude aircraft and tanks, and armored vehicles and other military equipment. Beijing Beimo High-tech Frictional Material Co., Ltd. is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

002989.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Strongteam Decoration Engineering Co., Ltd.
002989.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Strongteam Decoration Engineering Co., Ltd. provides building decoration design services. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002993.SZ.summary: Dongguan Aohai Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of consumer electronics products in China. The company operates in the fields of low-power smart charging, smart mobile power, wireless charging, and integration with power and PC power supplies. Its products include chargers, mobile power supplies, smart homes, and AI hardware, as well as energy products, such as personal energy packs and smart charging posts. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Dongguan, China.

003001.SZ.summary: Zhongyan Technology Co., Ltd. provides technical research and development services in the areas of geotechnical engineering, environmental restoration, urban underground space development, and utilization. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Beijing, China.

003004.SZ.summary: Beijing Telesound Electronics Co., Ltd. provides security and protection systems in China. The company offers city, and subway security and protection image information management systems; remote monitoring solutions for city dangerous fountain, bank coffers, schools, substations, machine rooms oil fields, road monitoring, local office building, etc.; system solutions for bank ATM network operation and maintenance; bank network monitoring and alarming management solutions; security and protection, and information management solutions for national storage; and cultural heritage image information management solutions for state administration of cultural heritage. Its products are used in the fields of government, finance, police, army, judicature, post, traffic, hospital, school, etc. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

003008.SZ.long_name: Xuchang KETOP Testing Research Institute Co.,Ltd
003008.SZ.summary: Xuchang KETOP Testing Research Institute Co.,Ltd. operates as a third-party testing company in China. It provides testing services for power system secondary protection equipment, smart micro-grid devices, and electric vehicle charging and battery swap systems. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Xuchang, China.

003009.SZ.long_name: Shaanxi Zhongtian Rocket Technology Co., Ltd
003009.SZ.summary: Shaanxi Zhongtian Rocket Technology Co., Ltd researches and designs solid rockets and rocket engines in China. It offers automated launchers, 120 simulation training bombs, remote control ground flame spread systems, long March-2F simulation model, dongfeng-1 missile model, long March 3 carrier rocket model, electrical alloys, long-range single soldier forest fire-fighting systems, hygroscopic flame strips, thunder rockets, TWR01 weather radar systems, airborne flame spread systems, remote remote ground spreading systems, skyhawk IV weather rocket systems, rain-proof and anti-smashing rocket special storage cabinets, sub-mother rain-enhanced anti-smash rockets, and rain-enhanced and increasing anti-smash rockets. The company is based in Xian, China.

003021.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronic Co., Ltd.
003021.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronic Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, manufacture, assembly, and sale of the micro motor, gearbox, and other micro precision transmission systems. The company offers DC motors; DC, palnetary, brushless, brushed, 12V, 24V, stepper, and custom gear motors; planetary, miniature, speed reducer, plastic and metal planetary, electric motor, and custom gearboxes, as well as planetary gearheads; linear actuator motors; and customized products, such as smart home, consumer elecronics, communication, automobile, and intelligent robot drives. It serves automobiles, communication and medical technology, home automation, consumer electronics, intelligent robots, and industry equipment markets. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

003025.SZ.long_name: Sijin Intelligent Forming Machinery Co., Ltd.
003025.SZ.summary: Sijin Intelligent Forming Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of multi-station high-speed automatic cold forming equipment and die casting equipment in China. It offers cold forging machines, special part and nut formers, nut-former machines, one die two blow headers, and die casting machines. The company is based in Ningbo, China.

003027.SZ.summary: Tongxing Environmental Protection Technology Co.,Ltd provides environmental protection project general contracting services in China. It offers environmental protection equipment and materials for dust removal, desulfurization, and denitrification; salt extraction products; desulfurization waste liquid extraction salt; and low temperature denitration catalyst, as well as related ancillary services. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Hefei, China.

003031.SZ.summary: Hebei Sinopack Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd. develops, produces, and sells multi-layer ceramic packaging products. The company offers electronic ceramic products for use in the areas of optical communication, industrial laser, infrared detector, microwave communication, automotive electronics, and consumer electronics. It also engages in the import and export business; and the provision of technical consulting services. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Shijiazhuang, China.

003036.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Taitan Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of textile machines in China. It offers spinning, weaving, twisting, and dyeing machinery, as well as textile equipment. The company also exports its products internationally. Zhejiang Taitan Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Xinchang, China.

0038.HK.summary: First Tractor Company Limited engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of agricultural and power machinery, and related spare parts worldwide. It operates through three divisions: Agricultural Machinery, Power Machinery, and Finance. The company offers wheeled and crawler tractors, and its components, such as castings, gears, gear boxes, and covers; and off-road diesel engines, as well as accessory parts, including fuel injection pumps and fuel injectors. It also engages in fund settlement, fund raising, financing, and other financial activities; and the processing and sale of rough and semi-finished, and finished products of castings and forging products. In addition, the company accepts deposits; and provides loans, finance lease, bill acceptance and discounting, entrusting loans, and investments to member companies, as well as equity and portfolio investment in financial institutions as approved; and consumer credit service, buyer's credit, and finance lease for products of member companies and inter-bank borrowing and lending. First Tractor Company Limited markets its products to approximately 140 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as First Tractor Works of China. The company was founded in 1955 and is based in Luoyang, China.

0107.HK.summary: Sichuan Expressway Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, invests in, constructs, operates, and manages expressway infrastructure projects in Sichuan Province, the People's Republic of China. It operates through five segments: Toll Roads and Bridges; City Operation; Financial Investment; Energy Investment; and Transportation, Tourism, Culture, and Education. The Toll Roads and Bridges segment engages in the operation of expressways and a high-grade toll bridges. The City Operation segment provides construction and upgrade services under the service concession arrangements and construction contracts, and advertising services, as well as engages in the investment, development, and rental of properties along expressways. The Financial Investment segment is involved in finance lease operation, financial investment, and factoring businesses. The Energy Investment segment operates gas stations along expressways; and sells petrochemicals and other oil products. The Transportation, Tourism, Culture, and Education segment engages in the education operations. It also offers logistics and property development services. Sichuan Expressway Company Limited was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

0177.HK.summary: Jiangsu Expressway Company Limited invests in, constructs, operates, and manages toll roads and bridges in the People's Republic of China. The company operates the Jiangsu section of Shanghai-Nanjing Expressway, Ningchang Expressway, Zhenli Expressway, Guangjing Expressway, Xicheng Expressway, Xiyi Expressway, Zhendan Expressway, Jiangyin Bridge, Sujiahang Expressway, and other toll roads in Jiangsu Province, the People's Republic of China. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 17 road and bridge projects; and owned approximately 850 kilometers of roads and bridges.
