In addition, the company sells coal and chemicals; and offers technology and exploration services. China Boqi Environmental (Holding) Co., Ltd., was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

2386.HK.summary: SINOPEC Engineering (Group) Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) contracting services. It operates through four segments: Engineering, Consulting and Licensing; EPC Contracting; Construction; and Equipment manufacturing. The Engineering, Consulting and Licensing segment offers design, consulting, research and development, feasibility studies, and compliance certification services. The EPC Contracting segment provides integrated engineering, procurement, construction, maintenance, and project management services. The Construction segment offers infrastructure for oil refining and chemical industries, oil and gas storage, pipelines transportation, construction, renovation, expansion, repair and maintenance services, and large equipment lifting, as well as transportation services in construction projects. The Equipment manufacturing segment designs, develops, manufactures, and sells equipment and spare parts for oil refining and chemical facilities. It also provides technical, and equipment selling and leasing services, as well as medicine, pesticide, and chemical research services. The company serves various industries, such as petrol refining, chemical engineering, aromatics, coal chemicals, inorganic chemicals, pharmaceutical chemicals, clean energy, storage and transportation facilities, environmental protection, energy saving, and other services. It has operations in the People's Republic of China, Kuwait, Oman, Saudi Arabia, and internationally. The company is headquartered in Beijing, China. SINOPEC Engineering (Group) Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Petrochemical Corporation.

2722.HK.summary: Chongqing Machinery & Electric Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and sells clean energy equipment and high-end smart manufacturing equipment. It manufactures and sells engines, hydroelectric generation equipment, electrical wires and cables, general machinery, machinery tools, high-voltage transformers, and other products. The company also designs, manufactures, and sells vehicle parts and components; industrial robots, intelligent equipment, etc.; processes electronic products; develops, produces, and leases laser, machinery, and testing equipment; turbines, governors, and auxiliary devices; gear processing machine tools and lathes; automation, intelligent equipment, and accessories; provides cotton picking services and maintains cotton machinery and spare parts; cutting tool; casting and forging of non-ferrous metal smelting and special metal smelting; electrical porcelain; agricultural machinery and accessories, special machine tools, spare parts, and special tooling; precision screw; multi-purpose CNC machine tools, roll grinders, and deep hole boring machines. In addition, it leases properties; engages in turbo mechanical product testing, equipment, and system maintenance and transformation; sewage collection, treatment, and operation management BOT business; other trade business; trades in machinery and raw materials; fan coolers; evaporative cooling, water-cooled, and air-cooled chillers; manufactures wind-power equipment, PPR\PPC tubular product, and gas compressors and components; sells network, environmental, and gas products; design and manufactures industrial pumps and parts, and pressure vessels; mechanical and electrical equipment technology; and sells steel, as well as provides loans. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Chongqing, the People's Republic of China. Chongqing Machinery & Electric Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Chongqing Machinery and Electronics Holding (Group) Co., Ltd.

2880.HK.summary: Liaoning Port Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides port and logistics services in Mainland China. The company offers oil/liquefied chemicals terminal and related logistics, and trading services for loading and discharging, storage, and transshipment of oil products and liquefied chemicals; and port management services. It also provides container terminal and related logistics services for loading and discharging, storage, and transshipment of containers; and various container logistics services, as well as leases terminals and sells properties. In addition, the company offers bulk and general cargo terminal and related logistics services for loading and discharging general cargo and ore, as well as trades in steel. Further, it provides bulk grains terminal, and related logistics and trading services for loading and discharging of grains and trades in unprocessed grains; passenger, roll-on and roll-off terminal, and related logistics services; and port value-added and related ancillary services, including tallying, tugging, transportation, power supply, information technology, and construction. Additionally, the company offers automobile terminal, and related logistics and trading services for loading and discharging automobile. Liaoning Port Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Dalian Port (PDA) Company Limited and changed its name to Liaoning Port Co., Ltd. in January 2021. Liaoning Port Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Dalian, the People's Republic of China.

300001.SZ.summary: Qingdao TGOOD Electric Co., Ltd. researches, designs, develops, and manufactures primary and secondary electric transformers and distribution substations in China. It is also involved in leasing power equipment; constructing and operating energy vehicle charging and discharging stations or points; the provision of financing leasing services; and solid thermal storage business. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Qingdao, China.

300004.SZ.summary: Nanfang Ventilator Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures HVAC products in China. The company offers axial flow fan, and centrifugal blower fans; seamless and stainless steel pipes, forge pieces, carbon steel products, and alloy steel pipes; and nuclear fans and dampers. Its products are used in nuclear power, petrochemical, coal chemical, metro, tunnel and civil architecture, and other industries. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Foshan, China.

300008.SZ.summary: Bestway Marine & Energy Technology Co.,Ltd provides marine and offshore engineering research and design services in China. It offers marine and offshore engineering research and design services for merchants, passengers, public, and marine engineering ships, as well as marine engineering structures; marine and offshore engineering supervision and technical consultancy services; yacht design; and ship building engineering package contracting services, ship decoration, marine equipment import and export, logistics, etc. The company also manufactures and sells various ships, such as bulkers, boxships, tankers, gas carriers, RoRo ships, public use boats, steel yachts, offshore ships, platforms and platform modules, jack-up legs, jackets, and other steel constructions; offshore and petroleum-related equipment and pipeline robots; and furniture. In addition, it engages in the development of petroleum related inspection and anti-corrosion technology; design of municipal pipeline; provision of various services, such as general freight transportation, warehousing, logistics distribution, goods clearance, ship management, ship maintenance, crew training for LNG power ships, berth rental, yacht repairing and maintenance, yacht register, ship chartering, shipping consultancy, freight forwarding and shipment, seaman recruiting and management, and marine EMC services; interior decoration of yacht and luxury passenger ship, as well as other ship types; and decoration of high-end hotels and clubs. Further, the company is involved in the natural gas business; provision of optimized energy solutions and domestic shipping service; and operation of ecological farms, leisure tourism, yachts, clubs, and resort communities. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Bestway Marine Engineering Design Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Bestway Marine & Energy Technology Co.,Ltd in May 2016. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Shanghai, China.

300011.SZ.long_name: Beijing Dinghan Technology Group Co., Ltd.
300011.SZ.summary: Beijing Dinghan Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of power supply systems of rail transit equipment in China. Its ground electrical equipment includes ground power supply solution, platform door system solution, and braking energy management solution; intelligent station solutions; and rolling stock electrical equipment, such as rolling stock special cable solution, rolling stock air conditioner system solution, CRH3 auxiliary power supply system for EMU, and DC600V power supply system solution for passenger train. The company also offers HD video detection system for freight train loading state and rolling stock detection system solution; and after-sales and operation maintenance services. The company was formerly known as Beijing Dinghan Technology Co., Ltd. Beijing Dinghan Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300012.SZ.long_name: Centre Testing International Group Co. Ltd.
300012.SZ.summary: Centre Testing International Group Co. Ltd. provides testing, calibration, inspection, certification, and technical services in China and internationally. It operates through four segments: Life Science, Trade Guarantee, Consumer Goods, and Industrial Test. The company's services include hazardous substances testing, safety detection, EMC testing, environment safety testing, electronics reliability and failure analysis, material reliability and failure analysis, and metal and nonmetallic materials analysis; textile, footwear, and leather testing; toy testing; and automobile materials and component testing services. It also provides food, pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, feed, and food contact materials testing, inspection, and compliance; audit, measurement calibration, and dimension inspection; semiconductor testing; maritime hazardous materials management; freight assessment; certification and training; and application software development and testing services. The company serves various industries, including electrical and electronic products, building materials and engineering, maritime, metrology and calibration and geometry measurement, food and drug, vehicle, inspection and analysis for metal materials and parts, and CTI hardline and toy products, as well as textile, footwear, and leather products. Centre Testing International Group Co. Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300013.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Xinning Modern Logistics Co.,Ltd provides supply chain management services in China. The company offers warehousing services, including bonded warehousing and general storage; and freight services, such as air, maritime, land, and multimodal, as well as customs services. It also provides base wine packaging, warehousing, logistics, distribution, and other services; cross-border e-commerce services; and new energy car rental services. In addition, the company offers national satellite positioning, software development, and specialized hardware customization services; and car networking solutions comprising transportation industry supervision platform, general fleet management system, and comprehensive traffic information service system. Jiangsu Xinning Modern Logistics Co.,Ltd was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Kunshan, China.

300018.SZ.long_name: Wuhan Zhongyuan Huadian Science & Technology Co.,Ltd.
300018.SZ.summary: Wuhan Zhongyuan Huadian Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the smart grid, medical health, and industrial investment businesses in China. The company is involved in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and service of power system dynamic recording systems, power system time synchronization and measurement systems, intelligent power grid instrumentation systems, 110kV and below voltage level substation integrated automation systems, intelligent distribution network scheduling systems, and energy Internet system integration and intelligent equipment, as well as medical information and clinical in vitro diagnostic related products. It also provides energy Internet planning, design, operation and maintenance, and consulting services. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Wuhan, China.

300022.SZ.long_name: Gifore Agricultural Science & Technology Service Co., Ltd.
300022.SZ.summary: Gifore Agricultural Science & Technology Service Co., Ltd. offers agricultural machines in Asia. It also operates a professional market platform for the promotion of agriculture, rural areas, and farmers, as well as a service platform for agricultural and agricultural resources. The company was formerly known as Gifore Agricultural Machinery Chain Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gifore Agricultural Science & Technology Service Co., Ltd. in September 2018. Gifore Agricultural Science & Technology Service Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

300023.SZ.summary: Bode Energy Equipment Co., Ltd engages in the research, design, manufacture, and control system integration of industrial automation products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers drilling rig AC variable frequency drive, drilling rig DC drive, compound drive drilling rig electrical, top drive, auto-drilling, and specific drilling rig electrical control systems, as well as TV monitor systems and flush type integrated oil production management systems for use in the petroleum industry. It also provides galvanizing line and draw bending flattener control systems for use in the metallurgy industry, as well as special equipment and hydrodynamic force test control systems. The company is based in Xi'an, the People's Republic of China.

300024.SZ.summary: Siasun Robot&Automation Co.,Ltd. operates in robotic industry in China. It offers collaborative, mobile, intelligent, industrial, and service robots; chassis marriage and assembly AGV, spot welding, and intelligent logistic systems; AS/RS systems; electronics assembly systems; automated vertical warehouse systems; and automated charging and swapping systems. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenyang, China.

300031.SZ.summary: Wuxi Boton Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the industrial bulk material handling and mobile Internet businesses. It offers heat resistance, steel cord, flame retardant, conveyer, and fabric belts. The company provides its solutions for mining, steel, cement, port and dock, and coal industries. It also offers mobile Internet services for the distribution and operation of mobile games. The company was formerly known as Wuxi Boton Belt Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wuxi Boton Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2015. Wuxi Boton Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Wuxi, China.

300032.SZ.summary: Jinlong Machinery & Electronic Co.,Ltd engages in the research, production, and sale of mini motors in China and internationally. It offers micro motors, including solid motors, coin type vibrators, and driving motors; and optoelectronics, such as mobile phone and notebook camera modules. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Yueqing, China.

300034.SZ.summary: Gaona Aero Material Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of high-temperature materials for use in the aerospace industry in China. The company offers cast, deformed, powder, and special alloy products, as well as high-purity high-strength special alloy products. Its products are also used in electric power, automotive, metallurgy, glass manufacturing, nuclear power, and other industrial fields. The company was formerly known as Beijing Cisri-Gaona Materials & Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gaona Aero Material Co., Ltd. in January 2020. Gaona Aero Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Beijing, China.

300035.SZ.summary: Hunan Zhongke Electric Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells electromagnetic metallurgy products in China. It offers continuous casting electromagnetic stirring sets, induction heating packages, high-voltage inverters, lifting magnets, rectification control equipment, cable reels, and separators. The company also provides technical services. It primarily serves iron and steel, transport, shipbuilding, machinery, mining, and other industries. The company also exports its products. Hunan Zhongke Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Yueyang, China.

300040.SZ.summary: Harbin Jiuzhou Group Co.,Ltd. manufactures and supplies electrical equipment and energy efficiency management solutions in China and internationally. The company offers power products, including batteries; and power quality management products, which comprise high and low voltage reactive power compensation products. It also provides transformers and reactors, prefabricated box types, busbars and bridges, terminals, and distribution automation products; low voltage switch complete set equipment; medium voltage switchgears comprising gas insulated medium voltage and air insulation medium voltage switchgears; and electrical components that include medium voltage switching components and low voltage dual power transfer switches. In addition, the company offers high-voltage motor drive products, including high voltage and low voltage soft starters, and high and low voltage inverters; new energy grid-connected converters and supporting products, such as megawatt level wind power converters; and power engineering installation and construction products. Further, it offers energy saving and energy efficiency management, city and infrastructure, rail transportation, distribution automation, building technology, industry, mine, new energy, data center, and reactive power compensation and harmonic control solutions. The company was formerly known as Harbin Jiuzhou Electrical Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Harbin Jiuzhou Group Co.,Ltd. in July 2020. Harbin Jiuzhou Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Harbin, China.

300048.SZ.summary: Hiconics Eco-energy Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells industrial automation control and energy equipment in China and internationally. The company offers medium voltage VFD products, low voltage VFD products, and servo motor drives; powertrain systems, motors, EV chargers, energy automobile products, and components; and energy conservation and environment protection products. The company was formerly known as Hiconics Drive Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hiconics Eco-energy Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2016. Hiconics Eco-energy Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Beijing, China.

300053.SZ.long_name: Zhuhai Orbita Aerospace Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
300053.SZ.summary: Zhuhai Orbita Aerospace Science & Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells aerospace electronic chips and electronic chip systems in China. The company's products include SOC, SIP, and EMBC chips; micro nano satellite constellation systems; satellite big data collecting and analyzing products; facial recognition and image processing products; artificial intelligence systems; avionics systems; and intelligent weapon systems. Its products are used in aerospace, aviation, industry control, territorial resources, municipal engineering, intelligent security, artificial intelligence, public consumption, and various other fields. The company was formerly known as Zhuhai Orbita Control Engineering Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhuhai Orbita Aerospace Science & Technology Co., Ltd. in September 2017. Zhuhai Orbita Aerospace Science & Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Zhuhai, China.

300056.SZ.long_name: Xiamen Zhongchuang Environmental Technology Co., Ltd.
300056.SZ.summary: Xiamen Zhongchuang Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, and services high temperature dust and bag filters in China and internationally. The company offers flue gas island control products; and bulk material storage systems, as well as invests in and operates energy conservation and environmental protection, and clean energy power plants. It also provides third party environmental services, import and export services, and investment services. The company was formerly known as Xiamen Savings Environmental Co., Ltd and changed its name to Xiamen Zhongchuang Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2020. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

300062.SZ.summary: Ceepower Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of pre-molded cable connectors, and primary and secondary equipment for power grids in China. The company offers pre-molded cable connectors, cable branch boxes, indoor or outdoor main ring units, high and low voltage switchgear kits, box-type substations, power quality management devices, and primary and secondary equipment for power transmission and distribution system, such as FTU, DTU, etc; and green energy products, charging equipment for electric vehicle, equipment for photovoltaic power generation system, etc. It also provides cable accessories and solar products. The company's services include electric equipment manufacture, total package of EPC project for power system, contribution and operation of BOT and PPP projects, etc. Its products are used in power distribution, petrochemical power, urban rail transit, and electrified railway systems, as well as metallurgical enterprises and other industries. The company was formerly known as Fujian CEE Installations Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ceepower Co., Ltd. in December 2015. Ceepower Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

300066.SZ.summary: Sanchuan Wisdom Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells water meters under the San Chuan brand. The company offers intelligent card type, stainless steel, water saving type, network remote transmission, direct reading electronic remote transmission, compound, and mechanical water meters. It also provides multi-family condominium water supply systems; and water company management and application software, as well as water supply products, drainage pipes, pipe fittings, etc. Sanchuan Wisdom Technology Co., Ltd. markets its products in Southeast Asia, the United States, Africa, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Jiangxi Sanchuan Water Meter Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sanchuan Wisdom Technology Co., Ltd. in January 2016. Sanchuan Wisdom Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Yingtan, China.

300068.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Narada Power Source Co., Ltd.
300068.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Narada Power Source Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, sells, and services communication backup, motive power, and renewable energy storage batteries and accessories. The company offers VRLA type lead acid batteries, lithium-ion cells and batteries, and related components and subsystems, as well as energy hybrid, DG/battery hybrid, battery cabinet, battery racks and accessories, and home and commercial energy storage solutions. Its products are used in telecom, electric power, railway, and other infrastructure industries, as well as used to store renewable energy from photovoltaic energy and wind farms. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China. Zhejiang Narada Power Source Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Narada Holdings Co., Ltd.

300070.SZ.summary: Beijing Originwater Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the water and wastewater treatment industry in China and internationally. Its products and technologies include microfiltration membrane, ultrafiltration membrane, ultra-low pressure and highly selective membrane, and reverse osmosis. The company engages in water and wastewater treatment industrial chain, including municipal and industrial wastewater treatment, drinking water treatment, desalination, civil water treatment, wetland protection and reconstruction, sponge cities, river management, black and odorous water treatment, urban landscape construction, light environment construction, solid waste and hazardous waste treatment and disposal, and others. Beijing Originwater Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

300073.SZ.summary: Beijing Easpring Material Technology CO.,LTD. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of energy materials in China and internationally. The company offers cathode materials for lithium ion batteries; and NCM532, NCM622, and lithium cobalt oxide materials. It also provides NCA, LCO, LMO, and precursor materials, which are used in electric vehicle, consumer electronics, energy storage terminals, and other fields. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300076.SZ.long_name: Ningbo GQY Video & Telecom Joint-Stock Co., Ltd.
300076.SZ.summary: Ningbo GQY Video & Telecom Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. provides visual information system solutions in China. The company offers projection display screen, display unit cabinet, image processing system, interactive electronic blackboard LPD, application management software system, AR-VIS system platform, and cross platform applications, as well as DLP, LED, and LCD splicing display unit. It also provides various solutions, such as visual comprehensive display, public security system, traffic police system, fire system, rail transit, petroleum and petrochemical, power system, information and communication, financial system, water system, utility, 3d stereo mosaic display system, IP streaming media splicing display system, PGIS information system, and project performance, as well as solutions for the mining industry. Its products are used in various fields comprising national defense, government, public security, transport, water conservancy, education, public health, energy, etc. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Ningbo, China.

300092.SZ.long_name: Sichuan Kexin Mechanical and Electrical Equipment Co.,Ltd
300092.SZ.summary: Sichuan Kexin Mechanical and Electrical Equipment Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, installs, and sells various pressure vessels and civil nuclear safety machinery in China. The company offers petrochemical, nuclear power and military, conventional power plant, and clean and new energy, as well as oilfield environmental protection equipment; and welding and lifting, cutting and forming, NDT, test and inspection, and heat treatment equipment. It also engages in import and export activities. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shifang, China.

300097.SZ.summary: Dalian Zhiyun Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, and system integration of automation machines in China. It offers auto test, convey, assembly, and debur machines, as well as wash and filter machines; and assembly line products. The company was formerly known as Dalian Zhiyun Machine Tool Auxiliary Machine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Dalian Zhiyun Automation Co., Ltd. in May 2008. Dalian Zhiyun Automation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Dalian, China.

300099.SZ.summary: Uroica Precision Information Engineering Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells critical equipment for mine safety monitoring and production in China and internationally. Its products include ceremony roof monitors, mechatronic products, polymer grouting materials, and geophysical drilling technology output products. The company was formerly known as Uroica Mining Safety Engineering Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Uroica Precision Information Engineering Co., Ltd. in March 2017. Uroica Precision Information Engineering Co., Ltd. is based in Tai'an, China.

300103.SZ.summary: Dagang Holding Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and servicing of road construction and maintenance machineries and equipment in China. The company offers pavement maintenance machines, including asphalt pavement maintenance trucks, pavement maintenance vehicles, binding agent spreaders, self-propelled road widening machines, ultrathin asphalt pavers, crack sealing machines, asphalt crack sealing and spraying machines, and asphalt pavement cold in-place recyclers. It also provides asphalt distributors; synchronous chip sealers; and self-propelled, lift-type, and pull-type chip spreaders. In addition, the company offers micro-surfacing/slurry seal trucks and fiber micro-surfacing/slurry seal trucks; and semi-trailer and truck mounted liquid asphalt tankers. Further, it provides asphalt material production equipment, such as asphalt emulsion, continuous rubber modified asphalt, emulsified asphalt, rubber modified asphalt, and multifunction asphalt modified equipment, as well as drummed asphalt melters. Additionally, the company undertakes general contracting of domestic and overseas projects. It also sells its products to approximately 50 countries comprising South Africa, Angola, Nigeria, Zambia, Russia, India, Brazil, and Portugal. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Xi'an, China.

300105.SZ.long_name: YanTai LongYuan Power Technology Co., Ltd.
300105.SZ.summary: YanTai LongYuan Power Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, installation, and commissioning and consulting in energy saving and environment protection in thermal power generating area. It offers various products and technologies, including plasma ignition and combustion stabilizing systems for pulverized coal-fired boiler; dual-scale low NOx combustion technology; wall-fired low NOx combustion technology; flame video monitor, a visual image flame detection technology; boiler waster heat comprehensive utilization technology; and other technologies, including few fuel-oil ignition and pulverized coal combustion software. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Yantai, China.

300112.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Maxonic Automation Control Co., Ltd.
300112.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Maxonic Automation Control Co., Ltd. engages in contracting and distribution of automation process control products worldwide. Its products include electric and pneumatic actuators, flow and level measuring instruments, positioners, signal conditioners, temperature controllers, and valves. The company also provides technical solutions. It serves power, chemical and petrochemical, iron and steel, paper making, and water treatment industries. Shenzhen Maxonic Automation Control Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300116.SZ.summary: Baoli New Energy Technology Co., Ltd engages in the development and sale of lithium battery products in China. The company was formerly known as Shaanxi J&R Optimum Energy Co., Ltd and changed its name to Baoli New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. in September 2020. Baoli New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Xi'an, China.

300117.SZ.long_name: Beijing JIAYU Door, Window and Curtain Wall Joint-Stock Co., Ltd.
300117.SZ.summary: Beijing JIAYU Door, Window and Curtain Wall Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. focuses on providing energy-saving door and window curtain walls in China. The company offers door and window, and curtain wall products. It is also involved in the photovoltaic light and heat, intelligent equipment, industrial park investment management, and retail business. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300120.SZ.long_name: Tianjin Jingwei Huikai Optoelectronic Co., Ltd.
300120.SZ.summary: Tianjin Jingwei Huikai Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells magnet wires under the JWHK brand primarily in China. The company provides aluminum magnet, enameled round copper, enameled rectangular copper/aluminum, film wrapped, glass-fiber wrapped, paper covered, twist aluminum, combined, and continuous transposed conductor wires. Its products are used in electric power, electrical and mechanical facility, electrical equipment, home appliances, electronics, communication and transportation, and other fields. The company also exports its products to Taiwan, Southeast Asia, the Middle East, Africa, Europe, and the United States. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Jing Wei Electric Wire Co., Ltd. Tianjin Jingwei Huikai Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Tianjin, China.

300124.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Inovance Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of industrial automation control products for equipment manufacturers in China. The company offers standard industrial automation products, including standard drives, such as inverters and optional parts; motion controls comprising servo drives, servo motors, and optional parts; and automatic controls, such as digital instruments, PLC, HMI, and optional parts. It also provides control and drive systems, which comprise integrated drives for elevators and cranes; specialized inverters for cranes and elevators; and specialized servo drives and motors for injection molding machines. In addition, the company offers OEM industry solutions for the elevator, wire and cable, crane, digital control machine-tool, textile and printing, printing and package, and other industries; and reconstruction industry solutions. Shenzhen Inovance Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2003 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300129.SZ.long_name: Shanghai Taisheng Wind Power Equipment Co., Ltd.
300129.SZ.summary: Shanghai Taisheng Wind Power Equipment Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells wind towers in China. Its wind towers support various kinds of turbines from 100KW to 3MW. The company was formerly known as Ruian Pressure Vessel Factory and changed its name to Shanghai Taisheng Wind Power Equipment Co., Ltd. in 2009. Shanghai Taisheng Wind Power Equipment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300130.SZ.summary: XGD Inc., together with its subsidiaries, researches, develops, manufactures, sells, and leases POS terminals and provides in China and internationally. The company designs and develops financial POS terminal hardware and software; and provides e-commerce, Internet payment software development, and technical services for UnionPay business, commercial banks, and third-party service organizations. In addition, the company offers financial services; and is involved in Internet of Things business, which provides services to terminal merchants and other customers. The company was formerly known as Nexgo Inc. and changed its name to XGD Inc. in October 2018. XGD Inc. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300137.SZ.long_name: Hebei Sailhero Environmental Protection High-tech Co.,Ltd
300137.SZ.summary: Hebei Sailhero Environmental Protection High-tech Co.,Ltd researches, develops, manufactures, and sells online and automatic environmental monitoring instruments in China. It offers ambient air monitoring and early warning systems, surface and underground water monitoring systems, drinking water monitoring and early warning systems, acid rain online monitoring systems, and pollution source online monitoring systems, as well as emergency monitoring, decision-making, and command systems. The company also provides operation services for environmental monitoring instruments. Hebei Sailhero Environmental Protection High-tech Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is based in Shijiazhuang, China.

300141.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Industrial Park Heshun Electric Co., Ltd.
300141.SZ.summary: Suzhou Industrial Park Heshun Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, sale, and service of electric power and power quality equipment in China. The company offers high and low voltage power equipment, and power transformers; high and low voltage power quality equipment; energy metering devices, including centralized measuring boxes and monomer metering boxes; and electric car charging/changing station equipment, such as DC chargers and AC charging piles. It also provides power capacitors comprising high voltage shunt, collective, dry high voltage shunt, coupling, pulse, circuit breaker, and mica capacitors, as well as TYD capacitive voltage transformers and automatic switching controllers. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Suzhou, China.

300145.SZ.summary: Nanfang Zhongjin Environment Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, operates in the environmental protection industry. It provides ecological improvement and environmental protection services. The company offers environmental consulting and design services, such as consulting, design, supervision and inspection, and construction; and general equipment manufacturing services consisting of vertical and horizontal multistage centrifugal pumps, water supply equipment, sewage pumps, inline pumps, split casing pumps, fire pumps, metering pumps, lubrication pumps, deep well pumps, and other products for use in water purification, building water supply, HVAC system, pharmaceutical, and electronic cleaning and other industries. It also provides hazardous waste treatment services; and sewage and sludge treatment services comprising water treatment equipment manufacturing and environmental engineering contracting, as well as sewage, sludge, and cyanobacteria reutilization treatment. The company was formerly known as Nanfang Pump Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nanfang Zhongjin Environment Co., Ltd. in March 2016. Nanfang Zhongjin Environment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

300152.SZ.long_name: Xiongan Kerong Environment Technology Co., Ltd.
300152.SZ.summary: Xiongan Kerong Environment Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells boiler ignition and combustion sets of equipment and control systems. It operates water conservancy and water environment governance, ecological environment governance, energy-saving combustion, thermal power cogeneration and engineering, distributed energy management, solid waste treatment, soil governance, environmental monitoring, clean combustion, and integrated environmental governance businesses. The company was formerly known as Xuzhou Kerong Environmental Resources Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xiongan Kerong Environment Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2019. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Baoding, China.

300153.SZ.summary: Shanghai Cooltech Power Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells intelligent power generation equipment. The company offers nuclear safety class; telecommunication base; and vehicle-mounted power station, as well as power integration solutions. Its products are used in IDC, telecommunications, nuclear power station, aviation, petroleum, petrochemical, defense, and various other industries. The company was formerly known as Cooltech Power (Shanghai) Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Cooltech Power Co., Ltd. in 2008. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300154.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Riland Industry Group Co., Ltd
300154.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Riland Industry Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and services inverter welding and cutting equipment, welding automated devices, welding accessories, and labor protection appliances worldwide. The company offers inverter welding and cutting equipment, including inverter MMA/TIG/MIG/air plasma cutting machines; and welding automated devices, such as integrated system of welding robots, automatic welding carriages, digitalized intelligent welding equipment, welding systems, etc. It also provides welding accessories and labor protection appliances comprising welding and cutting accessories, and auto darkening welding helmets; and consumables. The company offers its products primarily under the Riland, Rilon, HiTronic, T&R, and Good brands through dealers, sub-dealers, and 300 exclusive shops. Its products are primarily used in military, aerospace, construction, machinery manufacturing, shipbuilding, steel structures, marine engineering, vehicle manufacturing, electricity, pipeline, chemical construction, boilers, bridge building, and manufacturing industries. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

300155.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Anjubao Digital Technology Co., Ltd.
300155.SZ.summary: Guangdong Anjubao Digital Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of community security and protection at home solutions in China. The company offers DF2013 SYSTEM, an IP based building intercom system designed for residential apartment and high rise complex; and analogue building intercom, smart home, car park management, and security and protection systems, as well as cables. It also provides smart community, floating population management, and home and shop security solutions. Guangdong Anjubao Digital Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Guangzhou, China.

300161.SZ.long_name: Wuhan Huazhong Numerical Control System, Inc.
300161.SZ.summary: Wuhan Huazhong Numerical Control System, Inc. researches, develops, produces, and sells CNC products worldwide. The company offers CNC controllers for turning machines, milling machines, and machining centers; CNC machines; servo drives and motors; and machine tools. Its CNC products are used in various industries, such as textile and mechanical industries for machine automation; and educational centers for technical personnel training. The company also provides infrared products, including fever scan thermal cameras, infrared monitoring systems, path finders, night vision thermal cameras, and portable infrared thermography products that are used in energy, medical, chemical, and steel industries. In addition, it offers services comprising product commissioning and maintenance, CNC technical training, and consulting services. The company was formerly known as Wuhan Huazhong Numerical Control Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Wuhan Huazhong Numerical Control System, Inc. in April 2021. Wuhan Huazhong Numerical Control System, Inc. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

300163.SZ.summary: Ningbo Xianfeng New Material Co.,Ltd develops and manufactures screen fabrics in China and internationally. The company offers environmental-friendly, energy saving, anti UV, anti-bacterial, flame retardant, and recyclable shading materials under the APLUS brand for use in indoor and outdoor products, as well as blackouts and other technical sun-shading materials. Its products include polyester PVC and fiberglass PVC sunscreen fabrics. The company sells its products through a distribution network comprising textile distributors, fabricators of window-covering shading products, and designers and architects. Ningbo Xianfeng New Material Co.,Ltd was founded in 2003 and is based in Ningbo, China.

300173.SZ.summary: Funeng Oriental Equipment Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells various machines used in printing, packaging, and equipment industries in China. It offers rotogravure printing machines for packaging and decorating paper, woodgrain paper, printing machine, and poly paper, as well as solvent-free gravure printing machines. The company also provides maintenance, professional, and technical solutions. The company was formerly known as Sotech Smarter Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Funeng Oriental Equipment Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2020. Funeng Oriental Equipment Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Zhongshan, China.

300185.SZ.summary: Tongyu Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of forgings and castings. It offers wind power generator main shafts, ductile iron casting pipe moulds, cold work rolls, support rolls, steam turbine and generator rotor shafts, crank shafts, marine shafts, pressure pipeline products, supercritical boiler pipes, pressure vessel forgings, machine tool bed products, wind power diesel engine body hubs, forging blanks, ESR ingots, etc. The company also designs and manufactures various general and non-standard equipment and parts. It serves metallurgy, mining, hydroelectric and thermal power, nuclear and wind power, shipbuilding, petroleum chemical, heavy machinery, marine engineering, aerospace, mould, and other industries. The company is based in Yucheng, China.

300187.SZ.summary: Yonker Environmental Protection Co.,Ltd. operates in the environmental protection industry in China. The company engages in the contaminated sites repair activities; provision of technical advisory services; supply of soil heavy metal repair materials; heavy metal contaminated site soil remediation; and soil remediation works for organic contaminated sites. It is also involved in the organic compounds contaminated soil repair engineering, and groundwater remediation engineering design and engineering contracting activities. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Changsha, China.

300188.SZ.summary: Xiamen Meiya Pico Information Co.,LTD. provides digital forensics and information security products and services in China and internationally. The company offers computer forensic products, including Recovery Master, a professional digital forensic equipment, which supports the recovery of various data formats; Forensic MagiCube, a portable computer forensics equipment that is used in the laboratory or field investigation; Forensic Tower, a forensic workstation; and Forensics Master, a forensic analysis software. Its computer forensic products also comprise OCTOPUS, a multi-protocol acquisition device for online/offline data acquisition; Aurora, an integrated password recovery solution; Data Wiping Workstation, a data destroying device for various storage media; Write-blocker Kit that secures digital investigation on various storage media; and HDD Duplication System, a multi-tasks clone device for disk-to-disk and disk-to-image duplication. In addition, the company provides mobile forensics systems for data acquisition, data recovery, data analysis, and report making on cell phones; Forensics Commander, a smart investigation table for pre-examining, storage fixing, analyzing, system emulation, and real-time reporting; Forensic Grampus, a forensic automobile for instant forensic response; and Digital Forensic Lab, a solution that provides support on the digital forensic investigation. Further, it offers anti-drone gear for drone flights; and iNF-9560 vehicle-based LTE locator systems, as well as provides computer forensics, mobile forensics, data recovery, information security, and online training courses. It serves forensic, law enforcement, and government customers. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Xiamen, China.

300190.SZ.summary: Welle Environmental Group Co., Ltd. provides urban environmental governance, agricultural and rural environmental management, and industrial energy conservation and environmental protection plants in China. It offers urban environmental governance solutions, including landfill leachate treatment, kitchen waste disposal, river repair, and waste incineration services; agricultural and rural environmental solutions, such as agricultural organic waste treatment and rural sewage treatment services; and industrial energy saving and environmental protection solutions comprising industrial flue gas treatment, VOC oil and gas recovery, and industrial treatment services. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu WELLE Environmental Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Welle Environmental Group Co., Ltd. in March 2019. Welle Environmental Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Changzhou, China.

300193.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Jasic Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of inverter welding machines, engine driven welders, and welder equipment in China and internationally. It provides MMA, TIG, MIG, CUT, and SAW inverter welders. The company offers its products under the JASIC brand. Its products are used in various industries, including shipbuilding, boiler, petroleum, chemical railway, construction, electricity, steel structure, metallurgy, vehicles manufacturing, etc. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300195.SZ.summary: Masterwork Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells printing and packaging equipment in China and internationally. It offers cold foil stamping, die cutting, foil stamping, folder gluer, inkjet, inspection, and packer machines. The company was formerly known as Masterwork Machinery Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Masterwork Group Co., Ltd. in July 2017. Masterwork Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Tianjin, China.

300197.SZ.long_name: CECEP Techand Ecology and Environment Co., Ltd.
300197.SZ.summary: CECEP Techand Ecology and Environment Co., Ltd. engages in the eco-environment protection, ecological landscaping, and ecological ecotourism businesses in China. The company offers water ecological restoration, contaminated soil remediation, mining restoration, slope restoration, environmental protection, and energy conservation, as well as resource recycling services; and municipal landscape, commercial landscape, and stereoscopic greening landscape. It is also involved in the integration, reconstruction, development, and operation of ecological tourism resources. CECEP Techand Ecology and Environment Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Shenzhen TechandEcology&Environment Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to CECEP Techand Ecology and Environment Co., Ltd. in April 2021. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300198.SZ.summary: Fujian Superpipe Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of water supply and drainage system solutions in China and internationally. The company offers high density polyethylene (PE) winding structure wall tubes, steel skeleton PE plastic composite pipes, PE solid wall tubes, and continuous winding fiberglass reinforced tubes. It also provides power assembly systems for automobiles; DAT automatic transmission products; electric car batteries; and AEBS control systems. In addition, the company operates DD Bus APP, a customized bus platform. Fujian Superpipe Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Quanzhou, China.

300201.SZ.long_name: Xuzhou Handler Special Vehicle Co., Ltd.
300201.SZ.summary: Xuzhou Handler Special Vehicle Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aerial work platforms in China. It offers vehicle-mounted mobile elevating work platform; electric power supporting vehicles; fire trucks; fire robots; LED intelligent power products; robot integrated applications; and robot education, as well as customization products. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Xuzhou, China.

300202.SZ.summary: Julong Co., Ltd. offers currency security operating and digital management solutions. It provides banknote sorting machines; multifunctional cash processing systems; self-service devices, such as automatic teller, cash recycling, and teller cash recycling machines; and automated strapping and bundling machines, and banknote shrink wrapping machines. The company also provides banking business training services, and maintenance and technical services. It serves commercial banks and other financial institutions worldwide. The company was formerly known as Liaoning Julong Financial Equipment Corp. and changed its name to Julong Co., Ltd. in October 2014. Julong Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Anshan, China.

300205.SZ.long_name: Wuhan Tianyu Information Industry Co., Ltd.
300205.SZ.summary: Wuhan Tianyu Information Industry Co., Ltd. provides data security products and smart cards worldwide. The company provides card products, including financial IC cards, financial social security cards, resident health cards, intelligent communication cards, intelligent traffic cards, eSE mode cards, networking cards, etc. It also offers terminal products, such as mPOS and smart POS products, mobile credit card equipment, tax control disks, smart wearable devices, etc. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Wuhan, China.

300207.SZ.summary: Sunwoda Electronic Co.,Ltd engages in the research, design, manufacture, and sale of lithium-ion battery modules worldwide. The company offers portable power batteries, automobile battery and powertrain products, and mobile phone and tablet PC cases, as well as lithium-ion cells, power management systems, and precision components; and systems and integrated energy, automation and intelligent manufacturing, and laboratory testing services. Its products are used in mobile phones, notebooks computers, electric vehicle powertrains, VR products, wearable devices, drones, smart hardware, energy storage and Internet products, power tools, electric bicycles, and other fields. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300208.SZ.summary: Qingdao Zhongzi Zhongcheng Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of power equipment in China and internationally. It offers green power grid products, such as high voltage parallel connecting and filter capacitors, and magnetically-controlled static var compensation devices. The company also invests in the construction of power plants, and grid transmission and distribution facilities; acquires mining properties; and invests in, develops, and operates industrial parks. In addition, it develops and operates in various industries, such as tap water, natural gas, highways, ports, terminals, and fisheries through BOT, IBO, and PPP. Further, the company is involved in financial investment activities. The company was formerly known as Qingdao Hengshun Zhongsheng Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Qingdao Zhongzi Zhongcheng Group Co., Ltd. in February 2019. Qingdao Zhongzi Zhongcheng Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Qingdao, China.

300215.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Electrical Apparatus Science Academy Co., Ltd.
300215.SZ.summary: Suzhou Electrical Apparatus Science Academy Co., Ltd. provides high and low voltage electrical apparatus testing services. The company offers testing services for high-voltage switchgear equipment, transformer instruments and reactors, capacitors, arresters, insulators, low voltage electrical apparatus, machine tool electric apparatus, wind power generation equipment, electric power fitting, EMC, seismic, chemical substances, and environmental material. It also provides testing services for electrical lighting equipment and electronic information products, solar photovoltaic power generation equipment, non-destructive, automotive electric and electronic products, accumulator and charging equipment, electromotor, explosion-proof products, nuclear power and marine electrical products, and mines and locomotive electrical apparatus. In addition, the company offers industry and calibration services. Suzhou Electrical Apparatus Science Academy Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is based in Suzhou, China.

300217.SZ.long_name: Zhenjiang Dongfang Electric Heating Technology Co., Ltd.
300217.SZ.summary: Zhenjiang Dongfang Electric Heating Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells various electric heaters in China. Its product portfolio comprises electric heaters and assembly elements for household cabinet types; auxiliary heaters in central air-conditioners; defrosting heaters; fin type stainless steel electric heaters; ceramic PTC and metallic PTC heaters; electric heaters for water heating; open coil electric heaters; crankcase heating bands for compressors; heaters with single-end wiring; roasting heaters; electric heater elements for household electric appliances; electric wiring products; and heating bands. The company also provides wind channel heating element; defrosting heaters for cars; aluminum fin heaters; storage tank insertion type electric heaters; and casting aluminum type electric heaters. Zhenjiang Dongfang Electric Heating Technology Co., Ltd. offers its products for use in the air conditioning and refrigeration equipment, household appliances, electric vehicle, polycrystalline silicon manufacturing, petroleum, natural gas, chemical, nuclear power, military, power, railways, ships, machinery, and medical and health industries. The company also exports its products to the United States, Canada, Russia, France, Italy, Japan, South Korea, Saudi Arabia, Israel, and internationally. Zhenjiang Dongfang Electric Heating Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Zhenjiang, China.

300220.SZ.summary: Wuhan Golden Laser Co., Ltd manufactures and sells laser systems used in various applications in China. The company offers CO2, vision, flatbed, fiber, and tube laser cutters; label laser die cutters; and galvo laser and bridge laser machines. It serves the cloth filtration, dye sublimation, digital printed label, leather and shoe, garment tailoring, airbag, home textile, material testing, and materials processing industries. Wuhan Golden Laser Co., Ltd also exports its laser products to approximately 100 countries. The company was formerly known as Wuhan Goldenlaser Equipments Manufacturing Co Ltd and changed its name to Wuhan Golden Laser Co., Ltd in June 2009. Wuhan Golden Laser Co., Ltd was founded in 2005 and is based in Wuhan, China.

300228.SZ.long_name: Zhangjiagang Furui Special Equipment Co., Ltd.
300228.SZ.summary: Zhangjiagang Furui Special Equipment Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures integrated solutions for the LNG industry in China and internationally. It engages in the natural gas liquefaction, storage, transportation, and loading and unloading, as well as terminal applications; and heavy-duty pressure vessels, vehicle motors remanufacturing, hydrogen energy equipment, and Internet of Things. It also provides cryogenic liquid transportation and storage equipment, LNG marine tanks, Cleansky, and Speed tank gas supply systems; LNG/L-CNG vehicle refueling devices; LNG vehicle gas supply systems; cryogenic valves; engine remanufacturing and oil-to-gas products; heavy duty equipment; hydrogen energy; and Changlong petrolchemical equipment. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Zhangjiagang, China.

300240.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Feiliks International Logistics Inc. provides logistics services in China and internationally. The company offers integrated supply chain services; freight forwarding logistics services, including air freight, ocean freight, land transport, and customs and clearance services; and supply chain logistics services, such as vendor management inventory, distribution center, production line distribution, assembly and shipment, circulating process, warehouse outsourcing, and spare parts logistics services. It also provides customs outsourcing, trade implementation, exhibition logistics, milk run logistics, and technical repair and maintenance services. Jiangsu Feiliks International Logistics Inc. was founded in 1993 and is based in Kunshan, China.

300257.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Kaishan Compressor Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells air compressors. The company offers stationary and portable air compressors, blowers, screw and reciprocating gas compressors, and screw compressor systems. It also provides refrigeration systems, screw vapor compressors, centrifugal compressors, pressure vessels, and foundry parts. In addition, the company offers industry waste pressure power generation, industry waste heat power generation, geothermal power generation, and biomass power generation equipment. It sells its products through approximately 2,000 sales outlets in China, as well as exports its products to approximately 60 countries, including Australia, Germany, Japan, South Korea, and Russia. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Quzhou, China. Zhejiang Kaishan Compressor Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Kaishan Holding Group Co., Ltd.

300259.SZ.summary: Suntront Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells smart meters in China and internationally. The company offers smart water, gas, heat, and energy meters; and remote devices and other products. It also provides prepayment, automatic meter reading, and technique related solutions, as well as smart management software with various functions, such as file creation, account opening, daily business dealing, sale and multi inquiry, report summary, read/write card, input/collect data, bill printing, blacklist checking, etc. Suntront Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China.

300260.SZ.summary: Kunshan Kinglai Hygienic Materials Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells components for hygienic fluid pipeline system and ultrahigh vacuum (UHV) system in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers sterile diaphragm valves, hygienic valves, hygienic pumps, pipes and fittings, tank equipment, filters, vacuum chambers, sanitary pumps, valves, flanges, heat exchangers, and bioprocess products, as well as AdvanTorr vacuum products and NanoClean ultra clean products; fine chemical engineering; and vacuum semiconductors. KINGLAI Group provides professional accessories and pipelines for processing and application fields of food, dairy products, beverage, personal care, biotechnology and pharmaceuticals. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Kunshan, the People's Republic of China.

300263.SZ.summary: Longhua Technology Group Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells heat transfer and energy-saving equipment. It offers air cooled condensers, composite cooling products, and smart compound closed cooling towers for the petrochemical industry; direct air cooling condensation systems, compound-type air cooling condensation systems, evaporative condensers, and bundles for the power industry; and evaporative coolers for the metallurgical industry. The company was formerly known as Luoyang Longhua Heat Transfer and Energy Conservation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Longhua Technology Group Co.,Ltd. in September 2018. Longhua Technology Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Luoyang, China.

300265.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Tongguang Electronic Wire & Cable Co., Ltd.
300265.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Tongguang Electronic Wire & Cable Co., Ltd. produces and sells wires and cables in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers fiber optic cables, transmission cables, and equipment cables that can be used in telecommunication, mobile, radio and television, power, railway, other communication, and overhead transmission lines, as well as power cables for architecture, urban lighting, wind power projects, transportation projects, etc. It also provides overhead conductors, including ordinary conductors and energy-saving conductors. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Haimen, China.

300266.SZ.summary: Xingyuan Environment Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the environmental protection industry in China. It offers water treatment technologies for the urban water supply industry; develops municipal sewage treatment solutions; develops industrial wastewater treatment processes for the projects covering pulping and papermaking, food and yeast, textile printing and dyeing, pharmacy, chemical, metallurgy, and other fields; and provides sewage treatment technology systems. The company also offers products for the reuse of reclaimed water; filter products for use in chemical, metallurgy, petroleum, printing and dyeing, ceramics, food, pharmacy, building material, coal washing, mine, sewage treatment, and other industries; and integrated solutions to users on energy utilization analysis, metallurgy, chemical, light industry, food, textile printing and dyeing, etc., as well as generates electricity from waste incineration. In addition, it provides landscape architecture services in the fields of river system, lake and reservoir, garden, road, square, green belt, etc.; mining land rehabilitation services; valley harnessing services; and reservoir environment governance services. The company was formerly known as Hangzhou Xingyuan Filter Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xingyuan Environment Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2015. Xingyuan Environment Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

300270.SZ.summary: Joyware Electronics Co.,Ltd provides video surveillance solutions worldwide. Its products include dome, bullet, fisheye, PTZ, starlight, and licensed cameras; industrial Ethernet switches, optical transceivers, and wireless products; and storage products, such as NVR and DVR products. The company offers high definition digital video network monitoring solutions for highway, safe city, intelligent transportation, financial supervision, and control rail transportation, as well as provides OEM and ODM services to various security product companies. Joyware Electronics Co.,Ltd was founded in 2000 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300272.SZ.long_name: Canature Health Technology Group Co., Ltd.
300272.SZ.summary: Canature Health Technology Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells residential and commercial water treatment systems and components worldwide. It provides control valves, pressure tanks, water softeners, water filters, reverse osmosis products, brine tanks, and commercial and industrial water systems. The company sells its products under the Canature brand name. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Canature Environmental Products Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Canature Health Technology Group Co., Ltd. in July 2018. Canature Health Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

300274.SZ.summary: Sungrow Power Supply Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, and services solar, wind, and other energy storage equipment in China. The company offers photovoltaic inverters, such as concentrated, string, and household inverters for ground-mounted, distributed, and rooftop PV power plants; driving systems for new energy vehicles; and floating systems. It also provides iSolarCloud, a remote monitoring and O &M platform for the operation and management of multiple energies. Sungrow Power Supply Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.

300276.SZ.long_name: SanFeng Intelligent Equipment Group Co., Ltd.
300276.SZ.summary: SanFeng Intelligent Equipment Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, production, installation, commissioning, and service of conveying equipment in China. The company offers logistics conveying systems, including electric monorail and dualrail systems, P&F chains, friction drivers, skid conveying systems, AGV products, warehousing and logistic systems, AD pan material conveying systems, tumover machines, roller conveyor systems, lifters, off-gas discharging systems, and other products, as well as floor chain conveying systems comprising slate chains and towline products. It also provides environmental protecting and energy products, which include coating transmission line products; pre-treatment, electrophoresis, and spray and dusting equipment; oven and cooling products; auxiliary equipment, such as light inspection booth, shower test and blowing, and water treatment equipment; and electric control equipment. In addition, the company offers intelligent and precise weld, including welding jigs and reciprocating rod conveyors; and after-sale services. Its products are used in various industries, such as automotive, construction machinery, agricultural machinery, storage and logistics, light, food, metallurgy, building material, etc. SanFeng Intelligent Equipment Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Huangshi, China.

300278.SZ.long_name: Huachangda Intelligent Equipment Group Co., Ltd.
300278.SZ.summary: Huachangda Intelligent Equipment Group Co., Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells intelligent automation equipment for automakers and engineering machinery manufacturers in China and internationally. Its products include friction, plot overhead, skid, product release chain, and reciprocating rod conveyor systems, as well as distributed control vehicle systems. The company also provides on-site installation and debugging, after-sales, and other services. Its products have applications in automobile manufacturing, engineering machinery, logistics and storage, and electronic appliances industries. The company was formerly known as Hubei Huachangda Intelligent Equipment Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Huachangda Intelligent Equipment Group Co., Ltd. in August 2017. Huachangda Intelligent Equipment Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Shiyan, China.

300280.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Zitian Media Technology Co., Ltd
300280.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Zitian Media Technology Co., Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells hydraulic press equipment in China. The company offers forging hydraulic press, mechanical press, and professional press; and individualized metal forming and systematic solutions. It offers its products for use in various fields, such as automobiles, shipping, traffic, energy, and others. The company sells its products in approximately 30 provinces and cities of China, as well as exports its products to the United States, Europe, Japan, and other countries in south-eastern Asia. It sells its products under the Qin Hua brand name. The company was formerly known as Nantong Metalforming Equipment Co., Ltd and changed its name to Jiangsu Zitian Media Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2018. Jiangsu Zitian Media Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Rugao, China.

300281.SZ.summary: Guangdong Jinming Machinery Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells blown film, cast film, and stretch film lines in China and internationally. It provides PE, PP, EVOH, TIE, and EVA resin mono-/multi-layer films, packaging films, agricultural films, shrink films, barrier films, etc.; and mono-/multi-layer films, infusion bags, barrier films, thermal forming films, etc. The company also offers mono-/multi-layer cast films, mulch films, CPP, CPE, barrier films, breathable films, etc.; and BOPP films, BOPET films, machine direction orientated films, etc. In addition, it offers coating and laminators; and extrusion coating and lamination lines. Its products are used in food and commodity packing, agriculture, medical, automotive, electronic, construction, consumer goods packaging, industrial heavy duty packaging, printing and lamination, geomembrane film, breathable film, and infusion bag, solar PV, and other applications. Guangdong Jinming Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.

300283.SZ.long_name: Wenzhou Hongfeng Electrical Alloy Co., Ltd.
300283.SZ.summary: Wenzhou Hongfeng Electrical Alloy Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, researches, develops, manufactures, and supplies electrical contact materials in the People's Republic of China. It offers structured composite electrical contact materials and components; composite clad electrical contact materials and components, including composite button contact materials, profiled contact materials, composite rivet contact materials, clad strips and stamped parts, Cu/Fe/Cu and Cu/Al/Cu clad materials, and novel Cu/Ag/Cu clad materials; electrical contact assemblies comprising staked and welded contact assemblies; and welding and other accessories, such as solder pastes and brazing material systems. The company also provides thermostat bimetal products consisting of stamping parts and strips; and cemented carbide products, including coaling and geological mining products, road repair tools, carbide burrs and rods, tire studs, CNC cutting inserts, non-standard products, wear resistant parts, wood working knives and glass cutters, and tools of processing building materials. Its products are used in industrial electrical equipment, such as AC contactors, miniature circuit breakers, molded-case circuit breakers, intelligent air circuit breakers, relays, and fuses; construction apparatus, including wall mounted switches and socket outlets; automotive equipment, such as thermostats; and communications electronics, which include micro motors and touch switches. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yueqing, the People's Republic of China.

300284.SZ.summary: JSTI Group provides engineering consultancy services in China and internationally. The company's services include project investment analysis, planning and design, environmental consulting, testing, project management, socio-economic development consulting, and other services. It serves highways, municipal utilities, water transport, railways, urban rail transport, environment, aviation, water conservancy, construction, electricity, etc. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Transportation Research Institute Co., Ltd. and changed its name to JSTI Group in March 2015. JSTI Group was founded in 1978 and is based in Nanjing, China.

300286.SZ.summary: Acrel Co.,Ltd. provides power monitoring and management, electrical safety, and other system solutions for grid customers in China. The company produces and sells medium voltage measurement and control devices, power monitoring and protection systems, energy metering devices, building electrical and mechanical energy saving controllers, power quality monitoring and governance systems, and power sensors. It also provides installation services. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shanghai, China.

300301.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Changfang Group Co., Ltd. researches, designs, develops, produces, and sells LED products in China and internationally. It primarily offers LED lamps for whole house, living room, bedding, and kitchen. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Changfang Light Emitting Diode Lighting Co., LTD and changed its name to Shenzhen Changfang Group Co., Ltd. in March 2016. Shenzhen Changfang Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300307.SZ.summary: Ningbo Cixing Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells knitting machinery in China and internationally. Its products include flat knitting machines, steiger, circular machines, shoe and ironing machines, industrial robots, knitting equipment, and other products. The company also provides after-sales and technical support services. Ningbo Cixing Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Ningbo, China.

300308.SZ.summary: Zhongji Innolight Co., Ltd. researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells intelligent equipment in China and internationally. The company offers motor stator coil winding equipment for use in various motor manufacturing fields, such as household electrical appliances, small and medium-sized industrial motors, automotive generators, and driving motors of new energy vehicles. It also provides optical communication transceiver modules for customers in data centers, data communications, long-distance transmission, wireless networks, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Shandong Zhongji Electrical Equipment Co., Ltd and changed its name to Zhongji Innolight Co., Ltd. in September 2017. Zhongji Innolight Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Longkou, China.

300317.SZ.summary: Jiawei Renewable Energy Co., Ltd. focuses on the research and development, production, and sale of lithium-ion batteries and systems. The company is also involved in the investment, construction, and operation of photovoltaic power stations. In addition, it provides solar landscape, low voltage landscape, and portable solar lights; retrofit, puff, and track lights; and smart security and camera floodlights. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Jiawei Photovoltaic Lighting Co., Ltd. Jiawei Renewable Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300324.SZ.long_name: Beijing Watertek Information Technology Co., Ltd.
300324.SZ.summary: Beijing Watertek Information Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the software and information technology service industry in China. The company offers embedded system testing products, as well as technical support and consulting services; equipment integrated support products; communication and command systems; electronic component testing services; navigation systems; self-controlled embedded operating systems; integration systems; and radio frequency hybrid-signal chip design services. It also provides tax information products and services; smart-city intelligent equipment and information service platforms; IWhereLink, a multi-source data integration software; IWhereServer, a big data service software; IWhereVideo, a video-related big data grid management software; and IWhereGlobal, a 3D data ball software. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.

300328.SZ.summary: DongGuan EONTEC Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of light alloy materials in China and internationally. It offers amorphous alloy products, CE parts, notebook parts, and structural auto parts for use in the consumer electronics, medical equipment, communications equipment, and automotive equipment, as well as in the aerospace, biomedicine, precision machinery, and other applications. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Dongguan, China.

300332.SZ.summary: Top Resource Conservation & Environment Corp. engages in the gas, water, and energy conservation and environmental protection businesses. The company is in involved in natural gas supply and pipeline operations; the provision of water treatment engineering services; and the research and development, production, and sale membrane products. It also engages in waste heat power generation energy conservation, flue gas treatment investment, and engineering activities. The company was formerly known as Top Resource Conservation Engineering Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Top Resource Conservation & Environment Corp. Top Resource Conservation & Environment Corp. was founded in 2007 and is based in Beijing, China.

300333.SZ.summary: SinoSun Technology Co. Ltd. provides paper based technology security product. It offers Paper grain, an impregnable security technology that has applications in the field of security instruments, commodities, and others; and Paper texture products to protect bank notes and re-control voucher from forgery, alteration, and cloning. The company is based in Shenzhen, China.

300334.SZ.summary: Tianjin MOTIMO Membrane Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of membrane materials, processes, modules, and equipment. Its products include hollow fiber UF and MF membrane element and equipment; FP membrane modules; submerged membrane filtration membrane modules; and drinking water devices. The company's membranes, equipment, and systems are used in the treatment of municipal wastewater and industrial water, such as power plant, steel, textile, domestic, petrochemical, food, drinking water, sea water pre-treatment, and other industries. It also provides technical guidance and after-sales services. The company exports its products to approximately 20 countries. Tianjin MOTIMO Membrane Technology Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Tianjin, the People's Republic of China.
