300341.SZ.summary: Motic (Xiamen) Electric Group Co.,Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and supplies insulation components for electrical transmission and distribution networks, and the electrical power industry. The company offers standard insulators, such as IEC pole insulators, capacitive insulators, and wall and pin bushings; embedded poles; and medium voltage OEM products, such as spouts and embedded poles for insulated switchgear. It also provides high voltage products, including GIS insulators, cable terminations, and hybrid fiber reinforced epoxy composite products. Motic (Xiamen) Electric Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China.

300342.SZ.summary: Changshu Tianyin Electromechanical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of refrigerator compressor parts in China. It offers mold design centers; overheat and overload protectors; current start relays; PTC starter relays; no power electronic starters; plastic suction mufflers for various refrigerator compressors; plastic spring supports/spring stands; junction boxes for various refrigeration appliances/terminal boxes of appliances; and integrated low power PTC starters. The company offers its products under the TY brand name. Changshu Tianyin Electromechanical Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Changshu, China.

300344.SZ.summary: Cubic Digital Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells steel frame foamed cement composite boards in China. Its products include shaped plates, grid plates, light boards, slabs, industry wall boards, slabs, and composite core roof panel. Cubic Digital Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, China.

300345.SZ.summary: Hunan Huamin Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in research, development, production, and sale of wear-resistant castings in China. The company provides integrated ball mill technology products, including Cr-Mn-W wear resistant cast iron grinding balls, integral step type lining plates, wear-resistant plastic and cast steel combined lining plates, split step type lining plates, and discharge grate rings; and programmable ion permeate technology products, such as piston rods, molds, pin and shaft sleeves, high strength bolts, wheel gears, clutch plates and brake pads, core shafts, piston rings, and valve rods. It also offers high-energy ion beam 3D spray welding technology products comprising rollers, wind turbine impellers, bucket tooth, glass plates, valve cones and valve seats, and ball mill liners. In addition, the company provides vanadium-titanium slag slurry pumps; multilayer roasting furnaces; hammers; clean coal powder upgrading furnaces; high-manganese steel ring gears; metal ceramic tubes for abrasion resistant faucets; metal ceramic erosion resistance arrow-type back-pressure valves; metal ceramic couplings for abrasion resistant oil well tubings; metal ceramic valve balls and valve seats of oil well pumps; anti-abrasion metal ceramic plungers; new generation slurry pump metal ceramic cylinder sleeves; abrasion/erosion resistant polycrystalline tungsten titanium ball valves; and crosslinked polystyrenes. The company was formerly known as Honyu Wear-Resistant New Materials Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hunan Huamin Holdings Co., Ltd. in July 2020. Hunan Huamin Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Changsha, China.

300350.SZ.summary: HPF Co.,Ltd provides integrated logistics services primarily in China. The company's integrated logistics services include lean land transportation, warehousing, and international freight forwarding services; and operates as an airline agent for Shenzhen Airlines and Air China. It also provides financial and value-added services, including money collection, advance payment, warehouse receipts pledging, and supply chain commodity sales services, as well as product packaging and barcode, insurance agency, sorting and combination, and product inspection services for shippers. In addition, the company offers ordinary freight, logistics center, domestic trade, logistics information consultation, domestic freight forwarding, and supply chain management and related ancillary services; and engages in the self-operated, and agent import and export business of various commodities and technologies, as well as undertakes international shipping agency business for sea, air and, land transportation. Further, it provides information loading, general freight, equipment leasing, business process reengineering, and business innovation services. Additionally, the company researches, develops, produces, and sells tablet computers, network players, and other network peripheral electronic products. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Huapengfei Modern Logistics Co., Ltd. and changed its name to HPF Co.,Ltd in July 2017. HPF Co.,Ltd was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300351.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Yonggui Electric Equipment Co., Ltd.
300351.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Yonggui Electric Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of connectors in China and internationally. The company offers rail transit connectors, such as EMU, city rail vehicle, traction, railway passenger, and special connectors, as well as axle equipment, accessories, and tools for railway vehicle systems; and new energy products, including high voltage high current, high voltage low current, signal, power, mating, photovoltaic system connectors, as well as charging interfaces, standard battery quick couplers, manual maintenance switches, wind power slip rings, accessories, and tools. It also provides communications connectors comprising D series high density type, D Series mixed type rectangular, D series power supply type rectangular, printed circuit, D series standard, RF coaxial, PWRBLADE power, M8 sensor, M12, YGC562 Goldfinger, LED round plastic waterproof, YGC565 series, PCB micro coaxial connectors, as well as AISG male plug terminals, accessories, and tools; and military anti-explosion connectors. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Tiantai, China.

300367.SZ.summary: NetPosa Technologies, Ltd. engages in the research and development of video management system platforms in China and internationally. It offers video networking systems, such as power video networking platforms, power social video resource pooling platforms, social resource access systems, mobile video surveillance platforms, comprehensive maintenance management platforms, servers, storage-type network hard disk recorders, network video coders and decoders, and matrix network control keyboards; and video cloud storage and video structured server products. The company also provides video image analysis systems, smart community security and protection systems, hyper-convergence live-action command systems, vehicle big data platforms, police big-data platforms, Internet human intelligence management platforms, and physical security information management platforms; video investigation applications; and dynamic face recognition systems. Its products are used in the urban public security, intelligent transportation and city, rail transit, intelligent building, and home security sectors. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300368.SZ.summary: Hebei Huijin Electromechanical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, marketing, and service of banking and financial equipment in China and internationally. The company offers banknote processing systems, banding machines, banknote strapping machines, tube binding machines, cash transit boxes, banknote shrink and packing machines, automatic debit card issuing machines, automatic check machines, stamp management systems, banknote sorters and counters, office equipment, etc., as well as consumables, such as strapping belts, security seals, banding tapes, and binding tubes. Its products are used in banks, government departments, insurance companies, securities firms, organizations, communities, schools, enterprises, and institutions. The company is also involved in sheet-metal processing, banking business process outsourcing, software development, etc. Hebei Huijin Electromechanical Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shijiazhuang, China.

300384.SZ.long_name: Beijing Sanlian Hope Shin-Gosen Technical Service Co., Ltd.
300384.SZ.summary: Beijing Sanlian Hope Shin-Gosen Technical Service Co., Ltd. provides technical and engineering contracting services in the polyamide industry in China. It offers EPC services of polyamide technologies, including polycondensation and filament crafts. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

300385.SZ.long_name: Wuxi Xuelang Environmental Technology Co., Ltd.
300385.SZ.summary: Wuxi Xuelang Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells industrial hazardous waste and sludge incineration disposal, flue gas purification treatment, and ash conveying processing systems in China and internationally. It supplies flue gas purification treatment systems primarily for use in waste incineration power plants; and ash conveying processing systems to steel enterprises. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Wuxi, China.

300388.SZ.long_name: Cecep Guozhen Environmental Protection Technology Co.,ltd.
300388.SZ.summary: Cecep Guozhen Environmental Protection Technology Co.,ltd. primarily engages in the municipal and industrial wastewater treatment business in China. The company is also involved in the design of wastewater treatment, industrial wastewater, on-site wastewater treatment system, sludge dewatering, and incineration projects, as well as integration and installation of equipment. In addition, it engages in the manufacture and sale of membrane manufacturing equipment; investment and financing services; and pipe network businesses. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Hefei, China.

300397.SZ.long_name: Xi'an Tianhe Defense Technology Co., Ltd.
300397.SZ.summary: Xi'an Tianhe Defense Technology Co., Ltd. engages in military equipment, smart security, integrated electronics, communication electronics, and smart coastal defense businesses in China and internationally. It offers short-range low-altitude three-dimensional defense equipment and digital system solutions, battlefield environment perception and big data application systems, training storage equipment, marine digital defense equipment and systems, underwater unmanned detection systems, digital oceans three-dimensional defense system, etc. The company also researches and develops reconnaissance and surveillance radars, photoelectric linkage detection equipment, terahertz security inspection equipment, intelligent sentries for border and coastal defense, and anti-UAV systems and other products. In addition, it provides digital and information solutions for three-dimensional security, such as border and coastal defense, and other areas. Further, the company offers communication electronics, such as chips for 5G applications comprising switches, LNAs, small signal amplifiers, and passive circulators, as well as integrates various sensors; and smart coastal defense products, including unmanned autonomous vehicle series products, multi-parameter detection systems, active and passive sonar, etc. Xi'an Tianhe Defense Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Xi'an, China.

300402.SZ.summary: Nanjing Baose Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and installation of special material pressure vessels and pipe fittings of titanium, zirconium, nickel, and stainless steel. Its principal products include refined terephthalic acid, methyl methacrylate, coal chemical, acetic acid, coal power, and other sets of equipment; and large hull parts, marine pressure vessels, deep submersibles, and attachment, as well as pipes and fittings for various special purposes. The company's products are used in petroleum, chemical, metallurgy, environmental protection, nuclear power, military industry, and marine engineering and other fields. It exports its products to the United States, Canada, Brazil, Germany, France, Britain, Egypt, South Africa, Singapore, Australia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Nanjing Baose Titanium Industry Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Nanjing, China.

300407.SZ.summary: Tianjin Keyvia Electric Co.,Ltd provides electrified railway and urban rail transit equipment in China. The company offers traction power supply and distribution automation systems, dispatching and integrated monitoring systems, industrial automation systems, auxiliary control systems for rolling stocks, monitoring and diagnostic systems, video security monitoring systems, disaster prevention alarm systems, wireless communication systems, access control systems, automatic ticket checking systems, electromechanical equipment monitoring systems, and passenger information system systems, as well as disaster prevention systems, and others. It is also involved in the development, manufacture, sale, engineering, and installation and service of software products; computer and mechatronics systems integration; and import and export business, as well as provision of technical consulting services. The company is based in Tianjin, China.

300411.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Jindun Fans Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of ventilation system equipment in China. It offers reversible axial and jet, axial and jet, mixed flow, centrifugal, ventilating cube, roof, and marine or navy axial and centrifugal fans, as well as mufflers, and air valves and inlets for use in metros, tunnels, nuclear power plants, naval ships, industrial and civil ventilation systems, etc. The company is based in Shangyu, China.

300412.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Canaan Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and marketing of pharmaceutical equipment. It supplies solid preparation and solutions. The company offers granulating, OEB high containment, tablet press, blending, capsule filling, coating, washing, dispensing, packing, water, and charging series products, as well as pharma bins and parts. It primarily serves pharmaceutical industry. Zhejiang Canaan Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Wenzhou, China.

300414.SZ.long_name: Sichuan Zhongguang Lightning Protection Technologies Co., Ltd.
300414.SZ.summary: Sichuan Zhongguang Lightning Protection Technologies Co., Ltd. provides various professional lightning protection solutions in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers lighting road, earthing products; and box type, power, signal, antenna feeder, combined, and smart SDP products, as well as provides lightning warning and monitoring systems. Its products are used in communication, buildings, wind power, photovoltaic, and LED luminaries sectors. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

300415.SZ.summary: Guangdong Yizumi Precision Machinery Co.,Ltd. designs, researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and services various molding machines in China and internationally. It offers injection molding machines, die-casting machines, rubber injection molding machines, and robotic automation systems, as well as high-speed packaging machines for use in various industries, including food packaging, beverage packaging, medical and healthcare, etc. Guangdong Yizumi Precision Machinery Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

300420.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Wuyang Parking Industry Group Co.,Ltd.
300420.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Wuyang Parking Industry Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, production, and sale of automation equipment in China and internationally. It offers intelligent parking investment, construction, operation, and integration services. The company provides intelligent parking solutions for government organizations, hospitals, schools, etc. It also offers automated production lines, logistics and intelligent warehousing systems, belt conveyor core devices, dry mortar mixing stations, concrete mixing plants, tubular busbars, mine safety equipment, solid state electronic hard disk products, and unmanned boats, as well as financial services. The company was formerly known as Xuzhou Wuyang Technology Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Wuyang Parking Industry Group Co., Ltd. in January 2018. Jiangsu Wuyang Parking Industry Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Xuzhou, China.

300422.SZ.long_name: Guangxi Bossco Environmental Protection Technology Co.,Ltd.
300422.SZ.summary: Guangxi Bossco Environmental Protection Technology Co.,Ltd. provides environmental services primarily in China. The company offers industrial environmental services, such as waste gas treatment; and water pollution management solutions and services, as well as supplies clean production technology and equipment. It also provides urban and rural environmental services, including urban black odor water treatment services; water supply and drainage integration projects; and sewage treatment system equipment. In addition, the company offers ecological restoration services comprising water and farmland restoration, oily sludge treatment, and mine and industrial site repairing services; and solid waste disposal and new energy development services, including domestic waste treatment, sludge disposal, hazardous waste disposal, and industrial waste disposal services. Further, it provides environmental impact assessment, inspection and testing, and design consulting services; and smart sanitation services. The company also exports its technologies and products to eastern Europe, the ASEAN, Russia, and South America. Guangxi Bossco Environmental Protection Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Nanning, China.

300423.SZ.summary: Sunfly Intelligent Technology Co., LTD engages in the research and development, production, and marketing of high and low voltage electrical equipment in China. It offers prefabricated substations, insulated busducts, cable bridges, etc.; and KYN-40.5, KYN28-12, MNS, L-GGD, L-GCS, L-GCK, XGN2-12, HXGN17-12, ZNYBW, and other series of products, as well as supplies CNPC and CNOOC materials. The company also exports its products to Russia, India, Malaysia, Iran, Angola, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Shandong Luyitong Intelligent Electric Plc. and changed its name to Sunfly Intelligent Technology Co., LTD in September 2020. Sunfly Intelligent Technology Co., LTD was founded in 2003 and is based in Laiyang, China.

300424.SZ.long_name: Guangzhou Hangxin Aviation Technology Co., Ltd.
300424.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Hangxin Aviation Technology Co., Ltd., an aviation technology oriented company, provides aircraft engineering and safety services in the People's Republic of China. It offers heavy and light maintenance, and component maintenance services; asset management services, such as aircraft project evaluation, asset disposal, aircraft teardown, design and manufacturing, engineering services, technical training, etc.; airborne equipment research and development; and aviation test equipment research and development. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

300425.SZ.long_name: Cscec Scimee Sci. and Tech. Co., Ltd.
300425.SZ.summary: Cscec Scimee Sci. and Tech. Co., Ltd. develops environment protection equipment in China. The company offers magnetic separation water purification equipment in metallurgy, coal, river, oil, car, sanitation, sludge treatment, and other fields. It also engages in sludge treatment activities. The company was formerly known as Scimee Sci.&Tech. Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Cscec Scimee Sci. and Tech. Co., Ltd. in October 2019. Cscec Scimee Sci. and Tech. Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300427.SZ.summary: Red phase INC. provides grid systems, power generation systems, and other products worldwide. The company was formerly known as Xiamen Red Phase Instruments Inc. and changed its name to Red phase INC. in February 2018. The company is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

300430.SZ.long_name: Beijing Chieftain Control Engineering Technology Co., Ltd.
300430.SZ.summary: Beijing Chieftain Control Engineering Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells production process automation systems for the biological and pharmaceutical industries in China. The company offers CTN production process control systems; fermentation production process control systems; and continuous offline automatic control systems. It also provides automatic control systems for starch production, starch sugar production, and fructose production, as well as solutions for the pulverization, mixing, and dispensing of sterile APIs. The company's products are used in the pharmaceutical, chemical, food, additive, power, and other fields. Beijing Chieftain Control Engineering Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Beijing, China.

300435.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Zhongtai Cryogenic Technology Corporation develops, designs, manufactures, and sells cryogenic equipment in China. The company offers packaged units, such as cryogenic liquefaction plants for liquefied natural gas; cryogenic purification plants for liquid nitrogen washing devices; and cryogenic separation plants for H2-CO separation units. It also provides cold box products that include liquefied natural gas, liquid nitrogen washing, ethylene, air separation unit, propane dehydration propylene, methanol to olefins/methanol to propylene, and carbon monoxide cold boxes. In addition, the company offers plate-fin heat exchangers, such as aluminum plate-fin heat exchangers and ethylene column overhead condensers/plate-fin vessels. It serves customers in the energy, chemical, metallurgy, electric power, liquefied natural gas, and modern coal chemical industries. Hangzhou Zhongtai Cryogenic Technology Corporation also exports its products to the United State, Europe, India, etc. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300440.SZ.summary: Chengdu Yunda Technology Co., Ltd. focuses on the development, production, and sale of rail vehicle system testing and control equipment in China. The company offers train driving, station attendant, dispatcher training, and rail integrated simulators, as well as railway rescue crane simulation training systems; and distributed logic control and detecting units in locomotives, and intelligent display units for trains, TCN complete train control systems, locomotive safety and fire protection monitoring systems, monitoring devices for the running gear of locomotives, and brake logic control units. It also provides track management automation systems, automation safety work platforms, integrated classes, and works disaster prevention systems; and metro security platforms, track management automation systems, locomotive equipment management information systems, management information systems for locomotive maintenance, and integrated management systems for servicing operations. Chengdu Yunda Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Chengdu, China. The company is a subsidiary of Chengdu Yunda Innovative Technology Group Co., Ltd.

300441.SZ.long_name: Ningbo BaoSi Energy Equipment Co., Ltd.
300441.SZ.summary: Ningbo BaoSi Energy Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of screw compressors and machine components in China and internationally. The company's products include screw compressor host machines; screw machines for coal bed methane, natural gas, oil and associated gas; whole machines; compressor accessories; and vacuum pumps, as well as other products. Its products are used in various fields of petrochemical, mining and metallurgy, and electricity. The company is based in Fenghua, China. Ningbo BaoSi Energy Equipment Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Yinuo Baosi Group Ltd.

300442.SZ.summary: Shanghai Precise Packaging Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells packaging machinery, integrated machinery, and three ring products in China. It offers in-line cup, full-automatic flexible packaging, full-automatic sterile flexible packaging, full-automatic sterile brick-type packaging, full-automatic UHT ultra-high-temperature tubular sterilization, sub-high-temperature sterilization, box filling, pipe sticking, hydraulic paper pushing/sterilize brick, and hydraulic paper embracing machines, as well as packaging materials. The company also provides integrated machineries, including high pressure homogenizers, spray pumps, and dispersion emulsifying machines; colloid mills and rotor pumps; plunger seal rings; homogenizing valves that are made of special ultra-hard materials; special and wear-resisting plungers; and hydraulic pressure regulating components, as well as single, double, and three-leaf pumps. In addition, it offers single-layer paddle-type stirring storage tanks, double-layer storage tanks, three-layer cold and hot tank series, SZ flash evaporation units, single-effect falling film evaporators, double-effect and multi-effect falling film evaporators, gyp drying machines, vibrated fluidized beds, power towers, cheese grooves, cheese production equipment, plate-type heat-exchange equipment, sheet bar and rubber blankets, and pasteurization machines. Shanghai Precise Packaging Co., Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China.

300443.SZ.summary: Jinlei Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the forging, heat treatment, machining, coating, and quality assurance activities. The company was formerly known as Shandong Laiwu Jinlei Wind Power Technology Co., Ltd. Jinlei Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Jinan, China.

300444.SZ.summary: Beijing SOJO Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the research, production, sale, and export of power distribution equipment and automation equipment in the field of power transmission and distribution networks. It offers medium voltage switchgears, including solid insulated switchgears/RMU, SF6 insulated switchgears, air insulated switchgears, and air insulated compact switchgears; outdoor switch/reclosers, such as medium voltage outdoor vacuum reclosers, medium voltage outdoor circuit breakers, and outdoor load break switches; and switchgear components and cable accessories. The company also offers dry type, oil immersed, power, and special transformers; compact pre-fabricated substations; low voltage products and systems, including fixed-type low voltage switchgears, withdrawable low voltage switchgears, and low voltage multifunctional switchboards; and relay protection and automation equipment comprising feeder terminal units, data transfer units, protection control equipment, communication controllers, and fault indicator equipment. In addition, it provides power quality mitigation devices, such as active power filters, static VAR generators, and smart three-phase unbalance regulators; and cable sectionalizing cabinets, including medium and low voltage cable sectionalizing cabinets. The company's products are used in electrical, railway, oil, underground, military, steel, coal and electrical vehicles industry, etc. It also offers energy solutions, such as EV chargers, distributed photovoltaic grid systems, and Li-ion battery separators. Beijing SOJO Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300448.SZ.summary: Haoyun Technologies Co.,Ltd. provides security solutions in China. The company offers cameras, precise positioning, storage, transmission, display and control, voice intercom, access control, anti-theft alarm products, and physical protection products. Its products are used in various applications, such as financial, public security, judicial, smart property management, and Internet of things. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Haoyun Security Technologies Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Haoyun Technologies Co.,Ltd. in July 2016. Haoyun Technologies Co.,Ltd.was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

300449.SZ.summary: Beijing Hanbang Technology Corp. provides solutions for the radio and television monitoring, intelligent security, and intellectual property protection industries in China. The company offers DVR and NVR products, HD-SDI cameras, IP cameras, infrared imaging cameras, and compression cards, as well as Internet application solutions. It also exports its products to the United States, Brazil, the United Kingdom, Poland, Romania, Turkey, South Africa, Russia, India, and internationally. The company is based in Beijing, China.

300450.SZ.summary: Wuxi Lead Intelligent Equipment CO.,LTD. develops, manufactures, and sells intelligent equipment in China. It offers products, such as Li-ion battery equipment, Photovoltaic equipment, 3C intelligent equipment, capacitor equipment, LEAD MES, intelligent logistics, and vehicle production line. The company was formerly known as Wuxi Lead Auto Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wuxi Lead Intelligent Equipment Co.,Ltd. in December 2015. Wuxi Lead Intelligent Equipment Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Wuxi, China.

300457.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Yinghe Technology Co., Ltd provides lithium battery production line solutions in China. It offers include automatic pulping machines, coating machines, roll press machines, cutting machines, pelleters, winding machines, die-cutting machines, laminating machines, assembly automatic lines, liquid filling machines, pre-charge machine, PACK automatic lines, etc. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300461.SZ.summary: Tanac Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and marketing of integrated automation systems and solutions worldwide. The company primary products include winding automation equipment, non-standard automation equipment, assembly automation equipment, test automation equipment, automation equipment, industrial robot application, intelligent factory, and others under the TANAC brand. It also provides after sale services. The company provides customized solutions for transformer inductance, machine manufacturing, consumer electronics manufacturing, automobile, household appliance, medical, and logistics industries. Tanac Automation Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Jiashan, China.

300462.SZ.long_name: Shanghai Huaming Intelligent Terminal Equipment Co., Ltd.
300462.SZ.summary: Shanghai Huaming Intelligent Terminal Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of automatic fare collection (AFC) equipment of metro rail transit, bus rapid transit, bus station, and related fields in China. It provides various series of products, including ticket vending machines, automatic gate machines, ticket checking machines, add value machines, booking office machines, encoders/sorters, etc. The company's equipment is also applied in pavilions, scenic spots, and entry guard systems. It offers modules of AFC for various systems, including barrier modules, thin ticket issuing and recycle modules, token ticket issuing and recycle modules, coin processing and dispensing modules, etc. Shanghai Huaming Intelligent Terminal Equipment Co., Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China.

300470.SZ.summary: Sinoseal Holding Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells fluid sealing products in China. The company offers mechanical seals for pumps, including contact and non-contact, spring mechanical/metal bellows, single, non-pressurized dual and pressurized dual, and general type and high performance seals. It also provides seals for agitators, such as seals for high/medium/low pressure agitators, sing/double/multiple seals, contact and non-contact seals, and wet and dry seals; and DGS seals for compressors and carbon ring seals, as well as other seals. In addition, the company offers seal support systems comprising wet and gas seal systems; seals for nuclear power; and rotary jet pumps, as well as UTEC products. Its products are used in the petrochemical, coal chemical, oil and gas transport, nuclear power, electricity, hydropower, pharmaceutical, metallurgy, food, shipping, aerospace, military, and other industries. The company also exports its products to Southeast Asia, Central Asia, the Middle East, and other regions. Sinoseal Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300475.SZ.long_name: Anhui Julong Transmission Technology Co., Ltd.
300475.SZ.summary: Anhui Julong Transmission Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of gear clutches for washing machines. It offers dual-drive, double-wheel, 16 kg large-capacity, and direct-drive motor deceleration clutches, as well as other series products; and finishing shafts. Anhui Julong Transmission Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Ningguo, China.

300477.SZ.long_name: Beijing Hezong Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
300477.SZ.summary: Beijing Hezong Science & Technology Co., Ltd. provides power distribution solutions in China. The company offers gas insulated ring main units, MV/LV air insulated switchgears, prefabricated substations, pole-mounted switches, distribution automation terminals, transformers, cable branching switchgears, and cable junctions, as well as electrical accessories, such as fault passage indicators and premolded cable connectors. It also provides energy management system solutions and distribution network automation solutions, as well as mobile substations. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.

300479.SZ.summary: Synthesis Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, sells, and services smart ID authentication terminals and industrial application software in China. The company offers ID authentication devices/terminals, in-counter clearance settlement/over-the-counter settlement/paperless office terminals, mobile integrated pad and multi-functional matched terminals, bank-hospital self-service devices, clinic-room payment terminals, conglomerate payment modules and e-scales, face-ID matching authentication devices/terminals, and industrial service robots. It also provides counter real name authentication, ID authentication over internet, telecommunication real name system and paperless service, digital community, livelihood e-station, quick payment, and computer vision services, as well as intelligent upgrading of self-service equipment and knowledge management systems. The company was formerly known as Shandong Synthesis Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Synthesis Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. in January 2016. Synthesis Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Jinan, China.

300486.SZ.summary: OMH Science Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells logistics convey systems, logistics storage systems, three-dimensional parking systems, and AGV industrial robots. The company's logistic convey products consist of friction conveyor systems, skid conveyor systems, and chain conveyor systems primarily used in automobile, medicine, electronic commerce, household appliance, mechanical, and other industries. It also offers ASRS, stereo garage, sorting and distributing, automated conveyors, and AGV products, as well as supply chain software. The company was formerly known as Shanxi Oriental Material Handling Co., Ltd. and changed its name to OMH Science Group Co., Ltd. in June 2020. OMH Science Group Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Taiyuan, China.

300490.SZ.summary: HNAC Technology Co., Ltd. provides EPC services and automation solutions to hydropower stations, substations, pump station, and water treatment projects in China and internationally. Its products include hydropower automatic systems, pump station automatic systems, intelligent distribution automate systems, water treatment systems, industrial process control systems, DCS control systems, solar power systems, and computer monitoring and control systems. It also offers engineering services, such as pre project consultation, project construction, personnel training, financing plan management, debugging, project design, quality control and assurance, and quality service and warranty, as well as procurement, logistics, and installation of complete sets of equipment. HNAC Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.

300491.SZ.summary: Shijiazhuang Tonhe Electronics Technologies Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and service of high frequency switch mode power supply and related products in China and internationally. The company offers modular switch mode rectifiers, controller systems, and DC power supply systems; EV charging stations, including compact and separated DC fast chargers, AC chargers, and charger modules; on-board chargers and DC converters; and railway signal power supply, special power supply, and EPS products, as well as PV grid-connected inverters. Shijiazhuang Tonhe Electronics Technologies Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Shijiazhuang, China.

300492.SZ.summary: Huatu Cendes Co., Ltd., an architectural design company, provides professional, designing, consulting, and engineering services to state-owned enterprises, multinational corporations, private companies, and institutions in China. The company was formerly known as Cendes Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huatu Cendes Co., Ltd. in January 2020. Huatu Cendes Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Xi'an, China.

300495.SZ.summary: Misho Ecology & Landscape Co.,Ltd. engages in the ecological restoration and environmental construction business in China. The company is involved in the ecological restoration and landscape, and eco-tourism activities, as well as resources recycling and agricultural product development. It also repairs and reconstructs ecological environment. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Misho Ecology Landscape Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Misho Ecology & Landscape Co.,Ltd. in April 2016. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

300499.SZ.long_name: Guangzhou Goaland Energy Conservation Tech. Co., Ltd.
300499.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Goaland Energy Conservation Tech. Co., Ltd. develops and supplies pure water cooling equipment for power electronic devices in China and internationally. It offers water cooling equipment for HVDC converters; flexible AC transmission and distribution thyristor valves; renewable energy converters; and high power electrical drive converters, as well as accessory water distributing pipes. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

300503.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Haozhi Industrial Co.,Ltd. designs, manufactures, sells, and repairs precision electro-spindles and related spare parts in China. It offers PCB, glass grinding, lathe, engraving, machining, grinding, woodworking, ultrasonic, engraving and milling motorized, hydraulic static, and straight and belt-type mechanical spindles; drilling centers; and reducer, turntable and pendulum, tool holder, linear motor, and chuck series products. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

300506.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Minkave Technology Co., Ltd. engages in undertaking lighting engineering projects in China. It undertakes projects in the areas of urban night planning, cultural tourism scenic spot, smart street light systems, and light shows. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Minkave City Lighting Technology Co., Ltd. Shenzhen Minkave Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300508.SZ.long_name: Shanghai Weihong Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.
300508.SZ.summary: Shanghai Weihong Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. provides motion control system solutions in China and internationally. It offers control cards; integrated and handheld CNC systems; servo drivers; and CNC accessories, including manual pulse generators and tool sensors. The company sells its CNC controllers for machine tool manufacturers. Its products are used in various industries, such as machining centers, laser and waterjet cutting, engraving and milling, mold making, advertising, glass and stone machining, etc. Shanghai Weihong Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300509.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Newamstar Packaging Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of beverage packaging machinery in China and internationally. The company offers pretreatment systems, including water treatment, processing, UHT, CIP, COP/SOP, and disinfectant blending systems, as well as carbon mixers; Starbloc, bottled water, container, aseptic, ultra-clean, CSD, hot-fill, and non-beverage combiblocks; blowing systems, such as bottle, container, and gallon blowers; and aseptic, ultra-clean, hot, water, gallon-water, CSD, liquor, condiment, edible oil, and daily chemical product filling systems. It also provides secondary packaging systems comprising conveyor systems, bottle warmers, bottle tilting systems, shower cooling tunnels, film and carton wrappers, sorting robots, robot encasers and palletizers, and mechanical palletizers; and automated warehouse systems, rail guided vehicles, automated guided vehicles, and warehouse management systems. The company is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

300510.SZ.summary: Jilin Jinguan Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design engineering, manufacture, construction, operation, and maintenance of power supply solutions for cities and communities in China. The company offers full gas insulated intelligent, semi gas insulated, and solid insulated ring main units, as well as outdoor ring main unit switching stations; fixed and movable high-voltage switchgears; vacuum circuit breaker and column switch series medium-voltage switchgears; box-type substations; and fixed, drawer, and fix partitioned low voltage switchgears. It also provides power cables and accessories, such as cold shrinkable cross-linked cable accessories, cross-linked cable silicone rubber GIS terminals, full cold shrinkable cross-linked cable silicone insulated joints and straight joints, and pull-type cable plug terminals. In addition, the company offers smart grid system, municipal engineering system, energy and chemical system, rail transit system, and international cooperation solutions. Jilin Jinguan Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Changchun, China.

300512.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Zhongya Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of packaging equipment for liquid products in China and internationally. Its products include filling sealing equipment comprising pouch filling equipment, such as aseptic soft-packaging forming filling sealing equipment; cup filling equipment, which include plastic cup forming, linear preformed cup, and rotary preformed cup filling sealing equipment, as well as PET cup forming filling sealing machines; and bottle filling equipment consisting of linear clean type and ultra clean type plastic bottle filling capping, linear aseptic plastic bottle filling capping, rotary plastic bottle weighing filling capping, and rotary plastic bottle filling sealing equipment, as well as blowing filling capping integrated machines. The company also provides bottle blow equipment, including full automatic and electric extrusion blow molding machines, full automatic injection blow and stretch blow molding machines, full electric injection stretch blow molding machines, and full automatic high speed rotary stretch blow molding machines. In addition, it offers downstream packaging equipment, such as sleeve wrapping, case packing and box packing, and stick product case packing equipment, as well as case packing machines; and integrated lines solutions comprising aseptic soft pouch product packaging, multi-pack product packaging, preformed cup product packaging, liquid ultra clean bottle beverage product, high volume bottle product packaging, pouch product downstream case packing, daily chemicals bottle product packaging, bottle carbonated beverage ultra clean, and preformed can product ultra clean production lines. The company's products are used in dairy, beverage, edible oil and grease, seasoning, household, and other industries. Hangzhou Zhongya Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300517.SZ.long_name: Haibo Heavy Engineering Science and Technology Co., Ltd.
300517.SZ.summary: Haibo Heavy Engineering Science and Technology Co., Ltd. engages in construction and installation of steel bridge structures in China. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Wuhan, China.

300521.SZ.summary: AMSKY Technology Co., Ltd researches, develops, manufactures, and sells industrial printing technology in China and internationally. The company provides 3D printing series and CTP series printers. Its products are applied in 3D printing, digital garment printing, electronic printing, inkjet ceramics, outdoor inkjet, and label printing. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Amsky Technology Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to AMSKY Technology Co., Ltd in May 2018. AMSKY Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

300527.SZ.summary: China Harzone Industry Corp., Ltd researches, manufactures, and sells emergency traffic engineering equipment in China. The company offers emergency hard mobile and soft mobile pavement equipment, plate beam bridges; modular engineering ships, steam cushion carriers, and water platforms; emergency repair of steel beams; and emergency assembling hangars and emergency aprons. It also provides emergency rescue disposal equipment, such as medical vehicles, high-power long-distance water supply and drainage special vehicles, and command vehicles; fire rescue equipment; and public emergency equipment, including emergency lighting products, non-woven masks, first-aid kits, gas masks, on-board emergency kits, emergency data lines, multi-purpose vehicle window breakers, and portable fire extinguishers. It offers its products for use in military and civil projects. The company also exports its products to approximately 40 countries. China Harzone Industry Corp., Ltd was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

300536.SZ.summary: Wuhan Nusun Landscape Co., Ltd. engages in landscape services in China. The company provides landscape construction, landscape architecture design, municipal public works construction, garden construction, and building decoration engineering contracts. Wuhan Nusun Landscape Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

300539.SZ.summary: Ningbo Henghe Mould Co., Ltd. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells precision injection molds. It is also involved in the injection molding and assembly of products. The company's products are used in home appliances, medical equipment parts, sanitary ware parts, laptop parts, electronic components, connectors, automotive parts, motors, pipe joints, etc. It also exports its products to the United States, France, Switzerland, Germany, Italy, Japan, etc. Ningbo Henghe Mould Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Cixi, China.

300540.SZ.long_name: Chengdu Shenleng Liquefaction Plant Co., Ltd.
300540.SZ.summary: Chengdu Shenleng Liquefaction Plant Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of cryogenic technology for liquefaction of varied gases in China. The company provides products, such as natural gas liquefaction plants, coke-oven gas liquefaction plants, coal-bed methane liquefaction plants, air separation units, tail gas from chemical plants and LPG/NGL recovery facilities, N2 and O2 liquefiers, energy storage facilities, LNG/LCNG refueling stations, large-scale cryogenic storage tanks, and booster turbo-expander units. It also offers process package design, equipment manufacturing, project management, project safety control, technical training, and after sales services. The company exports its products to the United States, the United Kingdom, Egypt, India, Indonesia, and others. Chengdu Shenleng Liquefaction Plant Co., Ltd. is based in Chengdu, China.

300543.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Longood Intelligent Electric Co.,LTD designs, manufactures, sells, and services electronic products in China and internationally. The company offers intelligent controllers and power supply products, battery management system (BMS) and battery packs, motors, and OEM assembly products. Its products are used in smart home appliances, power tools, lithium-ion battery BMS, LED and HID lighting, electrical motor systems, energy products, and other fields. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300545.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Liande Automation Equipment co.,ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells industrial automatic equipment in China and intentionally. It offers production supporting equipment and non-standard automation equipment for LCMs, OLEDs, and CTPs. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300548.SZ.summary: Broadex Technologies Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells integrated optoelectronic devices in the field of optical communications worldwide. The company offers built-in and external temperature-controlled array waveguide grating; fiber array; adjustable optical power wavelength division multiplexer; reflective and light blocking MEMS VOA; silicon-based dimmable attenuator; chassis, box, and bare fiber optical splitter; cabinet and box type PLC splitter; optical splitter with branch; dense fiber array; and optical fiber accessories. It also provides active optical cable, and optical transceiver module. In addition, the company provides wavelength management devices, such as optical power splitters and dense wavelength division multiplexing for fiber-to-the-home access networks and the Internet data center markets. Broadex Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Jiaxing, China.

300549.SZ.summary: Jouder Precision Industry (Kunshan) Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision die and mold components in China. The company offers precision components, including standard components for press, guide components, CAM units, NAAMS standard components, VDI standard components, nitrogen gas springs, coil springs, and other products, as well as marking units, urethanes, and other solutions for high-strength and thick sheets, and special materials. It also provides fixtures and gauges for automated assembly lines, bearing production, automobile safety parts production, and aerospace parts production; and table dies and medical equipment parts. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Kunshan, China.

300551.SZ.long_name: Shanghai Guao Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.
300551.SZ.summary: Shanghai Guao Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, marketing, and servicing of financial equipment. It offers banknote (coin) sorter, banknote sort assembly line, banknote discriminator, banknote sorting and binding machine, banknote binder, multi-currency banknote detector, banknote sorting and dispensing machine, full-auto banknote strapping machine, ATM, CRS, smart business terminal, bill teller system, receipt collecting system, etc., as well as currency identification instruments and counterfeit currency discriminators under the Gooao brand name. The company offers its products through sales network in China, Europe, America, Africa, Asia, and Oceania. Shanghai Guao Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300553.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Jizhi Mechatronic Co., Ltd. engages in the production and development of balance machine equipment in China. The company's products include electromechanical industry, auto parts, vertical, pump, and turbine balancing machines. Its products are used in automotive motors, household appliances, power tools, turbochargers, tire hubs, crankshafts, brake discs, clutches, flywheels, wind turbines, general motors, various types of fans, water pumps, impellers, blowers, petrochemicals, and turbo compressors. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300554.SZ.long_name: Nanjing Sanchao Advanced Materials Co., Ltd.
300554.SZ.summary: Nanjing Sanchao Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. develops and manufactures diamond and CBN tools for semiconductor and photovoltaic industries. It offers electroplated diamond wire saws, precision tools, cutting fluids, and diamond and CBN grinding wheels. The company provides its products for cutting, grinding, and polishing of silicon, sapphire, quartz, neodymium iron, boron, ferrite materials, ceramics, glass, hard alloy, and hard brittle materials. In addition, it offers ultra-fine and precision silicon slicing diamond wires, as well as professional technical services. Nanjing Sanchao Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Nanjing, China.

300557.SZ.summary: Wuhan Ligong Guangke Co., Ltd. provides optical fiber sensing safety monitoring equipment and IoT application solutions in China. The company offers sensors, demodulators and processors, and operating systems, as well as technical support services. It serves the petroleum, petrochemical, traffic tunnel, perimeter security, electricity, bridge, railway, and security monitoring and information integration sectors. The company was formerly known as WIT Optical Fiber Sensing Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wuhan Ligong Guangke Co., Ltd. in August 2002. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Wuhan, China. Wuhan Ligong Guangke Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of FiberHome Technologies Group.

300564.SZ.summary: Zhubo Design Co., Ltd. provides integrated design services in China. The company offers architectural design, urban planning, and landscape design services, as well as undertakes municipal works, including road, bridge, and water supply engineering works. It undertakes commercial, residential, landscape, health care, green building, cultural and sports building, factory housing, HOPSCA, hospitality and luxury resort, and interior design projects. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300569.SZ.summary: Qingdao Tianneng Heavy Industries Co.,Ltd manufactures and supplies wind turbine towers and related equipment. The company offers onshore wind turbines, and offshore wind power towers, as well as photovoltaic power plants. Qingdao Tianneng Heavy Industries Co.,Ltd was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Jiaozhou, China.

300581.SZ.long_name: Xi'an ChenXi Aviation Technology Corp., Ltd.
300581.SZ.summary: Xi'an ChenXi Aviation Technology Corp., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of aviation mechanical and electrical products. The company offers aviation inertial navigation products, such as flexible, fiber, laser, and piezoelectric strapdown inertial integrated navigation system; navigation computer components; aero-engine electronic products: aero-engine parameter collectors; and aero-engine electronic control systems. It also provides unmanned aerial vehicles; and aviation related professional technical services. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Xi'an, China.

300587.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Tiantie Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and marketing of track engineering rubber products in China. It offers track structures, such as rails, sleepers, and ballast; vibration damping products; isolated rubber damping pads; embedded rubber crossing boards and plates; conveyor belts; elastic components; and sealing products and other rubber products. The company also provides elastic support type non- ball track with rubber boots; rubber spring vibrators; rail waveguide absorbers; rubber wheel rims and grooves; cushioning pads and pavement products; railway rubber gaskets; and elastic integral bumper plates. Its products are used in urban rail transit, high-speed railway, heavy haul railway, ordinary railway, intercity railway, light railway, subway, and other rail transportation lines. The company also exports its products to Russia, the United States, Vietnam, Germany, Hong Kong, and internationally. Zhejiang Tiantie Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Taizhou, China.

300589.SZ.summary: Jianglong Shipbuilding Co., Ltd. designs and constructs customized commercial and defense vessels in China and internationally. The company's products include patrol boats and interceptors; passenger ferries and car ferries; sightseeing boats, such as fishing and cruise boats, and yachts; and work boats, including windfarm work boats, research and survey vessels, firefighting vessels, crew supply vessels, and pilot vessels. Jianglong Shipbuilding Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

300592.SZ.long_name: Hunan Huakai Cultural and Creative Co., Ltd.
300592.SZ.summary: Hunan Huakai Cultural and Creative Co., Ltd. provides space design, sand table model production, and digital multimedia integration services in China. It offers services for urban planning museums, museums, theme museums, humanities museums, and enterprise exhibition halls. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Changsha, China.

300593.SZ.summary: Beijing Xinleineng Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells power supply products in China and internationally. The company primarily offers DC-DC converters, AC-DC converters, DC-AC converters, rectifiers and high-power supply products, custom power supply products, primary and embedded power products, filters, etc. It provides power devices and power systems primarily for communication, railway, electric, industrial control, new energy resources fields, etc. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300597.SZ.long_name: Jilin Jlu Communication Design Institute Co., Ltd
300597.SZ.summary: Jilin Jlu Communication Design Institute Co., Ltd provides survey, design, and consulting services for communication engineering projects in China, Iran, Malaysia, and internationally. The company undertakes planning, feasibility study, evaluation, program design, project proposal, technical specification, optimization and technical consultation, and technology research and development in the field of communication. It serves clients in the communications, electricity, water conservancy, transportation, public security, banking, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Changchun Telecommunications Engineering Design Institute Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jilin Jlu Communication Design Institute Co., Ltd in May 2010. Jilin Jlu Communication Design Institute Co., Ltd was founded in 1985 and is based in Changchun, China.

300599.SZ.summary: Guangdong Xiongsu Technology Group Ltd. engages in the production and sale of plastic pipe fittings in China. Its principal products include pipe fittings for building and municipal water supply and drainage; pipe heating products for underground communication; electrical casings; and high-voltage power cable sheaths and other products. The company also offers PVC-U environmental protection drain pipes; PP-R environmental health drinking water and water supply pipes; polyethylene (PE) gas pipelines; PP-R and PVC boutique home improvement tubes and pipes; PE-RT heating pipes; PVC flame retardant wire channel tubes; carat tubes; winding tubes and bellows products; PE water supply pipes; communication and power tubes; and aluminum-plastic drinking water pipes. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Xiongsu Technology Industry Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Xiongsu Technology Group Ltd. in 2013. Guangdong Xiongsu Technology Group Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Foshan, China.

300600.SZ.summary: Changshu Guorui Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells marine and offshore engineering electrical/automation equipment. The company offers MV switchboards, marine circuit-breakers, LV controls and switchboards, ship monitoring, power electronicsts, ship handlings, and lighting monitoring. It also provides marine electricity systems and integrated technical services. The company was formerly known as Changshu Ruite Electric Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Changshu Guorui Technology Co., Ltd. in October 2020. Changshu Guorui Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Changshu, China.

300606.SZ.summary: Dongguan Golden Sun Abrasives Co.,Ltd. researches, manufactures, and sells medium and high-grade coated abrasive product tools in China. The company provides abrasive products that include water proof abrasive paper, dry anti-clog coated, and dry abrasive papers, as well as new material products and abrasive paper products in various shapes. Its products are applied in industries, such as car, clothing, leather product, bamboo product, furniture manufacturing, printing business, musical instrument, metal product, architectural decoration, 3C electronic product, glass, stone and gem processing, beauty care, optical communication, shipbuilding, and synthetic material industries. The company also exports its products to the United States, Russia, North America, Europe, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, Africa, and other regions. Dongguan Golden Sun Abrasives Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Dongguan, China.

300607.SZ.summary: Guangdong Topstar Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of industrial robots in China. It provides standard linear robots, abnormal equipment, solution systems, automation solutions, energy saving and information planning products, and Huiqi robots. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Dongguan, the People's Republic of China.

300611.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Meili High Technology Co., Ltd.
300611.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Meili High Technology Co., Ltd. provides automotive products in China. It offers suspension system springs, seat and interior springs, gearbox spring and spring assembly products, valve springs, stabilizer bars, hot coil series springs, precision springs, composite plate springs, tail door and clutch springs, fine stamping parts, and elastic stamping parts. The company provides precision injection mold and engineering plastic parts. Zhejiang Meili High Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Xinchang, China.

300613.SZ.summary: Shanghai Fullhan Microelectronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chips and solutions for video surveillance products in China. The company offers H.264 codec SoC, image signal processor IC products, and analog and IP cameras, as well as IoT and vehicle application products. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300617.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Ankura Smart Transmission Engineering Technology Co.Ltd
300617.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Ankura Smart Transmission Engineering Technology Co.Ltd engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of equipment for ultra-high voltage cable transmission lines and ultra-high voltage cable connectors in China. It offers porcelain sleeve terminals, composite terminals, GIS/transformer terminals, intermediate joints, and branch connectors, as well as smart grids. The company also provides gas pipeline bus, GIL casing, and GIL monitoring systems. In addition, it engages in laying materials, and monitoring and control of equipment; provision of design, construction, and equipment comprehensive professional services, including testing, operation, and maintenance; and developing gas pipeline busbar for large-capacity underground transmission. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Liyang, China.

300619.SZ.long_name: Foshan Golden Milky Way Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd.
300619.SZ.summary: Foshan Golden Milky Way Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, production, and sale of conveying, metering, mixing, dispersing, reaction, filling, packaging, online testing, central control, and other intelligent systems in China. Its products are applied in the fields of organic silicon, polymer compounds, lithium battery slurry, and biochemistry. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Foshan, China.

300621.SZ.summary: ShenZhen WeiYe Decoration Group Co.,LTD engages in the field of domestic architecture decoration in China. The company undertakes building decoration works; curtain wall for building; the electrical and mechanical design consultant and intelligence service; steel structure engineering comprising industrial and civil construction, municipal engineering, and factory building with steel structure and other projects; and industrial park construction. ShenZhen WeiYe Decoration Group Co.,LTD was founded in 1994 and is based in Jingzhou, China.

300631.SZ.summary: JiangSu JiuWu Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ceramic membranes in China. The company provides ceramic membranes element, module, machine lab and pilot, and filtration systems, as well as flat sheet membranes. It offers organic membrane modules, machine lab and pilots, and filtration systems. Its products are used in various industries such as food and beverage, bio-pharm, chemical and petro chemical, water and wastewater treatment, gas cleaning system, river and lake cleaning, and seawater desalination. JiangSu JiuWu Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Nanjing, China.

300635.SZ.summary: SinoDaan Co., Ltd. provides engineering consulting services in China. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Daan Project Management Co., Ltd. and changed its name to SinoDaan Co., Ltd. in April 2018. SinoDaan Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

300648.SZ.summary: Fujian Nebula Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells battery test equipment and solutions in China. Its product portfolio includes Li-ion battery pack PCM testers, Li-ion battery pack semi-product/end product testers, Li-ion battery pack cycle testers, power battery pack BMS testers, power battery pack EOL testers, power battery pack working condition simulators, ES inverters, wind-solar- charging-ESS control systems, automatic cell sorting machines, automatic cell and spot welding machines, Li-ion battery intelligent manufacture solution and MES, etc. The company also offers bidirectional inverters, charging piles, plasma cleaning machines, Li-on cell distance detection machines, polarity detect machines, cell holders uploading machines, and cell tidying machines, as well as laser welding and dispensing machines. Fujian Nebula Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.

300649.SZ.long_name: Hangzhou Landscape Architecture Design Institute Co., Ltd.
300649.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Landscape Architecture Design Institute Co., Ltd. provides landscape design services in China. The company was formerly known as Hangzhou Garden Design Institute and changed its name to Hangzhou Landscape Architecture Design Institute Co., Ltd. in 2002. Hangzhou Landscape Architecture Design Institute Co., Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300650.SZ.summary: Tecnon (Fujian) Commercial Lighting Co., Ltd researches, designs, develops, produces, sells, and services commercial lighting products in China. The company offers light fixtures, including track spotlight, recessed spotlight, downlight, linear light, wall light, and decorative light products. It also provides LED signage products; standard and customized LED display products; and rental LED display products. The company offers its products for use in retail shops, hotel chains, supermarkets, business spaces, and offices, as well as in the educational, jewelry, photoelectric, residential, urban landscape, and other industries. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Zhangzhou, China.

300656.SZ.summary: Shenzhen MinDe Electronics Technology Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells barcode scan instruments in China and internationally. The company's products include handheld barcode scanners, cordless barcode scanners, scan engines, image platforms, lightweight data terminals, etc., as well as software tools. It also provides OEM barcode scanner engine integration solutions for AIDC equipment manufacturer, such as mobile computer manufacturers, kiosk and factory process control equipment manufacturers, etc.; support services for various customization activities, including decoding software, barcode encryption, resizing and reshaping, etc.; and OEM production and design services. The company's products are used in manufacturing, retailing, postage, logistic, and medical service application domains. Shenzhen MinDe Electronics Technology Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300660.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Leili Motor Co., Ltd researches and develops, manufactures, and supplies micro-motors in China. The company offers micro-motors, such as micro stepping, synchronous, DC brush and brushless, HM hysteresis synchronous, U series, and stepper motors; and drain pumps, peristaltic pumps, electronic water pumps, and pump solution components. It also provides precision stamping parts, metal components, and automotive precision stamping parts; and electronic controllers and drives. In addition, the company is involved in equity investment, management consulting, and import and export trade activities. Jiangsu Leili Motor Co., Ltd was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

300662.SZ.summary: Beijing Career International Co., Ltd. provides recruitment solutions. The company offers executive search services; recruitment process outsourcing services; flexible staffing services, including short-term to long-term dispatcher hires, and project and staffing outsourcing services; recruitment consulting services; and talent assessment consultancy services. It also provides recruitment training services; campus talent search, campus recruitment event, and employer branding services; layoff design, compensation consulting, and labor dispute processing services; and knowledge-sharing think tank expert services, as well as payroll and tax solutions. The company serves multinational corporations, listed companies, fast-growing firms, non-profit organizations, government, etc. in Mainland China, Hong Kong, India, Singapore, Malaysia, the United States, the United Kingdom, and Australia. Beijing Career International Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300664.SZ.summary: Penyao Environmental Protection Co., Ltd. engages in the environmental protection equipment business in China. It manufactures and sells sewage treatment, water purification, environmental protection, and sludge treatment and disposal equipment. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Yixing, China.

300667.SZ.summary: Beijing Beetech Inc. develops, produces, and sells wireless sensor network related products in China. It offers industrial process wireless monitoring system solutions for use in the areas of smart industry, digital oil fields, smart grids, etc.; mechanical parameters wireless detection systems for use in the areas of equipment manufacturing, research and testing, teaching and experimentation, and defense research; and MEMS pressure sensor chip and module products for use in automotive and consumer electronics. The company is based in Beijing, China.

300669.SZ.long_name: Hangzhou Huning Elevator Parts Co., Ltd.
300669.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Huning Elevator Parts Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells elevator parts in China and internationally. It offers roller guide shoes, hydraulic buffer products, safety gear, rope brakes, UCMP products, electromagnetic rail clamp devices, and pulling devices. The company is based in Hangzhou, China.

300670.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Daybright Intelligent Electric Co.,LTD. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of distribution network automation products in China. It offers pole-mounted switch controllers, feeder automation terminals, and distribution automation terminals; digital circuit, voltage, motor, and distribution transformer protection, measurement, and control devices; communication management devices; digital standby power supply auto-input devices; outdoor high-voltage AC load switches and circuit breakers; and power transformation and distribution boxes, electric energy metering boxes, low-voltage cable branch boxes, metal-clad enclosed switch gears, low-voltage draw-out type switch cabinets, box type switching stations, and metal closed box and indoor AC high-voltage looped network switch gears. The company also provides maintenance and repair, consulting, and door-to-door services. It serves customers through sales outlets. The company is based in Nanjing, China.

300688.SZ.long_name: Dark Horse Technology Group Co., Ltd.
300688.SZ.summary: Dark Horse Technology Group Co., Ltd. operates business innovation and entrepreneurship service platform. Its programs include classes from universities, star startup forums, visits to incubators, startups, technology firms, and social events. The company also facilitates Chinese investments in startups and venture capital firms in Israel and in the United States; and brings international startups into China with funding via its VC and crowdfunding platforms. In addition, it provides a talent pool, where customers find business partners comprising investors, entrepreneurs, tech geeks, and professionals; and host events for investors and entrepreneurs. The company was formerly known as Dark Horse Venture (Beijing) Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Dark Horse Technology Group Co., Ltd. in June 2019. Dark Horse Technology Group Co., Ltd. is based in Beijing, China.

300689.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Chengtian Weiye Technology Co., Ltd.
300689.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Chengtian Weiye Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, sells, and services smart cards in China and internationally. It offers telecommunication cards, financial IC cards, ID cards, etc. The company serves mobile communications, financial payments, and public utilities markets. Shenzhen Chengtian Weiye Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300690.SZ.summary: Shandong Shuangyi Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, production, sale, and service of composite products in China and internationally. Its products include non-metallic mold machining products, including wind turbine blade, wind turbine nacelle cover, yacht, automobile integral car body, small airplane wing, and truck head end molds; wind turbine nacelle covers, such as nacelle and hub covers, and nose cones; and advanced composite material products comprising carbon fiber UAV shells, airplane nacelles, wing fuselage cowlings, panels, tubes, and special-shaped products. The company also offers engineering machinery cover body and agricultural machinery shell body products; public and rail transit products, which include automobile car bodies, air-condition covers, side roof plates, and front and rear lamps, as well as motor car head ends, motor car interior trims, bullet train integrated restrooms, and motor car cabs; and yacht and boat hulls consisting of luxury yacht, electric boat, rowing boat FRP, and pedal boat FRP hulls. In addition, it provides medical equipment shells, including CT machine, nuclear magnetic resonance FRP, ultrasonic wave FRP, X-ray machine FRP, and analysis meter FRP shells; and battery covers and bottom guard boards for automotive field. Further, it engages in the assembling of bottom guard boards. Shandong Shuangyi Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Dezhou, China.

300692.SZ.long_name: Anhui Zhonghuan Environmental Protection Technology Co., Ltd.
300692.SZ.summary: Anhui Zhonghuan Environmental Protection Technology Co., Ltd. provides urban sewage treatment and industrial waste water treatment services in China. The company is based in Hefei, China.

300693.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Sinexcel Electric Co.,Ltd. provides smart electric power solutions in China, rest of Asia, Australia, Europe, and North America. The company offers power quality products, such as active voltage conditioners, active harmonic filters, static var generators, ASVG products, SPC solutions, theta APF systems, Scada systems, and management systems, as well as SVG compensation technology. It also provides EV chargers modules for electric buses and vehicles, AC EV chargers, and DC fast chargers; hybrid and customized energy storage solutions; container type and centralized PV inverters; and lithium and lead acid battery packs. Shenzhen Sinexcel Electric Co.,Ltd. is based in Shenzhen, China.

300694.SZ.summary: Wuxi Lihu Corporation Limited. manufactures and sells turbo-charger components. The company develops, produces, and sells compressor and turbine casings. It offers shell and volute products. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Wuxi, China.

300700.SZ.long_name: Changsha DIALINE New Material Sci.&Tech. Co., Ltd.
300700.SZ.summary: Changsha DIALINE New Material Sci.&Tech. Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electroplated diamond wires in China. It offers diamond wires for silicon squaring and slicing, cropping, and silicon filament cutting; and diamond wires for sapphire and magnetic materials slicing, as well as diamond wire loops. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Changsha, China.

300708.SZ.summary: Focus Lightings Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of LED epitaxial wafers and chips in China. It offers white light chips for LED lighting applications, as well as provides contract energy management services. The company was formerly known as Jucan Optoelectronics Technology (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. Focus Lightings Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

300712.SZ.summary: Fujian Yongfu Power Engineering Co., Ltd. provides survey and design, planning and consulting, and general contracting business in the field of power generation in China and internationally. The company's services include power planning consulting, survey and design, EPC general contract, power energy investment, smart energy, and intelligent operation and maintenance services. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

300713.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Increase Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of power electronic products. It offers automotive charging power, power supply, communication power, industrial power supply, and other products. The company's products are used in automotive, electric power, railways, urban transport, metallurgy, energy, communication, and other industries. Shenzhen Increase Technology Shares Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300715.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Canlon Building Materials Co., Ltd.
300715.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Canlon Building Materials Co., Ltd. manufactures waterproofing materials and coatings in China.
