The company offers macromolecule membranes, such as MBP-P macromolecule, PVC waterproofing membrane, and CL-TPO thermoplastic; self-adhesive membranes, which include MBA-CL Cross laminated and PET self-adhesive polymer modified; and MPU white polyurethane waterproof membranes. It also provides solutions for residential constructions, waterproof projects of tunnels, steel structure, and wooden structure. The company is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

300718.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Changsheng Sliding Bearings Co., Ltd.
300718.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Changsheng Sliding Bearings Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells bearings in China and internationally. It offers metal-polymer composite, bi-metallic composite, bronze wrapped, metallic self-lubricating, and non-metallic self-lubricating bearings, as well as other bearings, such as air compressor swash plates, sintered bearings, steel sleeves, spherical bearings, and solid bronze alloy bearings. Its products are used in engineering machinery, fitness equipment, auto, logistics, mechanical, energy, industry, municipal, and household applications. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Jiashan, China.

300719.SZ.long_name: Beijing Andawell Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
300719.SZ.summary: Beijing Andawell Science & Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the aviation industry in the People's Republic of China. It manufactures airborne equipment, such as pilot and passenger seats, aircraft interiors, galley and lavatory systems, and related products for helicopters and aircrafts for military and civil customers; airborne electronic equipment, including radio altimeters and automatic direction finders, multimode integrated navigation devices, aero inner communication systems, and integrated standby flight displays; and PMA products comprises of cabin and passenger reading lights, LED lights, LCD displays, and passenger control units, as well as ovens and water heaters. The company also provides airborne electronic and mechanical equipment maintenance services; testing solutions consisting of on-site testing and automatic test equipment, and vibration health monitoring systems; and aircrafts retrofits services. Beijing Andawell Science & Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

300720.SZ.long_name: Guangdong High Dream Intellectualized Machinery Co., Ltd.
300720.SZ.summary: Guangdong High Dream Intellectualized Machinery Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells weighing machineries in China in China and internationally. It provides multihead weighers, loss-in weight feeders, metal detectors, and check weighers. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Foshan, China.

300722.SZ.long_name: Jiangxi Xinyu Guoke Technology Co., Ltd
300722.SZ.summary: Jiangxi Xinyu Guoke Technology Co., Ltd manufactures and sells military products. It offers blasting and silhouette equipment, silhouette rockets, cannonball storage devices, meteorological special technical equipment, human shadow blasting equipment, Internet of Things management systems, artificial weathering operation command platforms, special machinery and equipment, special blasting equipment, and multi-function laser raindrop spectrometers. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Xinyu, China.

300729.SZ.summary: Loctek Ergonomic Technology Corp. manufactures and sells ergonomic products in China and internationally. The company offers height adjustable standing desks, collaborative media wall products, desktop workstations, monitor mounts, exercise bikes, accessories, and TV mount solutions; and smart office lift tables, computer lifting platforms, ergonomic and multi-screen computer stands, children's study tables, anti-static sitting health cars, and TV mobile adjustment frames. Its products are used in IT Internet, financial securities, government agencies, education, and training industries. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

300732.SZ.long_name: Henan Provincial Communications Planning & Design Institute Co., Ltd.
300732.SZ.summary: Henan Provincial Communications Planning & Design Institute Co., Ltd. undertakes highway and municipal engineering projects in the Asia-Pacific, Africa, and Latin America. It constructs road and bridge, building, tunnel and underground, traffic and logistics, marine traffic, and international engineering projects, as well as offers comprehensive traffic planning, project supervision, inspection and reinforce, project survey and mapping, and digital image services. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Zhengzhou, China.

300743.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Todaytec Digital Co., Ltd manufactures and sells thermal transfer ribbons in China and internationally. The company offers wax ribbons, wax/resin ribbons, resin ribbons, fax ribbons, hot stamping foils, tattoo stencil papers, and jumbo rolls. Its products are used in inventory label, medical wrist strap, wash care, blood bank, medicare, logistice, engine, jewelry, tag, chemical barrel, ticket/bill, super market, nameplate, outdoor tag, and ID card copy applications. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

300746.SZ.summary: Hanjia Design Group Co., Ltd. engages in architecture and engineering activities in China. The company is involved in planning, architecture, landscape architecture, interior decoration and engineering of municipal administration, intelligence, curtain walls, and geotechnical engineering, as well as construction drawing review, energy saving assessment, and transportation assessment. Hanjia Design Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

300750.SZ.summary: Contemporary Amperex Technology Co., Limited engages in research and development, production, and sale of electric vehicle and energy storage battery systems in China and internationally. The company's Li-ion batteries are used in electric passenger vehicles, electric buses, electric trucks, and other special vehicles; and energy storage systems are used in renewable energy, grid frequency modulation, communication base station, commercial and industrial building, and household energy storage. Contemporary Amperex Technology Co., Limited was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Ningde, China.

300757.SZ.summary: RoboTechnik Intelligent Technology Co., LTD engages in designing, developing, manufacturing, and selling smart manufactory automated solutions in China. The company offers manufacturing execution systems; clean energy systems, such as diffusion processing automation systems, PECVD processing automation systems, PERC processing automation systems, tesing and sorting, and wet processing automation systems; and assembly and test lines for motor brushes, transformer coils, oil and water pumps, oil control valves, solenoids, VVT intake and exhaust systems, and central valves, as well as assembly lines for valve bodies. It also provides smart rack and storage, FPC layup, laser cutting, FPC sorting, FPC PSA, FPC multi-function testing and sorting, and product unloading machines, as well as bagged milk packaging automation systems. The company offers its solutions for clean energy, electronic and semi-conductor, and automotive, as well as food and pharmaceutical industry segments. RoboTechnik Intelligent Technology Co., LTD is based in Suzhou, China.

300763.SZ.summary: Ginlong Technologies Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells string inverters worldwide. The company provides single and three phase inverters; data logging sticks and boxes; rapid shutdown devices; and module level rapid shutdown devices, as well as after-sales services. It sells its products for home owners, business owners, utilities, solar developers, and investors in the residential, commercial, and utility scale solar markets under the Ginlong Solis brand. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

300767.SZ.summary: QuakeSafe Technologies Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells anti-seismic products and shock absorber products in China. The company offers building isolation rubber support block products, such as rubber bearings for building isolation; elastic slip bearings; and high damping rubber isolation bearings, as well as viscoelastic and metal mild steel dampers. It is also involved in the anti-seismic product testing; installation guidance and replacement; anti-seismic building monitoring; and after-sales maintenance activities. The company was formerly known as Yunnan QuakeSafe Seismic Isolation Technologies Co., Ltd. and changed its name to QuakeSafe Technologies Co., Ltd. in June 2019. QuakeSafe Technologies Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Kunming, China.

300771.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Zhilai Sci and Tech Co., Ltd.
300771.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Zhilai Sci and Tech Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and services lockers in China and internationally. The company offers delivery, refrigerator, barcode, RFID, APP, and charging lockers. It also provides after-sale services. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300772.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Windey Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells wind turbines and wind farm O&M products. It also provides wind farm planning, technical consulting, and construction services, as well as supplies spare parts. Zhejiang Windey Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300775.SZ.summary: Xi'an Triangle Defense Co.,Ltd produces and sells airplane structure parts, engine discs, and large and medium-sized die forgings in China and internationally. It serves the aviation, aerospace, ships, weapons, and nuclear industries. The company is based in Xi'an, China.

300778.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen New Land Tool Planning & Architectural Design Co., Ltd.
300778.SZ.summary: Shenzhen New Land Tool Planning & Architectural Design Co., Ltd. engages in urban construction activities in China. Its services include urban planning, architectural design, municipal design, transportation planning, low-carbon urban construction planning, landscape architecture design, land preparation and comprehensive development consulting services. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300779.SZ.long_name: Qingdao Huicheng Environmental Technology Co., Ltd.
300779.SZ.summary: Qingdao Huicheng Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. produces and supplies FCC catalyst and additives in China. It offers various formulations of FCC catalyst under the Essence, Enhance, Excel, Endure, Evoke, Agile, Attain, Extend, and Erudite names; and Y and NaX zeolite, specialty alumina, and aluminosilicates for various applications. The company also provides FCC additives, such as HCSP, a ZSM-5 additive; HCSO, a ZSM-5 additive focused on gasoline octane improvement; HIPA, a ZSM-5 additive with enhanced gasoline cracking; HCBA, a butylene selective ZSM-5 additive; VTRAC, a metal and vanadium trap; STRAC, a Sox reduction additive; and BUA, a bottoms upgrading additive. In addition, it offers technical services, including catalyst formulation, routine analytic and on-site visit, and pilot plant services. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Qingdao, China.

300780.SZ.summary: Sichuan Dawn Precision Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pulley, bushing, and other mechanical transmission parts in China. It provides pulleys, gears, sprockets, timing pulleys, couplings, locking assemblies, bushes, gear motors, machine tool accessories, industrial belts, and other machinery spare parts. The company also offers its products through online. Sichuan Dawn Precision Technology Co., Ltd. also exports its products to the regions of Europe, North America, Asia and Africa. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Dwan Drive Machinery Limited Liability Company and changed its name to Sichuan Dawn Precision Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2015. Sichuan Dawn Precision Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Meishan, China.

300786.SZ.long_name: Qingdao Guolin Environmental Technology Co., Ltd.
300786.SZ.summary: Qingdao Guolin Environmental Technology Co., Ltd., along with its subsidiary, engages in the design and manufacture, installation, debugging, and maintenance of ozone equipment. The company offers large ozone generators, middle ozone generators, small ozone generators, ozone generators for swimming pools, ozone generators for space, high-concentration ozone dissolved water machines, ozone disinfector, porous diffusers, oxygen generators, titanium diffusion sticks, and injectors. It also provides pressure vessels, such as adsorption air dryers, ozone mixing oxidation towers, PSA oxygen generators, ozone generation tanks, and pressure gas storage tanks; transformers, including dry type air core reactors, flat wave reactors, line reactors, control transformers, and dry type transformers; piezoelectric ceramics comprising needle selection ceramic plates, atomization ceramic plates, piezoelectric vibrating plates, tire balancing machine sensors, piezoelectric power generation ceramic pieces, ultrasonic cleaning oscillators, and ultrasonic cleaning ceramic plates; and glyoxalic acid crystals. Qingdao Guolin Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Qingdao, China.

300789.SZ.summary: Chengdu Tangyuan Electric Co.,Ltd. operates as a rail transit operation and maintenance solution provider in China. It also develops, manufactures, and sells inspection and monitoring, and information management systems. The company's products include car contact network detection, car contact network HD imaging monitoring, contact network ground detection and monitoring, track and tunnel inspection and monitoring, diagnostic and evaluation, and management information systems. It offers traction power supply and public works engineering services for the rail transit industry. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300795.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Meorient Commerce Exhibition Inc. provides convention and exhibition services. It organizes the HOMELIFE, the China's household products fair in seven countries, including the Middle East, North Africa, South America, Central Asia, and other places. The company's exhibitions also include the MACHINEX, a global machinery show; and the SILKSHOW, a silk fair, and GOCHINA, a China merchant's global sourcing fair, which provides online precision trade matching service. It serves companies, and professional and bulk buyers. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300797.SZ.summary: NCS Testing Technology Co., Ltd. provides third-party testing services in China. The company offers testing services, including chemical composition testing, mechanical property testing, material failure analysis, nondestructive testing, and measurement calibration services, as well as proficiency testing services. It also develops and sells analysis and testing instruments, NDT equipment, certified reference materials, and other products; and provides anti-corrosion products, as well as related engineering services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. NCS Testing Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Iron & Steel Research Institute Group Co., Ltd.

300800.SZ.summary: Lihe Technology (Hunan) Co., Ltd. manufactures monitoring instruments for environmental automation. The company offers automatic water quality monitoring systems, air/smoke automatic monitoring systems, emergency testing products, and automated laboratory equipment, as well as an integrated information management platform for environmental monitoring. It also provides system integration and operational services. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Changsha, China.

300809.SZ.summary: Hiecise Precision Equipment Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacturing, delivery, installation, and maintenance of fully automatic CNC roll grinders. Its products are used in hot-rolled steel sheet, medium-thick steel strip, headless strip, home appliance board, tinplate and auto sheet cold rolling line, aluminum foil and mirror aluminum wire, copper plate strip, non-woven fabric production line, paper production line, machinery manufacturing and other fields. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Kunshan, China.

300812.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Etmade Automatic Equipment Co., Ltd.
300812.SZ.summary: Shenzhen ETmade Automatic Equipment Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells equipment for the flat panel display industry in China. The company offers liquid crystal display module, liquid crystal glass manufacturing, touch screen, and OLED display equipment. Its products include fully automatic medium and small size polarizing attachment equipment; full fitting equipment; backlight assembly equipment; and semi-automatic film attachment equipment. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300817.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Sf Oilless Bearing Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells sliding bearing/bushing series products in China. The company offers self-lubricating, boundary lubricating, solid lubrication, and oil or grease lubricating bearings, as well as sliding blocks, shock absorber parts, and gear pump bushing blocks. Its products have applications in the fields of hydraulic system, car and truck, engineering machinery, die/mold industry, office equipment, steel metallurgy, industrial automation, agricultural machinery, clean source of energy, oil drilling platform, medical devices, injection molding of plastics, and pressure diecasts. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Jiashan, China.

300818.SZ.summary: Naipu Mining Machinery Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, distributes, and services mining equipment and spares in China and internationally. It offers slurry pumps and rubber wet ends, hydrocyclones, rubber mill liners and trommels, rubber stators and impellers for flotation machines, rubber and polyurethane screen panels and plates, steel and rubber composite pipes, and hard-wall mining hoses for use in the mine, metallurgy, iron and steel, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Jiangxi Naipu Mining Machinery and New Materials Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Naipu Mining Machinery Co., Ltd. in August 2020. Naipu Mining Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shangrao, China.

300820.SZ.summary: Sichuan Injet Electric Stock Co.,Ltd. engages in research and development, production, and sale of electronics, microelectronics and power electronics, and other control equipment. Its products include AC DC power supply modules, induction heisting, polysilicon CVD reactor power system, polysilicon ingot furnace power supply, single crystal furnace power supply, sapphire furnace power supply, special power supply, power controller and system, active power filter, and other power products, as well as industrial power system solutions. The company sells its products in the United States, Japan, South Korea, Russia, India, Turkey, Mexico, Thailand, Kazakhstan, and other countries and regions. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Deyang, China.

300822.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Bestek Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of smart controllers and smart products. Its products include lithium battery intelligent control protection devices and motor controllers; and smart induction lamps. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300823.SZ.summary: Tjk Machinery (Tianjin) Co., Ltd. manufactures reinforcement steel processing machines in China and internationally. The company provides coil and bar stirrup benders; cutters, benders, shear lines, and bending and shaping centers; rotor and roller type wire straightening machines; cage making machines; cold rolling and drawing machines; lattice girders; and reinforcement, fine and livestock, and mesh cutter and bender wire meshes. It also offers accessory devices, including payoffs and lifting devices. Tjk Machinery (Tianjin) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Tianjin, China.

300826.SZ.long_name: NanJing Research Institute of Surveying, Mapping & Geotechnical Investigation, Co.Ltd
300826.SZ.summary: NanJing Research Institute of Surveying, Mapping & Geotechnical Investigation, Co.Ltd provides surveying and mapping services in China. The company is involved in various activities, including surveying and mapping geographic information, survey and geotechnical design, three-dimensional urban planning and design, smart city system integration, urban and rural planning, municipal construction, and environmental protection. It also provides topography, pipeline, and urban construction facility survey, as well as geological exploration design and precision measurement services; and offers smart drainage and garden systems, underground space systems, and subway operation monitoring solutions. The company is based in Nanjing, China.

300833.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Haoyang Electronic Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production engineering, manufacture, sale, and service of professional stage, TV, concert, theatre and architectural lighting products worldwide. It offers entertainment HID products, such as moving heads, follow spots, EOLs, and accessories; Entertainment LED products comprising moving heads, theatre fixtures, static fixtures, and EOLs; and indoor and outdoor architainment products, as well as LED displays, including indoor and outdoor, and EOL displays. The company markets its products under the TERBLY brand name. Guangzhou Haoyang Electronic Co.,Ltd. is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

300835.SZ.summary: Sinomag Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of permanent ferrite and commutator products. Its products are used in the automobile, transportation, home appliance, electric tool, fitness equipment, and other markets. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.

300836.SZ.summary: Kunshan TopA Intelligent Equipment Co.,Ltd offers intelligent manufacturing equipment and components, and related technical services primarily for vehicle and consumer electronics markets in China and internationally. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Kunshan, China.

300838.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Linuo Flow Control Technology Co.,Ltd
300838.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Linuo Flow Control Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, design, production, and sale of fluid control equipment in China and internationally. The company offers segment ball, knife gate, ball, globe control, and butterfly valves; and actuators. It serves energy, petrochemical, metallurgy, chemical, paper, environmental protection, pharmaceutical, and mining industries. Zhejiang Linuo Flow Control Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2003 and is based in Ruian, China.

300843.SZ.summary: Shenglan Technology Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells electronic connectors and precision components. The company offers Type-C series, USB connector, FFC/FPC, connector assembly, WAFER connector, and wiring harness products; new energy products; and TV lens. Its products are used in the consumer electronics, new energy vehicles, and other fields. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Dongguan, China.

300850.SZ.long_name: Luoyang Xinqianglian Slewing Bearing Co., Ltd.
300850.SZ.summary: Luoyang Xinqianglian Slewing Bearing Co., Ltd. manufactures heavy duty slewing bearings for industrial purposes in China and internationally. The company offers four-point contact ball, double row ball, three-row roller, ball-roller combination, and cross-roller slewing bearings. Its products are used in various applications, which include cranes, wind turbines, tunnel boring machines, concrete pump trucks, CT scanners, stackers and reclaimers, etc. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Luoyang, China.

300851.SZ.long_name: Beijing Jiaoda Signal Technology Co., Ltd.
300851.SZ.summary: Beijing Jiaoda Signal Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells railway transportation security devices in China. The company offers balise transmission modules (BTM), track circuit readers, lineside electronic units, balise telegram programmers, transparent data loop, and transparent data and fixed data balise products; on-board cab signaling equipment, track circuit readers, cab signaling plugin boards for railcar, and digital general cab signaling equipment; and onboard cab signaling data recorders, BTM recorders, remote monitoring systems, and telegram encoding systems. Its products are used in railway, urban transit, and other projects. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China.

300853.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Shenhao Technology Co.,LTD. engages in research and development of artificial intelligence, data monitoring, smart grid, and other industrial health-related technology products. The company offers wheeled intelligent inspection robots, health guardian robots, disinfection robots, and smart helmet systems. Its products are used for patrol inspection and online monitoring of industrial equipment. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300861.SZ.summary: Yangling Metron New Material Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells electroplated diamond wires and tools. The company's diamond wires are used in various applications, including silicon slicing, crystal and magnetic material cutting, and sapphire cutting and squaring. It has strategic partnership agreements with GCL-Poly, JinkoSolar, Longi, etc. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Yangling, China.

300865.SZ.summary: Chengdu Dahongli Machinery Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells sand, gravel, and mining equipment in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers crushing, sieving, washing, and conveying equipment, as well as accessories for use in the areas of construction aggregates, mining, cement, and green crush. The company is headquartered in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

300867.SZ.summary: Shengyuan Environmental Protection Co.,Ltd. engages in the waste incineration power generation, sewage treatment, etc. in China. The company is involved in the collection, transportation, and terminal treatment of domestic garbage. It has five sewage treatment plants and one landfill leachate treatment station. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Xiamen, China.

300870.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Honor Electronic Co., Ltd. manufactures switching power adapters and provides IPC power solutions worldwide. It offers quick chargers, type-C chargers, PD power supply devices, and intelligent home devices under the HONOTO and ASPOWER brands. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300873.SZ.summary: Hichain Logistics Co.,Ltd. provides integrated logistics services to computing, television, and consumer electronics manufacturing and trading companies in China and internationally. The company offers transport management, warehousing, and customs clearance services. It also provides international import/export air freight forwarding, land transport, warehouse storage, charter flight, air cargo allotment, cargo shipping, packaging, cargo loading and unloading, international multimodal transport, distribution, transit, long and short haul transport, and international exhibits services; and operates as an entrusted agent for cross border cargos covering custom declarations, inspections, insurance, and custom documentations. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Suzhou, China.

300875.SZ.summary: Tianjin Jieqiang Power Equipment Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells nuclear, chemical, and biological defense equipment for the military industry. Its products include hydraulic and electric drive systems, hydraulic self-generators and air compressors, and decontamination devices. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Tianjin, China.

300879.SZ.summary: Ningbo Daye Garden Machinery Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells garden power tools and garden watering products in China and internationally. It offers cordless garden tools, petrol lawnmowers, electric lawnmowers, electric grass trimmers, blower vacs, cultivators, snow throwers trimmers and brush cutters, and robotic mowers. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Yuyao, China.

300884.SZ.summary: Dnake (Xiamen) Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells video intercom products and smart community systems to the customers worldwide. It offers a range of intercom products, such as SIP and android video door phone, analogue video door phone, smart home product, and wireless video doorbell. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China.

300885.SZ.summary: Yangzhou Seashine New Materials Co.,Ltd. engages in the design, production, and marketing of various powder metallurgy structural parts in China. The company offers external gears, bevel gears, gear rings, double teeths, sprockets, rotors, eccentric cams, swing arms, etc. Its products are applied in electric tools, automobiles, household appliances, office applications, etc. The company also exports its products to the United States, Germany, the Czech Republic, Hungary, Russia, Brazil and Mexico, India, Japan, the Philippines, Malaysia, and Hong Kong. Yangzhou Seashine New Materials Co.,Ltd. is based in Yangzhou, China.

300887.SZ.summary: Pony Testing Co., Ltd. provides testing services and solutions in China and internationally. It offers testing services in the areas of health, safety, and environmental protection, such as food, agricultural products, pharmaceuticals, health products and cosmetics, water quality, occupational health, genetic, environmental monitoring, and medical inspection. The company also provides testing in area of trade compliance, including RoHS testing in electrical and electronic products, factory inspection, products acceptance, hazardous substances testing and control, WEEE evaluation services, REACH directive technological services, ErP test, and reliability assessment, as well as safety, EMC, and failure analysis. In addition, it offers services in products quality identification field comprising testing of toys, children products, daily consumables, textiles, clothing, leather products, shoes, automobiles, and electrical and electronic products. The company is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300899.SZ.summary: Keysino Separation Technology Inc. engages in the consulting, design, manufacture, installation, commissioning, and maintenance of membrane separation equipment for various industrial fluid users. The company offers high-concentration brine recycling, industrial waste alkali recycling, industrial waste acid recycling, microcrystalline filtration, high COD wastewater treatment, CIP cleaning solution recycling, dyeing and printing wastewater treatment and recycling, pulping and papermaking waste liquid resource utilization, inorganic membrane, organic ultra/nano filtration, electrically-driven membrane, and ion exchange systems. Its filtration equipment is used in petrochemical, steel metallurgy, textile printing and dyeing, food fermentation, bio-pharmaceutical, and pulp and paper industries. Keysino Separation Technology Inc. was founded in 2015 and is based in Shanghai, China.

300900.SZ.summary: Guanglian Aviation Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the design and manufacture of drones, aircraft parts, composite materials, and aviation technology equipment in China. The company offers composite molding materials and aircraft tooling assemblies, as well as aircraft components, and composite and spare parts. Its customers primarily include military units, engine manufacturers, scientific research institutes, scientific research production units, and military research institutes. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Harbin, China.

300902.SZ.summary: Guoanda Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of fire extinguishing equipment. It serves customers in various sectors, including transportation, power grid, wind power generation, underground pipe network, financial, and mobile communications. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Xiamen, China.

300907.SZ.summary: Kangping Technology (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of electric tool motors, electric tool complete machines, and related parts and accessories. The company is based in Suzhou, China.

300912.SZ.summary: Kailong High Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and after-sales service of SCR exhaust after-treatment products. It offers light and heavy duty diesel, marine/stationary engine, gasoline engine, and CNG engine after treatment systems, as well as diesel particulate filters, exhaust treatment devices for tunnel/industrial stoves, vehicle exhaust heating systems, auto temperature-control cooling systems of engine, centralized lubrication systems of passenger-carrying chassis, eddy current retarders, carriers and catalytic products, components and parts of bus, etc. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Wuxi, China.

300913.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Zhaolong Interconnect Technology Co., Limited
300913.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Zhaolong Interconnect Technology Co., Limited manufactures and sells data communication cables and components in China and internationally. The company offers internal and external high-speed cables and solutions for cloud computing big data center switching and storage products; communication and data center cables; industrial and medical cables; and data, audio-visual, and control signal transmission and connection solutions for high-definition multimedia devices, VR wearable devices, PCs, drones, and other consumer products. Its products are used in communications and data centers, industrial and medical, high-end consumer electronics, and smart home and other fields. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Deqing, China.

300916.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Longtech Smart Control Co., Ltd.
300916.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Longtech Smart Control Co., Ltd engages in the research and development of printed circuit boards for intelligent controllers. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300923.SZ.summary: Yeal Electric Co.,Ltd manufactures equipment for the railway sector. It offers driver control, electrical screen operation control, lighting control, under car control, power supply control, and electrical connection (harness) systems. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in Changchun, China.

300929.SZ.long_name: Anhui Huaqi Environmental Protection Technology Co., Ltd.
300929.SZ.summary: Anhui Huaqi Environmental Protection Technology Co., Ltd. offers sewage treatment plants. It engages in the technical research of biological aerated filter, engineering design, EPC, pollution control facility operation, BOT investment, and development and production of the matched products. It provides integrated sewage treatment equipment; vehicle-mounted treatment equipment; decontamination desanding products comprising micro-filter for BAFrotary and BAF special microfiltration machine-flat; methanol dosing; and BAF pool equipment. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Maanshan, China.

300931.SZ.summary: GENERAL Elevator Co., Ltd. manufactures and services green elevators worldwide. The company manufactures passenger, panoramic, high-speed, stretcher, and sickbed elevators; freight, car, and dumbwaiter elevators; and commercial escalators, heavy-duty public escalators, and moving walks. It also provides elevator installation and modernization; escalator and autowalk modernization; and intelligent building upgrade solutions. GENERAL Elevator Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Suzhou City, China.

300932.SZ.summary: Sanyou Corporation Limited engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of relays in China. It produces various types of relays, such as magnetic latching relays, general power relays, automotive relays, and communication relays that are used in home appliances, traffic, industry, energy, information, medical treatment, and other fields. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.

300933.SZ.summary: Sinostar Cable Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells wires and cables, and its accessories. The company's products include power cables, electrical equipment wires and cables, bare wires, special cables, and cable accessories. Its products are used in electric power, energy, coal, transportation, petroleum, petrochemical, national defense, urban construction, and other fields. Sinostar Cable Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Yixing, China.

300936.SZ.long_name: Changzhou Zhongying Science & Technology Co., Ltd
300936.SZ.summary: Changzhou Zhongying Science & Technology Co., Ltd manufactures electronic components. The company is based in Changzhou, China.

300938.SZ.summary: EMTEK (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. operates as a third-party testing institution in China. The company provides schedule site testing and certification validation, as well as research and development services. It serves customers in the daily consumer goods, new energy, industrial products and components, life science, etc. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300943.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd.
300943.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells flow control valve and control systems. The company offers 4-Way reversing valves, expansion valves for car air conditioner, electronic expansion valves, solenoid valves, proportional valves for oil machine, hydraulic valve assemblies for boilers, ABS hydraulic regulators, and gas regulation systems. It also offers other equipment and components, analysis instrument, leisure and comfort shoes, power transmission and transformer, boiler and furnace, power transmission and transformer, solenoid valve, gate valve, meter for liquid and gas, elevator, brake, solenoid valve, generator parts and accessories, physical measuring meter, heater and heat exchange, gasoline and gas pump, pipe and tube, other auto parts, other valves, meter for liquid and gas, and other valves. Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Shaoxing Chunhui Refrigeration Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. in November 2001. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shangyu, China. Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Zhejiang Chunhui Group Co.,Ltd.

300946.SZ.summary: Hengda New Materials (Fujian) Co.,Ltd produces, sells, and services metal materials in China and internationally. It offers rule die steel, steel rules, utility knifes, bi-metal band saw blades, bi-metal strips, circular saw blades, CNC circular saw machines, cutting machines, and five-axis linkage jewelry engraving machines. The company was formerly known as Putian Hengda Machinery and Electricity Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hengda New Materials (Fujian) Co.,Ltd in 2018. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Putian, China.

300947.SZ.long_name: Shanghai DOBE Cultural & Creative Industry Development (Group) Co. LTD.
300947.SZ.summary: Shanghai DOBE Cultural & Creative Industry Development (Group) Co. LTD. engages in the design, project management, investment, and operation of cultural and creative industrial parks in China. It also provides entrepreneurial, brand promotion, financial consulting, and business registration services. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Shanghai, China.

300948.SZ.summary: Qingdao Guanzhong Ecology Co., Ltd. engages in the ecological restoration and urban environmental construction businesses in China. It undertakes vegetation restoration, and landscaping and municipal public utilities construction activities. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Qingdao, China.

300950.SZ.summary:
Doright Co.,Ltd. engages in the design, research and development, manufacture, inspection, sale, and servicing of energy-saving environmental protection equipment in China. Its products include energy-saving heat exchange equipment, including heat exchangers, high-temperature air preheater, waste heat boiler, rotary dryer, new energy saving type ceramic fiber fire box, and quench boiler; cryogenic heat exchanger with pin-tube type, reactors, atmospheric pressure vessels and tanks, and tower piece; and powder and exhaust environmental protection equipment, including harrow dryer, carbon black feeder, pin tube heat exchanger, installation and maintenance of pressure pipelines, wet pelletizer, dry pelletizer, pigment pelletizer, rotary dryer, waste heat boiler, quench boiler, and carbon black feeding pump
 The company provides clean combustion and energy-saving heat transfer solutions for customers in the fields of chemical, energy, metallurgy, and sludge and waste incineration industries. It also operates in Europe, North America, South America, Oceania, Africa, and the rest of Asia. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Qingdao, China.

300953.SZ.summary: Ningbo Zhenyu Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures molds and dies. It specializes in progressive die and rotor die casting that are used for stator and rotor motor laminations. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Ningbo, China.

300958.SZ.summary: BCEG Environmental Remediation Co., Ltd. provides environmental engineering services. The company offers soil remediation, pesticide contaminated site restoration, coking site restoration, petrochemical site restoration, and other services; and repairing agent production, technology consulting, and other services. It also provides site and groundwater restoration, mine repair, farmland improvement and restoration, and water body and heavy metal repair services. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Beijing, China.

300965.SZ.long_name: Beijing Hengyu Datacom Aviation Equipment co., LTD
300965.SZ.summary: Beijing Hengyu Datacom Aviation Equipment co., LTD provides airborne multi-function display equipment, airborne navigation equipment, airborne display modules, and visual navigation systems in China. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Xi'an, China.

3313.HK.summary: ArtGo Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the trade of commodities in Mainland China. It operates in two segments, Marble Products and Commodity Trading. The company offers marble slabs, and marble related crafts, as well as bathroom and tailor-made household products. It is also involved in mining, processing, trading, and selling marble stones. In addition, the company provides cargo handling services; and wholesales and retails decorating materials and chemical products. Further, it provides technical services for stone processing, as well as enterprise management and investment consulting services; processes minerals; produces and sells calcium carbonate products; and offers business management consulting services. The company was formerly known as ArtGo Mining Holdings Limited and changed its name to ArtGo Holdings Limited in March 2015. ArtGo Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

3339.HK.summary: Lonking Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and distributes wheel loaders, road rollers, excavators, forklifts, and other construction machinery in Mainland China. The company also provides hydraulic excavators and skid steer loaders; and diesel, electric, and LPG forklifts. In addition, it offers components, such as axles, gear boxes, cylinders, gears, castings, and high-end hydraulic pumps and valves; and main valves, parts, pilot oil valves, radial plunger motors, swing motors and reducer assemblies, and variable plunger pumps. Further, the company provides finance leasing for wheel loaders and other machinery. It also sells its products to approximately 40 countries in Mid and South America, Russia, Asia and Pacific area, Mid-East countries and Africa, etc. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

3348.HK.summary: China PengFei Group Limited manufactures and installs rotary kilns and grinding equipment, and its related equipment in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers rotary kilns, preheaters, dryers, coolers, control systems, and related parts and components; tube and vertical mills, roller presses, powder sorters, crushers, and dust collectors; and spare parts for ball and vertical mills, and rotary kilns. The company also provides production line construction services comprising design, procurement, construction, and/or trial operations of production lines; manufactures building materials; and leases property and equipment. It serves customers in building materials production, metallurgy, chemical, and environmental protection industries. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Hai'an, the People's Republic of China.

3369.HK.summary: Qinhuangdao Port Co., Ltd. operates ports in Mainland China. The Company provides highly integrated port services, including stevedoring, stacking, warehousing, transportation, and logistics services; and handles various types of cargoes primarily comprising coal, metal ores, oil and liquefied chemicals, containers, general cargoes, and other goods. It also provides ancillary port services, such as tugging, tallying, trans-shipping, and shipping agency. In addition, the company offers value-added services consisting of towing, tallying, and coal blending, as well as tariff-free warehouse and export supervisory warehouse services; and loading and unloading, port investment, and international trade services, as well as sells accessories. It operates 23 coal berths, 7 oil and liquefied chemical berths, 17 general cargo berths, and 3 container berths in Qinhuangdao Port; 4 ore berths and two general bulk berths in Caofeidian Port; and 2 general bulk berths, 2 general cargo berths, 4 multi-purpose berths, and two ore berths in Huanghua port. The company was founded in 1898 and is headquartered in Qinhuangdao, China. Qinhuangdao Port Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Hebei Port Group Co., Ltd.

3808.HK.summary: Sinotruk (Hong Kong) Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of heavy duty trucks (HDTs), medium-heavy duty trucks, light duty trucks (LDTs), buses, and related parts and components in Mainland China and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Heavy Duty Trucks, Light Duty Trucks, Engines, and Finance. It offers specialty vehicles; pure electric power, hybrid power, hydrogen fuel, dual-source trolley, diesel, and natural gas buses; industrial and construction machinery engines; HDT and LDT engines; and HDT key parts and components, such as gearboxes and various types of casting and forging, as well as cabins, axles, and steel frames. The company also provides axle and transmission parts and truck refitting services; deposit taking, borrowings, commercial notes and bank bills discounting, auto and supply chain financing, and entrusted investment and customer credit services; and consultation and strategic planning services. In addition, it imports and exports trucks and spare parts; manufactures and reproduces engines; and researches, develops, manufactures, and sells commercial vehicles. Sinotruk (Hong Kong) Limited serves infrastructure, construction, container transportation, logistic, mining, steel, chemical, and other industries. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Jinan, China. Sinotruk (Hong Kong) Limited is a subsidiary of China National Heavy Duty Truck Group Company Limited.

3898.HK.long_name: Zhuzhou CRRC Times Electric Co., Ltd.
3898.HK.summary: Zhuzhou CRRC Times Electric Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, in the research, development, designs, manufactures, and sells railway transportation equipment products, and provision of relevant services primarily in Mainland China and internationally. The company also produces propulsion and control systems for trains and electric vehicles, signaling systems, power supply solutions, platform screen doors, rail maintenance vehicles, marine engineering equipment, and component products for various applications. Its products for rolling stock and railways include EMU, locomotive, and mass transit systems; and components products consist of semiconductors, resistors, reactors, radiators, sensors, power capacitors, and heatsinks. The company's energy and industrial products comprise marine engineering, electric vehicle, and inverter and converter systems, as well as provides railway maintenance and construction machines. The company was formerly known as Zhuzhou CSR Times Electric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhuzhou CRRC Times Electric Co., Ltd. in March 2016. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

3969.HK.long_name: China Railway Signal & Communication Corporation Limited
3969.HK.summary: China Railway Signal & Communication Corporation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides rail transportation control system solutions in China and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Rail Transportation Control System, General Construction Contracting, and Others. It offers design, consultancy, and system integration services for rail transportation control system projects; and integrated rail transportation solutions. The company also produces and sells signal system products, communication information system products, infrastructure equipment and information systems, and other related products. In addition, it offers construction, installation, testing, operation, and maintenance services for rail transportation control systems; and services relating to municipal engineering projects and other construction projects. Further, the company engages in the investment management, technical exchange and trade, and bidding agency activities, as well as provision of project management activities. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. China Railway Signal & Communication Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of China Railway Signal & Communication (Group) Corporation Limited.

4560.TW.summary: Strong H Machinery Technology (Cayman) Incorporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells sewing machine spare parts in China and Taiwan. It provides edges, needle plates, feed dogs, presser foots, needle clamps, and knives for embroidery sewing machines, as well as straight knife round knifes, gauge sets, and needle plate assemblies. The company offers its products under the STRONG H brand. Strong H Machinery Technology (Cayman) Incorporation was founded in 1994 and is based in Laizhou, China.

46H.F.summary: Hollysys Automation Technologies Ltd. provides automation solutions in the People's Republic of China, Southeast Asia, India, and the Middle East. The company offers a suite of industrial automation systems, including third-party hardware-centric products, such as instrumentation and actuators; proprietary software-centric distributed control systems/programmable logic controllers; and valued-added software packages comprising real-time management information system, HolliAS asset management system, operator training system, HolliAS batch application package, HolliAS advanced process control package, and safety instrumentation system, as well as HOLLiAS MACS-N DCS, a proprietary nuclear power non-safety automation and control system. It also provides train control center that monitors route condition, track status, train schedules, distance between trains, and the working status of other function devices, as well as generates control instructions and commands. In addition, the company offers automation train protection that operates as a train over-speed protection mechanism; and supervisory control and data acquisition system, an open software platform. Further, it offers research and development services; and provides integrated automation systems and services, mechanical and electrical solution services, and installation services. The company serves customers in the industrial, railway, subway, nuclear power, and mechanical and electronic industries. The company was formerly known as HLS Systems International Ltd. and changed its name to Hollysys Automation Technologies Ltd. in July 2009. Hollysys Automation Technologies Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic China.

4SK.F.summary: Sinotruk (Hong Kong) Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of heavy duty trucks (HDTs), medium-heavy duty trucks, light duty trucks (LDTs), buses, and related parts and components in Mainland China and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Heavy Duty Trucks, Light Duty Trucks, Engines, and Finance. It offers specialty vehicles; pure electric power, hybrid power, hydrogen fuel, dual-source trolley, diesel, and natural gas buses; industrial and construction machinery engines; HDT and LDT engines; and HDT key parts and components, such as gearboxes and various types of casting and forging, as well as cabins, axles, and steel frames. The company also provides axle and transmission parts and truck refitting services; deposit taking, borrowings, commercial notes and bank bills discounting, auto and supply chain financing, and entrusted investment and customer credit services; and consultation and strategic planning services. In addition, it imports and exports trucks and spare parts; manufactures and reproduces engines; and researches, develops, manufactures, and sells commercial vehicles. Sinotruk (Hong Kong) Limited serves infrastructure, construction, container transportation, logistic, mining, steel, chemical, and other industries. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Jinan, China. Sinotruk (Hong Kong) Limited is a subsidiary of China National Heavy Duty Truck Group Company Limited.

4VC0.F.long_name: China Dredging Environment Protection Holdings Limited
4VC0.F.summary: China Dredging Environment Protection Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides dredging services in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through four segments: Capital and Reclamation Dredging Business (CRD Business), Environmental Protection Dredging and Water Management Business (EPD and Water Management Business), Other Marine Business, and Property Management Business. The CRD Business segment offers capital and reclamation dredging services, as well as related consultation services. The EPD and Water Management Business segment provides dredging or water management services; and construction services for promoting environmental interests and water quality primarily for inland rivers. The Other Marine Business segment offers marine hoisting, installation, salvaging, vessel chartering, and other engineering services. The Property Management Business segment provides shopping mall management and leasing services; and hotel construction services. It also manufactures and sells dredging machines; invests in, develops, and manages properties; and provides lending and venture capital financing business services in the technology sector. The company was formerly known as Xiangyu Dredging Holdings Limited and changed its name to China Dredging Environment Protection Holdings Limited in January 2014. The company is headquartered in Yancheng, the People's Republic of China. China Dredging Environment Protection Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Wangji Limited.

5GD.SI.summary: Sunpower Group Ltd. provides environmental protection solutions in the People's Republic of China, Canada, the United States, Asia, South East Asia, the Middle East, and Europe. The company operates through two segments, Manufacturing & Services and Green Investments. The Manufacturing & Services segment designs, researches, develops, and manufactures heat exchangers and pressure vessels that are used for completing the reaction, heat transfer, separation, and storage processes of industrial production; and pipeline energy saving products, such as steam distribution pipelines, pipe and spring supports, and hangers that provide heat isolation from environmental temperature changes and minimize temperature loss during transmission. This segment also offers heat pipes and heat pipe exchangers that are used in the petrochemical, steel and chemical industries; heat pipes, which are used in the construction of roads, railways, and oil pipelines; and related environmental protection products. It also offers flare and flare gas recovery systems to recover petrochemical by-products from flare or waste gas; zero liquid discharge systems for high salinity wastewater; and petrochemical engineering, which provides sulfur recovery solutions, skid-mounted equipment, and formaldehyde devices; waste heat recovery and pipeline energy saving engineering solutions; and thermal power engineering comprising engineering, procurement, and construction services for thermal power projects. The Green Investments segment invests, develops, and operates centralized steam, heat, and electricity cogeneration plants. The company also installs and commissions various projects; provides design, technical and consultation, technology, sales, and after-sale services; produces and sells foam glass products; researches new energy-saving materials; and supplies heat and electricity to enterprises. Sunpower Group Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Nanjing, the People's Republic of China.

600004.SS.long_name: Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport Co., Ltd.
600004.SS.summary: Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport in China. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

600017.SS.summary: Rizhao Port Co., Ltd. provides cargo handling and storage services in China. It is involved in the handling and storage of ore, coal, cement, nickel ore, aluminum, vanadium, steel, coke, grain, wood chips, and other bulk cargoes, as well as crude oil, liquid chemicals, and containers. The company is based in Rizhao, China.

600020.SS.summary: Henan Zhongyuan Expressway Company Limited engages in the investment, operation management, and maintenance of highways, independent bridges, and other transportation infrastructure projects. The company operates Zhengxi, Zhumadian, Zhengzhou, Pingdingshan, Zheng, Shangqiu, and Jixian County projects. It also engages in the highway construction, management, investment, and financing systems. Henan Zhongyuan Expressway Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is based in Zhengzhou, China.

600031.SS.summary: Sany Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of concrete machinery, excavators, hoisting machinery, pile driving machinery, and road construction machinery worldwide. It offers truck mounted and stationary concrete pumps, concrete batching plants, asphalt batching plants, crawler cranes, truck cranes, rotary drilling rigs, compactors, pavers, graders, and other products, as well as services and parts. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

600035.SS.summary: Hubei Chutian Smart Communication Co.,Ltd. focuses on the investment and development of roads, bridges, and other transportation infrastructure, China. It operates a highway connecting Wuhan and Yichang; and a highway from Dawu to Suizhou, as well as from Huangshi to Xianning. The company also engages in the development and maintenance of expressways; development of road facilities; catering accommodation along the highway, commercial entertainment, oil fuel, vehicle maintenance, tourism development, advertising media, warehousing and logistics, energy and mineral resources, leasing and other ancillary facilities management, and project management development activities; investment and development of other related industries along the road; equity investment operations; and service industry activities. The company was formerly known as Hubei Chutian Expressway Co.,Ltd. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Wuhan, China.

600038.SS.summary: Avicopter Plc manufactures and sells helicopters and fixed aircraft in China. The company offers Z9 helicopters, Y12 light and general aircraft, H425 helicopters, EC120/HC120 helicopters, and ultra-light and ERJ145 regional jet airplanes. It also provides delta winged aircraft with two seats and three seats. The company was formerly known as Hafei Aviation Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Avicopter Plc in December 2014. Avicopter Plc is based in Harbin, China.

600039.SS.summary: Sichuan Road & Bridge Co., Ltd. invests in, designs, invests, constructs, and operates transportation infrastructure in China. It also engages in the clean energy activities through hydro and wind power plants; and gold resources, real estate development, and finance and securities businesses. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Chengdu, China.

600051.SS.summary: Ningbo United Group Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the thermoelectricity, real estate, and trade businesses in China. It is involved in the development and construction of Ningbo Economic and Technological Development Zone comprising six functional areas, including industry, commerce, storage, public construction, living, and foreign villas. The company also operates Qijiashan Hotel, a four-star tourist hotel; and generates and supplies thermal power and heat. In addition, it is involved in the development of real estate properties and residential projects; tourism culture development business; import and export of various products; and provision of investment management services. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Economic and Technical Development Zone United Development Corporation Limited and changed its name to Ningbo United Group Co.,Ltd. in June 1996. Ningbo United Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Ningbo, China.

600057.SS.summary: Xiamen Xiangyu Co., Ltd. provides supply chain and circulation services in the People's Republic of China. The company supplies plastic chemicals, agricultural products, metallic ores, forest products, and mechanical and electrical products. It also offers various integrated logistics services comprising international purchase and transport, international distribution, international re-export logistics, vendor managed inventory, bonded export to import, and manuals management services; and international multimodal transport services, such as door-to-door sea-land, sea-air, and train-air transport, as well as warehousing, customs clearance, and stock at each logistics nodes. In addition, the company provides domestic door to door logistics services; and financial logistics services, including pledge and confirmed financing services. Further, it develops, constructs, and operates logistics platform that comprise port terminals, a logistics park, a distribution center, an international shipping center, and a business logistics center. Xiamen Xiangyu Co., Ltd. is based in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China.

600058.SS.summary: Minmetals Development Co., Ltd. operates as a steel distribution service provider in China and internationally. It offers iron ore, coal, coke, pig iron, steel billets, scrap steel, waste ships, refractory materials, barite, fluorspar, talc, silicon carbide, and metallurgical industry raw materials; and ferrochrome, silicomanganese, ferromanganese, electrolytic manganese, ferrosilicon, molybdenum iron, molybdenum oxide, nickel iron, tungsten iron, ferrovanadium, ferrotitanium, boron iron, iron alloys, and alloy raw materials, such as chrome ore and manganese ore. The company also provides rebars, high wires, coiled screws, hot rolled coils, strips, plates, cold rolled coils, galvanized sheets, color coated sheets and various industrial materials, steel and stainless steel, special steel, steel pipes, cast pipe castings, auto parts, hardware and electrical equipment, complete sets of equipment, etc. It addition, it is involved in the provision of logistics, transportation, freight forwarding, ship generation, warehousing, and processing and distribution, as well as insurance and supply chain finance services; tendering business; industrial investment business; and operation of an e-commerce platform to sell its products. Further, the company engages in the short, medium, and long-term time charter operations and escrow business, as well as offers shipping for dry bulk and groceries, containers shipping services, and engineering logistics projects; and consulting services, such as transportation design, market forecasting, and analysis. The company is based in Beijing, China.

600067.SS.summary: Citychamp Dartong Co., Ltd. engages in real estate development and special enameled wire businesses in China and internationally. The company also researches, develops, produces, and sells enameled wires under the Wuyi brand; develops, produces, and sells lithium-ion battery electrolyte additives; and operates Le Mirador Resort & Spa, a five-star luxury hotel that consists of 61 rooms, Mirador medical center, Givenchy seven-star spa center, restaurant, conference room, gymnasium, indoor heated pool, and other facilities. In addition, it provides financial services. Citychamp Dartong Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.

600068.SS.summary: China Gezhouba Group Company Limited engages in infrastructure construction business in China. The company plans, designs, constructs, operates, and builds hydro, thermal, nuclear, and wind power plants; and railways, highways, bridges, tunnels, airports, ports, and wharfs; and municipal, housing, agricultural, water conservancy, and other projects. It also provides services for river regulation, flood control, water logging control, irrigation, water supply, and water resources protection, etc.; generator units, and electrical and auxiliary equipment installation services; and services for various kinds of infrastructure constructions in municipal facilities, including water distribution projects, sewage treatment, flood control, etc. In addition, the company is involved in power-related planning, study, consulting, assessment, surveying, design, and industrial standards drawing; manufactures environmental products; and provides services for waste treatment, land pollution control and reclamation, and enhance water environment and eco-environment. Further, it undertakes urban, residential property, commercial real estate, and housing development projects; manufactures EHV smoothing reactors, barge derricks, gantry cranes, super gates, and vertical platform for installation and adjustment of a drum-type strainer, ships, etc.; and finance infrastructure projects. Additionally, the company provides slag treatment, and coordinated waste treatment services for cement kilns, as well as building materials; services for civil explosive industry, including scientific research, production, and sales and blasting; imports and exports equipment and materials; and invests in various infrastructure projects. The company is based in Wuhan, China.

600089.SS.summary: TBEA Co., Ltd. provides power energy, power transmission, renewable energy, new material, and energy solutions worldwide. The company manufactures and sells transformers, switches, electric wires and cables, cable accessories, integrated substation automation products, smart distribution grids, and charging facilities. It also provides power control systems, photovoltaic products, polycrystalline silicon, flexible equipment for power transmission and distribution, white carbon black, silicon ships, and inverters. In addition, the company offers alloy materials, including alloy rods, aluminum alloy rod products, aluminum alloy ingots, re-smelting aluminum ingots, and slab ingot products; electron and electronic aluminum foils; etched and formed electrode foils; heat-insulated aluminum profiles for windows and doors, curtain wall aluminum profiles, and industry profiles; aluminum substrate plate strips; target rods, wires, and ingots; and high-purity aluminum materials, such as refined aluminum ingots for re-smelting, high-purity aluminum rods, ure aluminum round rods, and refined aluminum wires. Further, it is involved in mining and selling coal products; supplying power transmission and transformation equipment; UHV DC and AC engineering construction activities; and the provision of survey, design, construction, installation, commissioning, operation, maintenance, training, and system integration solutions, as well as charging solutions in public places. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Changji, China.

600093.SS.long_name: Easy Visible Supply Chain Management Co.,Ltd.
600093.SS.summary: Easy Visible Supply Chain Management Co.,Ltd. operates as a supply chain management company in China. The company engages in the platform trade portrayal, supply chain, factoring, and asset securitization businesses, as well as the provision of supply chain financial services. Its technology includes blockchain and distributed ledger, Internet of Things, artificial intelligence, trusted data management, and intelligent warehouse management. The company is based in Kunming, China.

600110.SS.summary: Nuode Investment Co.,Ltd engages in the production and sale of lithium-ion battery materials and electrolytic copper foils in China. It also offers power battery materials. The company was formerly known as HINA-KINWA HIGH TECHNOLOGY CO.,LTD. and changed its name to Nuode Investment Co.,Ltd in February 2016. Nuode Investment Co.,Ltd was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

600112.SS.summary: Guizhou Changzheng Tiancheng Holding Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, sale, and service of transformer on load tap-changers and off-circuit tap-changers in China. It also provides motor driver mechanism products, intelligent controllers, and oil filters, as well as pre-sale, consultation, rapid response, and after-sale services. The company's products are used in electric power, petroleum, chemical, metallurgy, railway, light, and real estate industries. It also exports its products to approximately 30 countries and regions. The company is based in Zunyi, China.

600118.SS.summary: China Spacesat Co.,Ltd. engages in the aerospace manufacturing and aerospace technology applications businesses in China and internationally. The company develops and sells small and micro satellites, such as CAST10, CAST20, CAST2000, CAST3000, CAST4000, and other small/small satellite public platforms. Its satellite products also include optical remote sensing, electromagnetic and microwave remote sensing, and science and technology testing products. In addition, the company is also involved in the integration of satellite ground application systems; and manufacture of terminal equipment and the provision of satellite operation services. Its products and services are used in the fields of communications, satellite navigation, satellite remote sensing, cloud computing and information security, and smart cities, as well as national defense and economic construction, social development, etc. The company operates under the Aerospace Dongfanghong, Aerospace Star, and Shenzhen Dongfanghong brand names. The company is based in Beijing, China. China Spacesat Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation.

600119.SS.summary: Y.U.D.Yangtze River Investment Industry Co.,Ltd. provides logistics services in China. It engages in industrial investment, domestic trade, real estate development and operation, maritime, aviation, land international freight forwarding, warehousing, and property management businesses, as well as the provision of information consulting services. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600125.SS.long_name: China Railway Tielong Container Logistics Co., Ltd
600125.SS.summary: China Railway Tielong Container Logistics Co., Ltd. provides railway transportation services in China. It offers railway special container logistics services, such as transportation of steel, grain, ore, cement, chilled and liquid chemicals, and other transportation services. The company is also involved in the provision of railway freight, port logistics, warehousing, and freight forwarding services, as well as real estate development activities. China Railway Tielong Container Logistics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Dalian, China.

600145.SS.long_name: Xinjiang Yilu Wanyuan Industrial Investment Holding Co., Ltd.
600145.SS.summary: Xinjiang Yilu Wanyuan Industrial Investment Holding Co., Ltd researches, develops, produces, and sells sanitary ceramics products in China and internationally. It offers toilets and toilet seats; and hardware, shower, bathroom, and bathtub products. The company was formerly known as Guizhou Guochuang Energy Holding (Group) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xinjiang Yilu Wanyuan Industrial Investment Holding Co., Ltd in June 2015. Xinjiang Yilu Wanyuan Industrial Investment Holding Co., Ltd was founded in 1952 and is based in Guiyang, China.

600150.SS.summary: China CSSC Holdings Limited engages in shipbuilding and repair businesses. The company also manufactures and sells marine high-power diesel engines; and provides marine engineering and other services. It operates in approximately 40 countries. The company is based in Shanghai, China. China CSSC Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of China State Shipbuilding Corporation.

600153.SS.summary: Xiamen C&D Inc. engages in the supply chain, real estate development, and industrial investment businesses in China and internationally. Its supply chain operations include the purchase, transportation, and storehouse location and facility allocation, freight tracking, cargo risk management, and inventory management services. The company also supplies pulp and paper, iron and steel, mineral, agricultural, textile and other light industrial, chemical, mechanical and electrical, automobile, and wine/spirit products. Xiamen C&D Inc. was founded in 1980 and is based in Xiamen, China.

600169.SS.summary: Taiyuan Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells heavy-duty machinery in China. It offers railway wheels, axles, gearboxes, wheelsets, and tunnel boring machines; mining shovels and hydraulic excavators, semi-mobile crushing stations, self-mobile crushing stations, spreaders, discharging cars, crawler transporters, and belt conveyors; heavy duty and special cranes, and dry quenching lifters; seamless steel pipe rolling, plate and strip rolling mill and finishing, plate correcting, and steel pipe welding equipment; and extrusion, forging hydraulic, punching hydraulic, and special hydraulic presses. The company also provides wind turbines; coke oven machinery; pressure vessels and related products; jack-up drilling platforms, lift-boats, wind-turbine installation vessels, hydraulic pile driving hammers, rock-embedded drilling machines, whole package of drilling equipment, jacking and locking systems, and single point mooring systems; gear transmission and other standard gearbox products; and steel castings and various kinds of forgings. In addition, it offers jib cranes, ship-to-shore container cranes, ship loaders, bridge type grab ship unloaders, rail mounted container gantry cranes, rubber tried container gantry cranes, goliath cranes, bucket wheel stacker-reclaimers, etc.; construction machinery, such as cranes; oil film bearings, chocks, and lubrication systems; and space launch towers, stage equipment, nuclear vessels, and electric control equipment. The company also exports its products to approximately 50 countries. Its products are used in the fields of metallurgy, mining, energy, transportation, offshore, aerospace, chemical, railway, shipbuilding, environmental protection, etc. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Taiyuan, China.

600179.SS.summary: Antong Holdings Co., Ltd. operates as a goods transportation company. It offers logistics services. The company was formerly known as Heilongjiang Heihua Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Antong Holdings Co., Ltd. in 2016. Antong Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Quanzhou, China.

600190.SS.summary: Jinzhou Port Co., Ltd. operates the Jinzhou Port in Liaoning province, China. Its port has 27 berths, including a 300,000-ton oil berth, 100,000-ton bulk cargo berths, and 100,000-ton container specific berths. The company handles oil, grain, building materials, metal ore, steel, coal, and containers. It offers port management, port loading and unloading, water transportation auxiliary industry, road transportation; grain acquisition; grain wholesale; metal materials, mineral powder, coal sales; wholesale oil products; material storage; domestic ship agents, cargo agents; and international trade and re-export trade services. Jinzhou Port Co., Ltd. is based in Jinzhou, China.

600192.SS.summary: Lanzhou GreatWall Electrical Co., Ltd researches, develops, manufactures, sells, and services high and medium voltage switchgear equipment in China. The company offers high and low voltage electrical components and key components, electric drive automation and new energy control systems, low voltage complete power distribution devices, bus bars, charging base station and system integration devices, and other electrical and electronic products. It also provides hydropower operation management and new energy batteries; and fruit and vegetable juices. Its products are used in power generation, transmission and distribution, nonferrous metals, metallurgy, petrochemical, coal, transportation, construction, and other industries. The company also exports its products to approximately 62 countries and regions in Europe, Asia, Africa, and Australia. Lanzhou GreatWall Electrical Co., Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Lanzhou, China.

600193.SS.long_name: Shanghai Prosolar Resources Development Co., Ltd
600193.SS.summary: Shanghai Prosolar Resources Development Co., Ltd engages in the exploitation of iron ore and the distribution of iron powder products in Shanghai and Hunan provinces, China. It also develops and sells real estate properties, primarily villas. The company is based in Shanghai, China.

600202.SS.summary: Harbin Air Conditioning Co.,Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells air cooling and air conditioning products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers petrochemial air cooling products, including dry-type, humid -type, dry-humid type, surface-evaporation, and hot wind circulation - air coolers. It also provides power plant air cooling products, such as direct air cooling systems, indirect air cooling systems, and mechanical draft air cooling towers; and HVAC products comprising assembly air conditioning units, air heaters, and air screens.
